title: 沈政男稱柯文哲如同「美麗島受難者」 楊斯棓怒轟:褻瀆!
Djokovic vence também nas duplas, e Sérvia confirma favoritismo contra a Grécia na Copa Davis
creator: admin3
content: Em seu primeiro torneio após a eliminação precoce no US Open, Novak Djokovic ajudou a Sérvia a confirmar o favoritismo no confronto com a Grécia pelo Grupo 1 da Copa Davis e garantir vaga no qualificatório da principal competição entre países de 2025. Depois de abrir 2 a 0 com duas vitórias nos jogos de simples no sábado, Djokovic e Hamad Medjedovic confirmaram a vaga com a vitória sobre Aristotelis Thanos and Petros Tsitsipas por 2 a 1 (6/3, 3/6 e 6/3) neste domingo em Belgrado, na Sérvia. A dupla da casa conseguiu 13 aces e venceu 75% dos pontos com o primeiro serviço e fechou o jogo em 2h10. Recordista de títulos em Grand Slams e ex-número um do mundo, Djokovic já havia vencido Ioannis Xilas, apenas o 770o do mundo, por 2 a 0 (6/0 e 6/1) em apenas 45 minutos. Atual quarto do ranking e aos 37 anos, Djokovic afirmou antes do confronto com os gregos que esta poderia ser a última vez que ele joga diante da torcida na Copa Davis por causa da mudança de formato. O sérvio busca neste final de temporada uma vaga nas Finais da ATP, que reúne os oito melhores da temporada. Maior campeão do torneio, com sete títulos, Djokovic atualmente ocupa a nona colocação entre os melhores de 2024. O torneio acontece em novembro, em Turim, na Itália. Com o confronto já definido, Sérvia e Grécia disputaram apenas mais jogo, no qual Demetris Azoides venceu Dusan Lajovic por 1/6, 2/3 e abandono. A Grécia não contou com seu principal tenista, Stéfanos Tsitsipas, 12o...

title: Od našeg jedinstva zavise sva naša sreća i svi naši uspesi! Oglasio se patrijarh Porfirije povodom Dana srpskog jedinstva, slobode i nacionalne zastave
content: - Zato je danas višestruko korisno da podsetimo sebe i sve naše sunarodnike, ne samo u Srbiji i Srpskoj, nego i u svim našim ovozemaljskim postojbinama, gde god da živimo, da od našeg jedinstva, ali jedinstva isključivo u dobru, u ljubavi, u pravdi i istini, u veri u Hrista, zavisi sva naša sreća i svi naši uspesi, i lični, i zajednički - istakao je patrijarh . Drugi stub, naglasio je, na kojem počiva naše narodno znanje, jeste sloboda, ideal i imperativ koji baštini srpsko nasleđe, ali koji je svojstven i čovečanstvu. - Naš narod je ovu istinu duboko i iskustveno doživeo, jer je vekovima po Božjem dopuštenju, u raznim krajevima i raznim vremenima, trpeo ropske stege raznih porobljivača. U tim periodima, kada se gasila slava i moć srpske države, i kada su Srbi trpeli, patili i stradali od tuđina, Bog je davao, te se budio duh našeg čoveka. Budila se i kalila vera u Boga, koji neće ostaviti svoj narod i koji će učiniti da mnogoželjena sloboda ponovo zasija - rekao je patrijarh. Foto: Foto: TANJUG/ SAVA RADOVANOVIĆ/ bg Jedinstvo i sloboda su, dodao je, zlatne niti od kojih je istkana naša zastava. - Ona kao odlika našeg identiteta sabira u sebi naše celokupno nasleđe. Kao takva, ona predstavlja svojevrsnu tapiju srpskog naroda, gde god da živi, ali i njegovu ličnu kartu svuda u svetu i pred čitavim svetom - rekao je patrijarh Porfirije. Svečana akademija povodom Dana srpskog jedinstva, slobode i nacionalne zastave održana je u Srpskom...

title: Не оснастили навіть 4 бригади: Зеленський пояснив, чому ЗСУ не вистачає боєприпасів
content: Незважаючи на пакети військової допомоги від США і Європи, Україна все ще відчуває критичну нестачу боєприпасів – як через повільне постачання, так і через дуже великі потреби. Про це президент України Володимир Зеленський розповів у інтерв'ю з журналістом CNN Фарідом Закарією. "Нам потрібно підготувати 14 бригад. На цей час з цього пакета бригад ми не оснастили навіть чотири... Нам потрібно занадто багато", - пояснив Зеленський. Він додав, що саме тому Україна розвиває внутрішнє виробництво дронів, хоча його теж недостатньо. Президент також пояснив, що восьмимісячна пауза, що передувала позитивному рішенню Конгресу США, повністю виснажила всі українські запаси. "Що ми робили протягом цих восьми місяців? Ми використовували все, що могли. Ми передали те, що в нас є в резервах, і те, що в нас є на складах або в резервних бригадах, які нам зараз потрібні. Усе, що в них було, ми забрали – усю їхню зброю", - пояснив Зеленський. Як писало видання Forbes, в Україні не вистачає сучасної техніки для новосформованих бригад , і їм доводиться використовувати західну техніку 1960-х років, яка не має товстої броні. Раныше головнокомандувач Збройних Сил України Олександр Сирський розповів, що наразі розрив у застосуванні боєприпасів на фронті між ЗСУ та окупантами значно скоротився. За його словами, пропорція становить один до двох, один до двох із половиною, тоді як рік тому цей показник був один до десяти, один до шести.

title: Taranto, novità sullo 'Iacovone': possibile giocare nell'impianto anche durante la demolizione
content: Novità importanti per quanto riguarda l'utilizzo dello stadio 'Erasmo Iacovone' da parte del Taranto . Stando, infatti, a quanto riportato da Antenna Sud il club ionico potrebbe continuare a giocare nel proprio impianto anche durante i lavori di demolizione dell’anello inferiore. Per rendere possibile questa soluzione è necessario un via libera da parte del Comune: secondo le normative vigenti, al di sotto dei 4.000 spettatori la gestione della struttura non richiede più l’intervento della commissione dei pubblici spettacoli. L’amministrazione comunale starebbe lavorando per presentare un progetto che permetta al club di giocare con una capienza al di sotto dei 4.000 spettatori. Ricordiamo, però, che l'impianto sarà totalmente inaccessibile dal gennaio 2025, quando il Taranto dovrà traslocare allo stadio 'Italia' di Massafra, attualmente al centro di lavori di ristrutturazione. Per poterci giocare, però, il Taranto dovrà chiedere una deroga dal momento che il terreno di gioco ha qualche metro in meno rispetto alle normative imposte dalla Lega Pro.

title: Emiliano García-Page cree que en el PSOE "hay más mar de fondo que en los últimos diez años"
content: El presidente de , , cree que "se equivocan quienes piensan que no hay mar de fondo en el " ya que "probablemente hay más que en los últimos diez años", y asegura que en el último Comité del partido hubo muchos "guiños" en ese sentido. En una entrevista en recogida por EFE, el dirigente socialista se ha referido así al transcurso del Comité Federal que celebró el PSOE el pasado sábado, y al hecho de que solo él y el secretario general del PSOE de Aragón, Javier Lambán, expresaran visiblemente su rechazo al pacto suscrito entre el y para la investidura de Salvador Illa, que incluye una en Cataluña. "Se equivocan quienes piensan que no hay mar de fondo en el PSOE. Probablemente que en los últimos diez años", afirma Page, que añade que "lo que algunos expresaron en agosto es realmente lo que piensan", en referencia a otros dirigentes socialista que habían sido críticos con ese acuerdo. Afirma que "el acuerdo con Esquerra ni siquiera figuraba en el orden del día, en ese sentido", lo que indica que "deliberadamente se intentaba que no se hablara del asunto", y subraya que a pesar de eso el Comité "estuvo lleno de... guiños". Sobre la posibilidad de que , el dirigente socialistas explica que no se fía de ese partido y que lo que le preocupa es "el precio que pueda llegar a pedir para aprobarlos" porque "lo que pide ya no es que no quepa en el Presupuesto, ni en este ni en el de una legislatura entera" "Es que, además, no cabe en la Constitución. Ni cabe en...

title: OVO NIKAKO NE SMETE DA RADITE U SLUČAJU POPLAVE Detaljna upustva o ponašanju pre i za vreme poplava: Najvažnije je da pripremite JEDNU STVAR
content: Najmanje sedam osoba je stradalo, a više ljudi se vodi kao nestalo u poplavama izazvanih obilnim kišama koje su pogodile centralnu i istočnu Evropu. Srbiju su danas tokom dana okovale jake padavine, a na Kopaoniku je pao i sneg. Usled vremenskih neprilika za sutra ujutru je zakazan sastanak Štaba za vanredne situacije u Vladi Srbije, a ovo su uputstva kako se ponašati pre, ali i ako se dogodi poplava.

title: Uttar Pradesh: Meerut house collapse death toll rises to 10
content: Meerut: The death toll in the collapse of a three-storey house in the Zakir Nagar area of Meerut has risen to 10 while the rescue work at the site is still underway, the district administration said on Sunday. District Magistrate Deepak Meena said a process was underway to provide financial assistance of Rs 4 lakh for each deceased from the natural calamity fund and Rs 1.20 lakh for the house being completely damaged. Action is also being taken to provide financial assistance to the affected family for the animals that died in the incident, he said. The Samajwadi Party (SP) and the Congress expressed deep sorrow over the house collapse and demanded that the government provide proper compensation to the affected family. Meanwhile, the district administration released a new list of the deceased on Sunday afternoon. According to it, those who died have been identified as Naffo alias Nafias (65), her son Sajid (40), Saima (35) the wife of Sajid; Sania (15) (Sajid’s daughter), Saqib (12) (Sajid’s son); Farhana (27), Alisa (25), Ria (10), Himsa (6 months) and Saifiyan (7). Those who survived are Samrin (4), Naeem (22), Nadeem (26), Saqib (20) and Aliya (8), the district administration said, adding they are undergoing medical treatment. The three-storey house collapsed on Saturday afternoon, trapping 15 people under the debris. “When the rescue operation started, the relatives gave information about 15 people. Three managed to escape when the building was collapsing,” the district...

title: Az utolsó olasz király távol tartotta magát a politikától
content: Jóllehet III. Viktor Emánuel egyetlen fia, születésétől fogva trónörökös volt, csak katonai nevelést kapott, a dinasztikus hagyományok szerint az uralkodóknak trónra kerülésük után kellett beletanulniuk a politikába. Az utolsó olasz király rendkívüli szigorban nőtt fel, apja előtt még családi körben is térdre kellett borulnia és kezet kellett csókolnia. Umberto azt sem tudta megbocsátani, hogy apja 1915-ben, miután a parlament akaratát semmibe véve lépett be az első világháborúba, népszerűségének növelése érdekében felajánlotta, hogy tízéves fia helyett annak unokaöccsét teszi meg trónörökösnek. Mussolini 1922-es kormányra kerülése után hatalmi harc kezdődött az új miniszterelnök és a király között, amelyből a Duce került ki győztesen. Mussolini elérte, hogy a király esetleges halála után a fasiszta Nagytanács nevezhesse ki az új államfőt és többször utalt rá, hogy az apja által alkalmatlannak tartott Umbertót látná szívesen a trónon. Az olasz hadsereg címzetes parancsnokává kinevezett herceg 1924-ben Mussolini megbízásából az új, fasiszta államot népszerűsítette a dél-amerikai olasz diaszpóra körében. 1929-ben Brüsszelben egy antifasiszta aktivista merényletet kísérelt meg ellene, a tettes nagy visszahangot kapott perében azzal védekezett, hogy cselekedete a fasiszta állam és nem a trónörökös személye ellen irányult. A merénylőt végül mindössze öt...

title: Isak utbytt blodig i paus
content: Fotboll / Premier League Simon Norberg Uppdaterad 18.48 | Publicerad 18.48 Alexander Isak, 24, hade inga roliga 45 minuter mot Wolverhampton. Svensken klev planen blodig strax före pausvisslan. När den andra började var 24-åringen utbytt. Newcastles stod för en slätstruken figur under den första halvleken borta mot Wolverhampton. Hemmalaget tog ledningen efter dryga halvtimmen genom mittfältsmotorn Mario Lemina. Gästernas eftermiddag blev inte bättre när gick i gräset på stopptid i den första halvleken. Rätt på snoken Wolves veteranback Craig Dawson dammade iväg en rensning mitt i ansiktet på svensken. Isak blödde från näsan och fick vård på planen innan han linkade av. När den andra halvleken skulle vissla igång var 24-åringen utbytt till förmån för Harvey Barnes. Följ ämnen i artikeln

title: Vinner The International – första svenskarna på elva år
creator: sebastian.parkkila@expressen.se (Sebastian Parkkila )
content: Ingen svensk Dota 2 -spelare har vunnit The International – en av världens största e-sportturneringar – sen Alliance stod för den historiska bedriften 2013. På söndagen, elva år senare, hade Team Liquid-trion Samuel ”Boxi” Svahn, Michael ”Micke” Vu och Aydin ”Insania” Sarkohi chansen i finalen mot stora rivalen Gaimin Gladiators i Köpenhamn. Finalen började också bra för Team Liquid, som efter en något trög start övertygade stort i late game och vann game ett i bäst av fem-mötet. Fortsatte imponera stort Svenskhoppet tog också med sig sitt momentum in i game två där de inledningsvis dominerade kartan totalt medan Gladiators hade stora svårigheter med att ta sig an lagfajterna. Till slut krackelerade försvaret och Liquid hade 2–0 och matchgame. Gladiators kom ut i game tre hetast, men ännu en gång var det snart svensklaget som tog över kartan allt mer. 21 minuter in hade de en enorm ledning på över 15 000 guld, och resten av kartan var nästan konstanta lagfajter. Finalen var i slutändan total dominans av Team Liquid som vinner The International 2024 på Royal arena i Köpenhamn. – Jag vet inte riktigt hur jag känner mig just nu, det känns otroligt och jag är så tacksam för mina lagkamrater, säger Aydin ”Insania” Sarkohi i segerintervjun. De säkrar efter 3–0-segern också förstapriset på 12,3 miljoner kronor. Följ Expressen E-sport på Youtube och X !

Serie A: Cagliari-Napoli 0-1 DIRETTA
content: Cagliari-Napoli è stata interrotta al 27' pt, dopo che si sono verificati scontri tra tifosi. In particolare ci sono stati dei lanci di oggetti fra gruppi delle opposte tifoserie e sul terreno di gioco (in particolare dei petardi e dei fumogeni, che sono finiti nell'area di rigore della squadra di casa). Uno steward che avrebbe cercato di frapporsi sarebbe uscito malconcio da questa situazione. La partita è ripresa dopo otto minuti di interruzione. Ci sono stati momenti di forte tensione dopo i lanci di fumogeni partiti dal settore dei tifosi del Napoli contro la curva sud del Cagliari, non quella degli ultrà ma occupata anche da famiglie. Gli ultras napoletani hanno provocato e insultato i cagliaritani con striscioni raffiguranti pecore e la scritta Bee. Anche dalla curva nord, dove ci sono i sostenitori più 'accesi' della squadra di Nicola sono poi stati lanciati fumogeni in campo, nell'area occupata dal portiere del Cagliari Scuffet. title: Cholera kills four in Adamawa
creator: Gilbert Ekugbe
content: Suspected cholera outbreak in Yola-North Local Government Council in Adamawa State has resulted in the death of four people and the hospitalisations of 36 others. The Executive Chairman of the Council, Mr. Jibrin Ibrahim, disclosed this to journalists during a visit to the victims at the Infectious Disease Control Centre in Yola, on Sunday. The outbreak occurred in Alkalawa, Ajiya, and Limawa wards, and is believed to be due to contaminated water sources and flooding He revealed that the outbreak occurred in Alkalawa, Ajiya, and Limawa wards within the council. Upon his arrival, Ibrahim reported that 20 cases were initially recorded, but the number quickly rose to 40, with four succumbing to the disease. Related News Adamawa varsity tasks Fintiri on peace commission Adamawa CJ frees 156 inmates Councils intensify awareness campaign on cholera He noted that a significant number of patients have been stabilized and are receiving medical attention from health workers. The Executive Chairman commended the swift response of health workers, the Red Cross, and international partners in addressing the outbreak. He attributed the suspected cholera outbreak to contaminated water sources, exacerbated by flooding in some areas. Ibrahim urged the public to maintain a clean environment, drink potable water, and wash vegetables and fruits thoroughly before consumption to prevent further spread of the disease.

title: Eid-el Maulud: PDP asks FG to review anti-people policies
creator: Abdulrahman Zakariyau
content: As Muslims observe Eid-el Maulud tomorrow, the Peoples Democratic Party has urged the All Progressives Congress-led Federal Government to reassess all policies that negatively affect the people and focus more on citizens’ welfare. The Federal Government had announced Monday as a public holiday to allow Muslims to celebrate Eid-el Maulud. In a statement on Sunday, PDP’s National Publicity Secretary, Debo Ologunagba, urged the Federal Government to address wasteful spending, tackle corruption, and focus resources on projects that directly benefit Nigerians. The statement read in part “The Peoples Democratic Party celebrates with Nigerians, especially the Muslim Ummah on the occasion of the Eid-el Maulud, charging them to strengthen their resolve for a national rebirth to overcome the biting economic hardship and worsening insecurity fuelled by the anti-people policies of the All Progressives Congress administration. “The Party urges Nigerians to use the occasion to reinforce their hope in the Almighty Allah for direction as well as care for one another especially at this critical time when millions of citizens have been subjected to misery, hopelessness and utter destitution as a result of bad governance by the APC. Related News Leverage technology for business growth, FG tasks traders Gombe gov preaches peace in Eid-el-Maulud message Eid-el-Maulud: IG orders security beef up “Eid-el Maulud, the celebration of the birth of the Holy Prophet Mohammed (SAW), offers humanity and...

title: Leverage technology for business growth, FG tasks traders
creator: Abiodun Nejo
content: The Federal Government has urged traders to explore new ways of doing things by making maximum use of technology in a bid to grow and expand their businesses. The Minister of State for Labour, Employment and Productivity, Nkeiruka Onyejeocha, advised that “marketplaces should not only be spaces of traditional commerce, but hubs of innovation where traders can leverage technology to grow their businesses”. Onyejeocha, represented by the State Controller of Labour, Mrs Grace Adeyeye, spoke in Ado Ekiti, the Ekiti State capital, on Saturday at the formal inauguration of State and Local Government chapter executives of the National Union of Market Traders Employers of Nigeria. She said, “In this era of economic transformation, where innovation and technology are shaping new ways of doing business, traders are encouraged to embrace these changes.” The minister of state reiterated the Federal Government’s commitment to enhance security benefits for traders across the country through the trade union superintending over them. Related News Eid-el Maulud: PDP asks FG to review anti-people policies FG, UNICEF say private sector key to ending open defecation FG inaugurates committee on new minimum wage She said, “The government recognised the challenges faced by the informal sector, especially market traders. Two armed Symbionese Liberation Army (SLA) members stormed into Patty's residence when she was a 19-year-old art history student at UC Berkeley. 6 Patty Hearst is the granddaughter of American publishing magnate William Randolph Hearst Credit: Archive Photos - Getty 6 She was just 19 when she was kidnapped by the Symbionese Liberation Army (SLA) Credit: AP:Associated Press 6 Patty Hearst during her time as an SLA member Credit: Bettmann Archive They beat her fiance half to death and put her inside a Chevy Impala trunk while she was chained, gagged and blindfolded. title: Divers probing how Bayesian superyacht sank make breakthrough discovery as they retrieve surveillance...
content: Experts will be analysing the equipment in specialised labs YACHT RIDDLE Divers probing how Bayesian superyacht sank make breakthrough discovery as they retrieve surveillance cameras DIVERS have recovered video surveillance equipment from Mike Lynch's Basyesian superyacht that could reveal key details of its sinking. The entrepreneur and dad-of-two, dubbed "Britain's Bill Gates", died alongside his teenage daughter when his superyacht sank off the coast of Sicily on August 19. 7 Billionaire Mike Lynch with his daughter Hannah - both died onboard the yacht Credit: EPA 7 Jonathan and Judy Bloomer died in the sinking of the luxury yacht Bayesian off the coast of Sicily Credit: Enterprise 7 Chris and Neda Morvillo also lost their lives Credit: Getty 7 The £14million superyacht Bayesian - which sank off the coast of Sicily on August 19 Credit: EPA Prosecutors investigating the sinking deployed six elite divers from special forces unit "Comsubin" who have made repeated dives down to the sunken vessel. Divers from the Italian Navy were able to retrieve the surveillance equipment including computers and hard drives. Now they are to be analysed in specialised labs, according to a report. The devices will be examined to see if any data can be revealed, or potentially a video showing how the yacht sank - including whether any doors were left open. This is done by using a hyperbaric chamber. The captain of the doomed Bayesian, James Cutfield, 51, is being investigated for manslaughter....

Children's football coach Juan Cifuentes, 33, and Farooq Abdulrazak, 27, had gone missing while on a business trip to Denmark and Sweden in July. 5 Farooq Abdulrazak, 27, with children's football coach Juan Cifuentes, 33 5 The burnt-out car discovered in Malmo, Sweden 5 Recently-surfaced CCTV showed the two Brit men renting a car in Copenhagen before they vanished The pair's car was discovered in Malmo, and Swedish media reported that at least one of the deceased was shot before the vehicle was set on fire. The man is a known gang member who is thought to have escaped overseas, according to Swedish publication Sydsvenskan. An international manhunt is now underway to find him. content: IRANIAN proxy group the Houthis reportedly hit central Israel with a ballistic missile for the first time today and swore to unleash more strikes. Israel said the rocket - which travelled some 1,270 miles from Yemen in just over 11 minutes - fell in an open area and nobody was hurt. 4 Responders put out a fire in the area of Lod, near Tel Aviv, in central Israel after the missile was fired from Yemen Credit: AFP 4 An Israeli forensic police officer works on pieces of the ballistic missile fired at Israel from Yemen Credit: Alamy 4 A police officer inspects the area around the fire near the crater Credit: AP Houthi military spokesman Yahya Sarea said the group used a new hypersonic ballistic missile in its attack. The rocket landed at around 6.35am local time in central Israel, near Lod just outside major city Tel Aviv. Air raid sirens sounded out across Tel Aviv as residents scrambled for shelter. Loud explosions were heard which the IDF said was caused by air defence systems sending out missile interceptors. Pictures from the scene showed fire and plumes of smoke billowing out... Ellie Doughty

title: If Russia is turning Iran into a nuclear power, the chain reaction could engulf the world far beyond its...
content: THE West fears Iran is on the verge of getting a ­workable nuclear weapon with Russia's help. For many years, Iran has been enriching uranium. It seems to have enough to make a nuclear warhead. 2 Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei has been looking to turn his regime into a super power Credit: AFP 2 Russia's President Vladimir Putin could be the key to Iran unlocking the dangerous power it craves Credit: Reuters But it needs two other things to turn the uranium into a mega-destructive nuclear weapon. We know it has the missiles needed. It would take only one nuclear-armed rocket to get through to wreak havoc. But the most important component of a nuclear weapon is the detonator in the... Mark Almond

title: Inside El Salvador's hellhole prisons where inmates can be jailed without trial & be packed like sardines w...
content: IN El Salvador, a single phone call can get you locked up and packed in an iron-barred cell with murderous gangsters. The country has historically been torn apart by armed violence and over the last two years embarked on aggressive policies to lock up any suspected gang members for life. 10 Gang members are brought together for transfer in the presence of authorities in Tecoluca Credit: AP 10 Gang members brought to jail will be cut off from the outside world Credit: Getty - Contributor 10 Tattooed gang members are made to strip to just white shorts Credit: AFP 10 Most prisoners will never be let out Credit: Getty - Contributor Incredible images show thousands of violent skinhead gangsters from the country's main gangs, MS-13 and Barrio 18, crammed into an inescapable mega-prison. Pictures show rows and rows of prisoners sitting with their hands behind their shaved heads at the high-tech prison. Other images reveal gang members stripped down to only white shorts running through the facility. Meanwhile, prison officers armed with assault rifles are guarding the inmates. Amnesty International's Irene Cuellar spoke to The Sun about El Salvador's state of emergency and the mass incarceration. She said: "Right now, we have the highest incarceration rate in the country - in the world. "In El Salvador, almost 2 per cent of its population are in jail." But Irene explained how among those captive are those who face life behind bars without any proof they were a part of a crime - due...

title: مراسم وداع با پیکر خادم فداکار بجنوردی
content: به گزارش به نقل از روابط عمومی دانشگاه علوم پزشکی خراسان شمالی مراسم وداع با پیکر کربلایی جلال اسدی دوشنبه ساعت ۱۷ عصر در مسجد امام علی ( دانشکده پرستاری مامایی بجنورد برگزار می‌شود. مراسم تشییع پیکر این خادم غیور سه‌شنبه ۲۷ شهریورماه ساعت ۹ صبح از مقابل مسجد انقلاب برگزارمی شود. مرحوم جلال اسدی با نجات جان ۱۵۰ زائر اربعین حسینی در حادثه آتش‌سوزی هتلی در کربلا دچار جراحت و سوختگی شدید شد و جمعه شب پس به رحمت خدا رفت.

title: FC Porto vence Farense e assume 2.o lugar da Liga
content: Galeno inaugurou o marcador aos 48 minutos, de grande penalidade, mas três minutos depois Tomané empatou para os algarvios, com Samu, aos 75, a fazer o golo da vitória do FC Porto. Depois da derrota frente ao Sporting na ronda anterior, os portistas, que se mantêm 100% vitoriosos em casa, conquistaram o quarto triunfo neste campeonato e subiram à vice-liderança, com 12 pontos, menos três do que os ‘leões’, enquanto o Farense continua no último lugar sem qualquer ponto somado.

title: Mundial de Futsal | Argentina marca la goleada de la jornada
creator: Jonathan Tamayac
content: UZBEKISTÁN. Los argentinos se estrenaron con una victoria contudente sobre Ucrania. Este domingo continuó la actividad en el Mundial de Futsal en Uzbekistán, en donde entraron en acción los Grupos C y D respectivamente. Únete a nuestro Canal de WhatsApp y conoce lo mejor de nuestras publicaciones. Haz click AQUÍ La Selección de Argentina marcó la goleada del día al vencer con un sólido 7-1 a Ucrania, y se posicionó en el primer lugar en el Grupo C, mientras que en el Grupo D la Selección de Libia está primero tras su victoria contra Nueva Zelanda. Estos fueron todos los resultados: -Nueva Zelanda 1-3 Libia / Grupo D -España 1-1 Kasajistán / Grupo D -Afganistán 6-4 Angola / Grupo C -Argentina 7-1 Ucrania / Grupo C

title: Senasa tendrá nuevo puesto de control sanitario en el megapuerto de Chancay
creator: Redacción Gestión
content: redacciongestion@diariogestion.com.pe El Ministerio de Desarrollo Agrario y Riego (Midagri) emitió una resolución jefatural , la cual establece la creación de un puesto de control en el terminal portuario multipropósito de Chancay . Esta decisión fue tomada tras la evaluación técnica y legal por parte del Servicio Nacional de Sanidad Agraria (Senasa) y responde a la necesidad de fortalecer el control sanitario y fitosanitario en esta zona estratégica para el comercio internacional . El nuevo puesto de control estará bajo la supervisión de la Dirección Ejecutiva de Senasa y tiene como objetivo central el control de mercancías agrarias que ingresen o salgan del país, así como aquellas que transiten internacionalmente. Este control incluye productos de origen vegetal y animal, así como cualquier insumo agrario que pueda representar un riesgo sanitario o fitosanitario. La creación de este puesto fue fundamentada en una serie de informes técnicos elaborados por diversas áreas de Senasa, que concluyeron la viabilidad y necesidad del control en dicho puerto. El Informe No D000094-2024 de la Dirección de Sanidad Vegetal destacó la importancia de proteger la agricultura y la silvicultura del país, mientras que el Informe No D000045-2024 de la Dirección de Sanidad Animal subrayó la necesidad de salvaguardar la sanidad animal y mantener el estatus sanitario del país. Asimismo, el Informe No D000064-2024 de la Oficina de Planificación y Desarrollo Institucional...

title: Iran, Tajikistan, Uganda, and Finland establish parliamentary friendship group
content: TEHRAN – A parliamentary friendship group representing Iran, Tajikistan, Uganda, and Finland was established during the twelfth session of the Iranian parliament on Sunday. According to ISNA, the formation of this group was marked by the election of its board of directors today. In this election, Fathollah Tavasuli was chosen as the leader of the group, with Mohammad Reza Mohseni Sani and Hossein Abdoli serving as deputies. Parliamentary friendship groups consist of informal assemblies of lawmakers from various countries, aimed at fostering mutual understanding, camaraderie, and collaboration between their nations. The establishment of this group, which includes Iran, Tajikistan, Uganda, and Finland, reflects a commitment to enhancing bilateral relationships and encouraging discussions on shared concerns. These groups provide parliamentarians with a platform to exchange insights, share effective strategies, and explore potential collaborative efforts, thereby strengthening parliamentary relations among the involved countries.

title: Horner: Red Bull to give all vs McLaren in title race
creator: Reuters
content: Red Bull have gone from hunted to hunters in the Formula One constructors' championship and will "throw everything" into regaining the lead from McLaren, team boss Christian Horner said on Sunday. Red Bull have led the championship since 2022 and enjoyed the most dominant season on record last year with 21 wins in 22 races. 's Azerbaijan Grand Prix win and 's fourth place sent McLaren top of the standings, 20 points clear of Red Bull who had crash out while chasing the podium and finish fifth. Triple world champion Verstappen's lead over closest rival Norris was trimmed to 59 points from a previous 62 with seven rounds remaining. Horner said the result was a "big hit" but there was still everything to play for. "Look, we're now not defending, we're chasing. So it changes the dynamic again, and we're just going to throw everything at it," he told reporters. "We've got 20 points as a deficit now, so we've got to attack." Red Bull had looked in much better shape going into the race than at some recent ones, with Pérez and Verstappen starting fourth and sixth respectively while Piastri lined up second and Norris 15th. A crash between Pérez and Ferrari's on the penultimate lap, as well as a strong drive by Norris and good McLaren teamwork, turned everything around and former champions McLaren took over at the top for the first time since 2014. "It's frustrating, particularly after where Lando qualified, that we didn't beat him today but thankfully he hasn't scored big points,"...

title: Arteta: I lost sleep over selection for Spurs win
creator: James Olley
content: Mikel Arteta has admitted 's availability problems led him to lose sleep in the build-up to Sunday's north London derby at but hailed his team's resilience as they secured a vital . ' 64th-minute header settled a tight contest in Arsenal's favour, with Arteta's team now having won three consecutive away league games at Spurs for the first time since 1988. Arsenal were without through suspension in addition to injury absentees , and . Ødegaard and Calafiori picked up injuries on international duty while and were also ruled out. "I didn't enjoy [the preparation] because I didn't sleep much," Arteta said. "I looked ahead to Spurs for four or five days and I had a super clear plan how to do it. "I prepared all the meetings, the training sessions and everything. Then I get the news that we've lost a player, and then another player and then another player, and I had to completely change it and adapt the plan to the players that we had available. So, it was a great challenge. "The second we started to get that news, the team got hungrier and hungrier to play that game. It's a big compliment to everybody at the club to behave in a certain way. It's a tough week coming and instead of finding any excuses we did the opposite. We faced the challenge, played with courage and acknowledged the qualities we had to win the game." which Norway team doctor , ruling him out of Thursday's Champions League trip to and Sunday's visit to champions . However, Arteta insisted after Sunday's game that...

title: Ange defiant on Spurs defending after derby loss
creator: Mark Ogden
content: boss Ange Postecoglou said his team "work on set-pieces all the time" after a header in the second-half decided for and extended the home side's miserable record at defending from free-kicks and corners. Since the start of last season, (23) are the only team still in the to have conceded goals from set-pieces than Spurs (18). Postecoglou has repeatedly rejected claims that his team are vulnerable when defending set-pieces, but after Arsenal took advantage of the latest example of Tottenham's defensive frailty, the former and coach said it is wrong to suggest he doesn't care about the problem. "I know that, for some reason, people think I don't care about set-pieces," Postecoglou told reporters after the game. "I understand the narrative, but we work on them all the time. "We held them [Arsenal] well for the most part, but switched off for one and paid a price. They're obviously a very big threat from set-pieces and it only takes one. "It wasn't just [Cristian] Romero, others switched off too. The delivery was spot on and Gabriel is a threat in those situations. "We paid a price for it, but you learn from that and you move on. It's my burden to carry and I'm fine with that. "For me, it's about the finer details of us getting to where we want to be -- for us, the way forward is to try to turn the football we're playing into something meaningful." Spurs have won just once in the league this season and their recent record under Postecoglou has seen them lose seven and win three...

title: No Rice, no Ødegaard, no problem: Arsenal top Spurs in derby
creator: Mark Ogden and James Olley
content: LONDON -- overcame the absence of key midfielders and to win the North London derby at on Sunday and move into second in the ahead of next week's clash with leaders . Gabriel's 64th-minute header was enough to seal against Ange Postecoglou's team, who are now languishing in 13th position after winning just once in four games so far this season. The Gunners had gone into the game without the suspended Rice and injured Ødegaard at the heart of their midfield, boosting Tottenham's hopes of a first home win against Arsenal since 2022. But and stepped into the void and proved Arsenal have the squad to compete for the title as they produced a gritty and resolute performance to claim victory against their local rivals. While Arsenal hammered out their title credentials, the picture looks less promising for Spurs, however. Postecoglou's team has now lost seven of their past 11 Premier League games, winning just three -- a dismal sequence that will place the former manager under pressure unless he is able to oversee a quick turnaround in results. -- Arsenal's set-piece specialism shines again The first person Mikel Arteta celebrated Gabriel's' 64th-minute goal with was set-piece coach Nicolas Jover -- and for good reason. Jover has revolutionised Arsenal's set-piece record since joining the club from Manchester City in 2021; the Gunners scored 22 goals last season from dead-ball situations, more than any other team. Standing at the corner of the technical area for every set-piece,...

title: Nacho Cano revela que los «chulos de Marlaska» que le detuvieron intentaron ligar con sus becarias
creator: Ana Mellado
content: Asus 61 años y con una prolífica carrera sobre los escenarios, Nacho Cano no se muerde la lengua ni está para tonterías. No le teme a nada ni nadie, y tras su detención (durante diez minutos) por la supuesta contratación ilegal de inmigrantes para su espectáculo musical Malinche , habla más claro que nunca. Ya apuntó directamente a Marlaska en la primera rueda de prensa que concedió después de que saltara el caso a la prensa. Incluso llegó a decir que no le sorprendería terminar «en una cuneta». Y este viernes, en la presentación de la tercera temporada de Malinche, en en el Recinto Ferial IFEMA de Madrid y, ante un patio de butacas lleno, con presencia de Isabel Díaz Ayuso o Victoria de Marichalar , volvió a expresarse con contundencia. Isabel Diaz Ayuso acude a ver el musical 'Malinche' de Nacho Cano GTRES Durante un discurso de 15 minutos, aseguró que los «chulos de Marlaska» que le detuvieron intentaron ligar con sus becarias y amenaza al Gobierno: «Esto no se va a quedar aquí». «Son unos paletos y unos macarras, llevan tiempo sin que nadie les ponga en su sitio». Nacho Cano relató cómo fue su detención y los interrogatorios que realizaron a sus becarios, especialmente a las becarias mexicanas que formaban parte de espectáculo. «Once horas tratando de sacarles a ellas si yo tenía el WhatsApp de alguna, si yo había intentado algo ellas. Ellos sí les pidieron sus WhatsApp y también les han escrito para ligar con ellas», reveló Cano ante el...

title: जिला अस्पताल में खुलेगा जन औषधि केंद्र:बहुत कम कीमत पर मरीजों को मिलेंगी दवाइयां
content: मरीजों को रियायती दाम पर जैनेरिक दवाएं उपलब्ध करवाने के लिए मुरैना जिला अस्पताल में जन औषधि केंद्र खुल रहा है। इसका वर्चुअल उद्घाटन 17 सितंबर को प्रधानमंत्री मोदी के जन्मदिवस पर मुख्यमंत्री डा. मोहन यादव करेंगे। यह जन औषधि केंद्र रेडक्रास सोसायटी द्व इसे लेकर रविवार को रेडक्रास सोसायटी की बैठक हुई, जिसमें सोसायटी के अध्यक्ष डा. ओपी शुक्ला, सचिव अतुल महेश्वरी, प्रदेश प्रबंध समिति सदस्य अरविंद भदौरिया, प्रांतीय प्रतिनिधि भूपसिंह रजक, सत्येंद्र परमार, योगेंद्र सिंह मावई, शशिकांत गोयल, देवेंद्र कुमार शर्मा, दीपक मोदी आदि मौजूद थे। रेडक्रास पदाधिकारियों ने कहा, कि शहर में विभिन्न दवा दुकानों पर महंगी दवा मिलती हैं, जो आम जनमानस के लिए आर्थिक रूप से भारी पड़ती हैं। ऐसे में जन औषधि केंद्र उनके लिए मददगार बनेगा। इस पर दवाइयों की कीमत 50 से 90 फीसद तक कम रहेगी।

title: Wicklow woman Helen Banfield shares her weight loss advice after shedding amazing six stone
creator: website@rsvpmagazine.ie (Erica Carter)
content: A Wicklow woman has shared her inspirational weight loss story as she has dropped an amazing six stone. Helen Banfield first decided to embark on a weight loss journey in order to get healthy enough to ideally donate her kidney to her husband, who is suffering from kidney disease. Helen had struggled with her weight, but when doctors told her that she needed to get healthier and drop some weight in order to potentially donate her kidney, it was the goal she needed. Read more: Roscommon woman Breanne Concannon on the secret to her three and a half stone weight loss Read more: Donegal woman Rachel McFadden shares her top weight loss tips after shedding five stone Speaking to RSVP Live, Helen said: "When we met the transplant doctors, I asked what I needed to do to go forward and give my husband my kidney. They said, 'first of all, you need to lose weight'." Helen decided to join a Slimming World group in Arklow, after seeing the posters around the town. "It took me a little while to get the courage to ring Lorraine, who runs it," said Helen. "She was lovely and welcomed me along to the next class. I went in and I stood on the scales and I have to say I got a shock! I had to lose a lot of weight. I decided that's it now, I'm starting right now on the plan. "No one knew why I was losing weight , I'm a very private person. But the girls in the group were really encouraging me, and eventually I could see the pounds slipping away." As time went on, thanks to the support from her...

title: IND vs BAN Test Series 2024: भारत-बांगलादेश सामन्यावर टांगती तलवार, चाहत्यांनी मालिका रद्द करण्याची केली मागणी; जाणून घ्या कारण
content: मुंबई: भारत आणि बांगलादेश यांच्यात 2 सामन्यांची कसोटी मालिका (IND vs BAN Test Series 2024) होणार आहे. या मालिकेतील पहिला सामना 19 सप्टेंबरपासून चेन्नईच्या एमए चिदंबरम स्टेडियमवर खेळवला जाणार आहे, त्यासाठी टीम इंडियाने (Team India) सरावही सुरू केला आहे. मात्र या सर्व तयारीदरम्यान चाहत्यांनी भारत-बांगलादेश कसोटी मालिका रद्द करण्याची मागणी सुरू केली आहे. त्यामुळे ही मालिका रद्द करण्याची मागणी का होत आहे ते जाणून घेऊया. (हे देखील वाचा: Bangladesh Cricket Team: बांगलादेश क्रिकेट संघावर पैशांचा पाऊस, घरात घूसुन पाकिस्तानला पराभूत केल्याबद्दल मिळाले 'इतके' कोटी रुपये ) बांग्लादेशमध्ये मोठे सत्तापालट तुम्हाला माहितच असेल नुकतेच बांग्लादेशमध्ये मोठे सत्तापालट झाले. आरक्षणाच्या मुद्द्यावरून सुरू असलेल्या आंदोलनादरम्यान माजी पंतप्रधान शेख हसीना यांनी राजीनामा देऊन देश सोडून पळ काढला होता. यानंतर देशात नवीन अंतरिम सरकार स्थापन झाले. सत्तापालट झाल्यापासून हिंदूंवर अत्याचार होत असल्याच्या बातम्या सातत्याने येत आहेत. मीडिया रिपोर्ट्सनुसार, बांगलादेशमध्ये हिंदूंवर मोठ्या प्रमाणात हिंसाचार होत आहे. याशिवाय हिंदूंच्या संपत्तीची लूट केली जात आहे. त्यामुळे बांगलादेशविरुद्धची कसोटी मालिका रद्द करण्याची मागणी चाहते करत आहेत. title: Con un Lamine Yamal encendido, el Barcelona golea al Girona
creator: Gerona, 15 sep (EFE).-
content: El Barcelona goleó este domingo al Girona en Montilivi por un claro 1-4, con un doblete de Lamine Yamal y goles de Dani Olmo y Pedri, para reafirmar el liderato en LaLiga EA Sports y el pleno de triunfos: cinco en cinco jornadas. Lamine Yamal encarriló el duelo con dos tantos en la primera mitad, al aprovechar un grave error de David López a la media hora de juego y con un disparo colocado en el minuto 37. Dani Olmo marcó el 0-3 nada más empezar la segunda mitad con un tiro cruzado y Pedri redondeó la tarde al superar a Paulo Gazzaniga en un uno contra uno, tras recibir una excelente asistencia de Marc Casadó. En el minuto 80, Cristhian Stuani marcó el gol del honor para el Girona, que puso fin a una racha de dos triunfos en LaLiga a tres días de debutar en la Liga de Campeones con una visita al PSG.

title: KRRE po bën analiza për të pasur edhe një orë më shumë tarifë të lirë për energjinë elektrike
content: Deri në fund të këtij muaji KRRE do të kumtojë nëse qytetarët nga 1 janari do të mund të shfrytëzojnë një orë shtesë energji të lirë elektrike. “ Nëse vendoset lista, kjo do jetë nga 1 janari. D.m.th. ne me analizat jemi nga fundi, do të duhet ato analiza t’i prezantojmë para opinionit të ekspertëve dhe kuptohet para kompanive EMV dhe EVN Home. Nëse analizat tregojnë se duhet të pranohet, megjithatë pa i bërë dëm EMV-së dhe EVN Home, do të propozohet që tarifa e tanishme ditore të vlej deri në orën 16 në vend të deri në orën 15 siç është tani ”, tha Marko Bislimovski, kryetar i KRRE. Në periudhën e ardhshme në takimet me ekspertët dhe kompanitë do të diskutohet për vendosjen e orës shtesë të energjisë së lirë elektrike. Analizat e deritanishme janë pozitive, por shqetësim janë çmimet e larta të energjisë elektrike në Europën juglindore nga Hungaria deri në Greqi, që kanë për 2 deri në 3 herë çmime më të larta në orë të caktuar kur ka tregtim më të madh në krahasim e pjesën tjetër të Europës. “ Komuniteti energjetik është zëdhënësi ynë para Komisionit Europian dhe ne kërkojmë një hetim se çfarë ka ndodhur në tregje për të pasur një goditje të tillë çmimi në rajonin tonë. Ajo letër është dërguar para dy-tre javëve edhe me nismë tonë, thanë ministrat e Energjisë së Greqisë, Bullgarisë dhe Rumanisë, ku edhe ata përballen me çmime shumë më të larta si vende...

title: "Kaizen": le film d'Inoxtag sur son ascension de l'Everest a fait 340.000 entrées au cinéma
content: "Kaizen", le film du youtubeur Inoxtag qui revient sur son ascension de l'Everest, a réalisé environ 300.000 entrées en France, sur l'ensemble des séances uniques programmées dans plus de 500 cinémas. Un succès total pour Inoxtag. Ce vendredi 13 septembre, plus de 300.000 spectateurs se sont rendus au cinéma pour voir son film "Kaizen" qui retrace sa préparation puis son ascension du mont Everest. Le film a été diffusé en séance unique avant sa mise en ligne sur Youtube le lendemain. Le film a réalisé 300.000 entrées en France et environ 40.000 à l'étranger, dans dix pays comme la Suisse, la Belgique et le Luxembourg, où le film était aussi diffusé. Seuls "Vice-Versa 2" et "Moi, Moche et Méchant 4" ont accueilli plus de spectateurs lors de leur sortie au cinéma, cette année en France. >>> Plus d'informations àvenir sur BFMTV.com

title: Tylko trzy pytania! Poradzisz sobie z tym najtrudniejszym testem na inteligencję?
content: Natalia Jabłońska Trzy pytania. Tyle wystarczy, aby określić iloraz inteligencji badanej osoby. I jak się okazuje, wyniki potrafią mocno zaskoczyć. Aż 83 proc. osób, które podejmują się go rozwiązać, ponosi niestety klęskę. Krótki test na inteligencję z pewnością spodoba się osobom, które chciałby zbadać zdolności swojego mózgu, ale nie mają czasu, by wypełniać składające się z kilkudziesięciu i więcej pytań jednego ze standardowych sprawdzianów IQ. Tutaj czekają na nas zaledwie trzy matematyczne pytania, ale wcale nie oznacza to, że będzie to łatwa przeprawa. Spis treści: Czym jest test CRT? Test CRT: pytania Test CRT: odpowiedzi Czym jest test CRT? W skrócie zwany testem CRT, Cognitive Reflection Test został stworzony w 2005 roku. Po polsku nazywany jest Testem Kognitywnego Myślenia. Jego autorem jest Shane Frederick, psycholog pracujący na uniwersytecie w Princeton. W pracy nad CRT przyświecała mu idea zbadania racjonalnego i logicznego myślenia z równoczesnym wykluczeniem często błędnie podpowiadającej nam intuicji. Jego wyniki nie dadzą nam odpowiedzi na pytanie o dokładny poziom naszej inteligencji, ale ponoć potrafi wyłowić osoby genialne z tych, które do niego przystępują. Jedynie 17 proc. osób w nim uczestniczących - także studentów elitarnych uczelni - uzyskało pełną poprawność. J eśli macie ochotę do niego przystąpić, poniżej przedstawiamy pytania i odpowiedzi. Zobacz również: Ułożysz słowa z...

title: UŽIVO/VIDEO: Osijek vodi, ali je doživio težak udarac. Malenica briljira na golu
content: OSIJEK : Malenica - Tuia, Jelenić 🟨, Hasić, Jurišić (od 48. Cvijanović) - Jugović, Dantas - Bukvić (od 49. Hernani), Pušić ⚽, Matković - Jakupović SLAVEN BELUPO : Sušak - Grgić 🟨, Božić, Kovačić, Lučić - Agbekpornu, Crepulja - Dolček, Caimacov 🟨 (od 65. Butić), Šakota (od 65. Murić) - Nestorovski POGODAK POGLEDAJTE OVDJE 62. Mogli su Farmaceuti ugroziti Osijek, Lučić je ubacio s lijeve strane, ali nije bilo precizno, lopta je otišla van igre. 59. 🟨 Zbog povlačenja Šakote Hasić će dobiti žuti karton. 54. Ubacio je Lučić visoko s lijevog krila, a Nestorovski je pucao glavom preko gola. 53. Susret je nakratko bio prekinut jer je Matković ostao bez zraka, ali sve će biti u redu s njim. 48. ⇔ Izašao je van, a mijenja ga Ivan Cvijanović. Također je izašao Bukvić, a ušao Hernani. 47. Problemi za Osijek... Roko Jurišić ostao je ležati na travi, signalizirao je da ne može nastaviti susret! 46. 🕖 Počeo je drugi dio. Osijek vodi nakon prvih 45 minuta, Pušić je zabio u 14. minuti. Ipak, ono što treba izdvojiti u ovom poluvremenu jest zadnjih pet minuta kada je Slaven Belupo imao nekoliko sjajnih prilika da izjednači, ali Malenica je sjajan na vratima domaćih. Nadamo se da je ovo uvertira u sjajno drugo poluvrijeme. 45+2. Skoro je Osijek zabio još jedan pogodak! Nakon udarca iz kuta u skoku je loptu zahvatio Jelenić, ali ide malo preko vrata. Sudac je nakon toga označio kraj prvog dijela. 45. Malenica još jednom čupa! Sada je pucao...

title: MOUZ сенсационно покинули ESL Pro League Season 20 на 16-20 месте
content: 14 сентября на турнире ESL Pro League Season 20 состоялся матч между MOUZ и Complexity . Complexity одолели соперника со счетом 2:0. Встреча проходила в формате bo3 (best of 3). Первой картой противостояния был выбор Complexity – Vertigo. На своем выборе американская организация не почувствовала оппонента и спокойно выиграла у «мышат» со счетом 13:8. Вторым был уже выбор MOUZ – Ancient. Свой выбор казалось бы должен уйти в копилку «мышек», однако на счете 10:7 в пользу MOUZ они посыпались и Complexity забрали 7 безответных раундов подряд. Как итог, американская организация прошла в 1/8 финала турнира. В свою очередь MOUZ, которые выиграли турниры ESL Pro League Season 18 и ESL Pro League Season 19 покинули турнир с 16-20 места. Статистика матча

title: Bolje i poštrcati koji put više nego platiti 10 puta skuplje: pitali smo žene kakva su im iskustva sa Zarinim parfemima
content: Osim što u njoj rado kupimo koji odjevni komad, Zaru nerijetko spominjemo u kontekstu parfema. Mnoge žene njima se okreću zbog vrlo povoljne cijene, a nisku cijenu često prati iznenađujuće dobra kvaliteta. U Zari se može pronaći jeftinija alternativa za dizajnerske i niche parfeme koji koštaju na stotine eura. Ljubiteljica ste Diorova Hypnotic Poisona, koji u parfumerijama košta stotinjak eura? U Zari možete pronaći parfem Hypnotic Vanilla Bloom koji na njega neodoljivo podsjeća, a košta petnaestak eura. Nije to jedini Zarin parfem koji, više ili manje uspješno, imitira neki popularni parfem. Želite jeftinu verziju legendarnog Baccarat Rouge 540? Zara nudi Red Temptation. Ne možete si priuštiti Killianov Angel‘s Share? Zara ima svoj Nocturnal Life. Uglavnom, shvatili ste, velika je vjerojatnost da u Zari možete pronaći "dupe" svog omiljenog (i skupog) parfema.

title: Novak Đoković nasmijao pratitelje, zaplesao je grčki ples na traci za trčanje
content: U DAVIS ogledu Srbija je jučer povela 2:0 protiv Grčke u Beogradu, a taj drugi bod donio je Novak Đoković pobijedivši Grka Ioannisa Xilasa 6:0, 6:1. Prije odigranog meča Novak je nasmijao sve svoje pratitelje na društvenim mrežama objavivši video u kojem je pokazao kako se priprema za meč. "Smiješan način kako se pripremiti na mečeve protiv Grčke", napisao je u opisu svog TikTok videa, koji je za samo jedan dan skupio više od 655 tisuća pregleda. Naime, dok je bio u teretani, Đoković je na traci za trčanje zaplesao grčki poznati ples – sirtaki. U komentarima su mu se, osim Srba i ljudi iz susjednih zemalja, javili i Grci. "Obožavamo te u Grčkoj. Uvijek si dobrodošao", "Veliki pozdrav šaljemo ti iz Grčke", "Dođi ovdje da zaplešemo", nizali su se komentari. "Već vidim da bi se mogao baviti plesom kad ode u mirovinu", našalio se netko. Njegove fotografije iz New Yorka postale su hit na internetu Krajem kolovoza, Novakove fotografije iz New Yorka postale su pravi hit na internetu. Fotografi su tenisača snimili dok se odmarao uz jezero u Central Parku. No čini se da je imao malih poteškoća sa - signalom na mobitelu. Šetao je parkom i u ruci držao mobitel te ga dizao u zrak i gledao ne bi li pronašao signal. Strani mediji pišu da je tenisač djelovao zbunjeno, no mnogima su se ove scene učinile simpatičnim.

title: Man admits to threatening ex after finding disparaging messages on her phone
creator: Jessica Arena
content: A 34-year-old man admitted to threatening his ex partner and a friend of hers after finding they had exchanged disparaging messages about him. The man, a driver from Żurrieq, was arraigned in front of Magistrate Victor Axiaq on Sunday, charged with threatening and insulting his former girlfriend and a friend of hers. It emerged the former couple had something of a turbulent on-and-off relationship but had been on speaking terms until recently. That was until he discovered the messages his former partner had sent to her friend about him, which he said hurt his feelings and caused him to react. Defense lawyer Franco Debono said that the man had admitted his guilt immediately and fully cooperated with the police and had shown remorse for his actions. The man told the police that he never had any intention of harming her and had no intention of contacting her further. When the punishment of a conditional discharge was suggested by the defense, prosecuting inspector Sherona Buhagiar agreed this would be appropriate. He was conditionally discharged for two years. Lawyer Franco Debono appears for the accused while police inspector Sherona Buhagiar prosecuted. You can unsubscribe at any time by clicking the link in the footer of our emails. title: Mash назвал вещество, предположительно, найденное у актера Евгения Ткачука
content: По информации канала, вещество "с характерным запахом" нашли у актера во время прохождения предполетного досмотра. В управлении на транспорте МВД по Северо-западному федеральному округу рассказали РИА Новости, что после досмотра в Пулково был задержан мужчина 1984 года рождения. У него нашли " вещество неизвестного происхождения " Как отметили в пресс-службе управления, указанное вещество отправили на экспертизу, проводится проверка. В пресс-службе оператора аэропорта подтвердили РИА Новости данную информацию, отметив, что фамилия, имя и отчество задержанного совпадают с данными актера Евгения Ткачука. Указанный МВД год рождения мужчины также совпадает с годом рождения актера, пишет РИА Новости. Ранее Telegram-канал SHOT написал о задержании в Пулково актера Евгения Ткачука, известного по сериалу "Король и Шут" и другим работам. Как утверждает SHOT, сегодня утром у 40-летнего актера во время досмотра обнаружили, предположительно, " сверток с неизвестным веществом " и курительную трубку. Евгений Ткачук является выпускником ГИТИСа. В сериале "Король и Шут" сыграл Шута. Его фильмография насчитывает около 80 проектов. Учредитель ФГБУ «Редакция «Российской газеты» Главный редактор В.А. title: الوزراء مكاري والقرم وبوشكيان: لإعادة درس السماح بتسجيل التلامذة السوريين
creator: tayyar.org
content: تمنّى وزراء الاعلام والاتصالات والصناعة في حكومة تصريف الأعمال زياد المكاري، وجوني القرم وجورج بوشكيان على الأمانة العامة لمجلس الوزراء إعادة إدراج بند السماح للسوريين غير الحاصلين على إقامة او بطاقة من المفوضية العليا لشؤون اللاجئين، بالتسجيل في لبنان للعام الدراسيّ 2024-2025. وطالبوا، في بيان، بإعادة درسه بتمعّن وتروٍّ، “إذ إنه أقرّ من خارج جدول اعمال الجلسة الأخيرة ولم يُشبع درسا”. وقالوا: “نظرًا إلى دقة الملف، وتلافيًا لاستعماله وقودًا في معارك الشحن السياسيّ، نهيب بالأفرقاء جميعهم، مقاربته من باب المصلحتين الوطنية والإنسانية معًا، بعيدًا من البازارات السياسية والشعبوية.” وأضافوا: “نستغرب سماع أصوات معترضة لطالما صمتت منذ عشر سنوات كان القرار نافذا خلالها ولم ينبرِ أحد لتسجيل موقف يومها، كنا نتمى توجيه سهام الانتقاد إلى المنظمات والجمعيات التي تغدق المال على النازحين السوريين، بما يشجعهم على البقاء في لبنان.”

title: Ekrem Açıkel Halk TV'de açıkladı: Türkiye'de en güvenilir kurumlar hangileri?
content: ASAL Araştırma , Türkiye'de vatandaşların kurumlara olan güvenini araştırdı. Araştırma sonucu dikkat çeken sonuçları ortaya çıkardı. Yapılan araştırmaya göre Türkiye'de vatandaşların en çok güvendiği kurum yüzde 19,7 ile Ordu olurken, en çok güvenilmeyen kurum ise yüzde 0,9 Medya oldu. Araştırma sonuçlarını Halk TV sunucusu Ekrem Açıkel açıkladı. VATANDAŞLARIN EN ÇOK GÜVENDİĞİ KURUMLAR Güvenin tüm iyi ilişkilerin temeli olduğunu belirten Ekrem Açıkel, ASAL Araşırmanın 17 ile 27 Ağustos tarihleri arasında 2 bin kişinin katılımı ile gerçekleştirdiği anketin sonuçlarını paylaştı. Vatandaşlara Türkiye'de en güvendiğiniz kurum hangisi diye sorulduğunu kaydeden Açıkel, ordunun vatandaşların gönlündeki sarsılmaz yerini koruduğunu ifade etti. İşte dikkat çeken araştırmanın sonuçları: Ordu: Yüzde 19,7 Polis: Yüzde 16,5 Cumhurbaşkanlığı: Yüzde 11,1 TBMM : Yüzde 10,2 Bankalar: Yüzde 4,2 ÖSYM : Yüzde 4,0 YSK: Yüzde 3,5 Belediyeler: Yüzde 2,9 Diyanet : Yüzde 2 Yargı : Yüzde 1,4 Politikacılar: Yüzde 1 Medya: Yüzde 0,9 Araştırmada ayrıca vatandaşların söz konusu kurumların hepsine güvenip güvenmediği soruldu. Vatandaşlar bu soruya ise yüzde 4,4 ile "hepsine güveniyorum" derken, yüzde 18,2 'lik bir kesim ise " hiçbirisine güvenmiyorum" yanıtını verdi.

title: Unwetter in Europa: Niederösterreichischer Stausee droht überzulaufen – Politiker fordern mehr Klimaschutz
content: Dramatische Lage in den Hochwassergebieten in Polen, Tschechien, Österreich und Rumänien: Sintflutartiger Regen hat am Wochenende ganze Landstriche unter Wasser gesetzt, mindestens sieben Menschen kamen bis Sonntag in den Fluten ums Leben. Tausende Menschen mussten in den Regionen evakuiert werden, Hunderttausende waren ohne Strom, Straßen und Zugstrecken mussten gesperrt werden. In Deutschland war die Lage vergleichsweise entspannt, die Pegel in Dresden stiegen aber. Ein Überblick: Polen: Regierungschef Donald Tusk bestätigt, das ein Mann in der Region Klodzko an der polnisch-tschechischen Grenze ertrunken ist. Im Südwesten hat das Hochwasser des Flusses Biala die Wälle und Dämme in den Städten Glucholazy und Ladek Zdroj überflutet . Tausende Menschen mussten evakuiert werden. Die Behörden riefen die Armee zu Hilfe. Der Zugverkehr zwischen Polen und Tschechien wurde laut Nachrichtenagentur PAP eingestellt . Ein Staudamm im niederslesischen Stronie Slaskie ist gebrochen . Tschechien: Vier Menschen wurden bisher von den Fluten weggerissen und gelten als vermisst . Im Nordosten des Landes wurde ein großer Teil der Stadt Opava wegen Hochwassers evakuiert . Im Süden des Landes lief ein Staudamm über und überflutete die Städte und Dörfer der Umgebung. In der slowakischen Hauptstadt Bratislava gilt der Notstand . Rumänien: Bisher zählt das Land fünf Todesopfer. In der Region Galati im Südosten des Landes sind laut Innenministerium 15.000 Menschen vom Hochwasser...

title: Sofyan Amrabat'tan Galatasaray derbisi açıklaması
content: 15 Eylül 2024 19:47 Fenerbahçe'nin Kasımpaşa'yı 2-0 yendiği maçta oyuna sonradan dahil olan yeni transfer Sofyan Amrabat, maçın ardından açıklamalarda bulundu. "Zor bir takıma karşı oynadık" Amrabat, yaptığı açıklamada "Geleli çok zaman olmadı, takımla birlikte ilk 3 antrenmana çıktım. Bugün de sahadaydım. Bana göre güçlü, zor bir takıma karşı oynadık. Taraftarlar, kendi evimizde oynuyormuş atmosferi yarattı. Isınmadan maç sonuna kadar hiçbir şekilde susmadılar. Galibiyetten dolayı mutluyuz. Umarım onları mutlu etmeye devam ederiz." dedi. Galatasaray derbisi açıklanması Galatasaray derbisi ile ilgili de konuşan Faslı futbolcu, "Bu derbiyle ilgili çok şey duydum. Konsantrasyonu yüksek, güçlü bir maç olacağını düşünüyorum. Amacımız sahada güzel bir oyun ortaya koymak ve taraftarımızı mutlu edecek sonuç almak. Sabırsızlanıyoruz bu maç için." ifadelerini kullandı. "Kendimi fit hissediyorum" Kendi ile ilgili değerlendirme de yapan Amrabat, "Fiziksel anlamda fit olduğumu söyleyebilirim. Takıma henüz geldim, elbette adaptasyon için bir süre gerekecek. Bu normal ama Fiorentina ve milli takımda maç oynadım. Kendimi fit hissediyorum." sözlerini sarf etti.

title: Liveblog zur US-Wahl 2024: J.D. Vance verteidigt verbale Attacken gegen Einwanderer
Bil kjørt på havet – en person omkom
creator: Sondre Skjelvik
content: Søndag ettermiddag meldte politiet i Nordland om en ulykke på Stokmarknes. – Personbil har kjørt ut i havet, opplyste de rundt klokken 17:30. – Lokalt brannvesen med dykkere fikk fører ut av bilen. Det ble iverksatt livreddende førstehjelp på stedet, men dessverre sto livet til vedkommende ikke til å redde, sier o perasjonsleder May-Wenche Hansen Pårørende er varslet. Utrykningskjøretøy er på stedet. Hansen påpeker at det trolig ikke var flere personer i bilen. – Politiet jobber med å finne ut av årsaken til at bilen kjørte ut i havet, opplyser operasjonslederen.

title: ترکیب احتمالی استقلال مقابل الغرافه؛ در انتظار سورپرایز مهم نکونام
content: به گزارش یکشنبه شب ، تیم فوتبال استقلال ایران در چارچوب هفته اول رقابت‌های لیگ نخبگان آسیا، فردا دوشنبه شب از ساعت ۲۱:۳۰ دقیقه در ورزشگاه شهدای شهر قدس مقابل الغرافه قطر قرار می‌گیرد. هر دو تیم شرایط خوبی در لیگ‌های کشور خود ندارند. الغرافه تا به اینجا کار در این فصل از رقابت‌های لیگ ستارگان قطر اصلا شرایط خوبی نداشته است. نماینده قطر موفق شد در دیدار پلی‌آف با نتیجه یک بر صفر شباب الاهلی امارات را مغلوب کند و جواز حضور در این رقابت‌ها را کسب کند. الغرافه در آخرین دیدار خود مقابل الشمال در خانه با تساوی یک بر یک متوقف شد و اکنون با ۵ امتیاز در رتبه ششم لیگ ستارگان قطر قرار دارد. این تیم در ۴ بازی ابتدایی لیگ ستارگان قطر فقط یک برد به دست آورده است. در مقابل استقلال نایب قهرمان فصل گذشته لیگ برتر ایران نیز اصلا شرایط خوبی را در این فصل تجربه نمی‌کند و بعد از شکست مقابل استقلال خوزستان در هفته‌های اخیر درگیر حواشی زیادی شده بود. آبی‌پوشان پایتخت از ۳ بازی خود در لیگ برتر تنها موفق به کسب چهار امتیاز شده‌اند و در رتبه دهم جدول قرار گرفته‌اند. این دو تیم تنها دوبار در فصل ۲۰۲۰ رقابت‌های لیگ قهرمانان آسیا در مرحله گروهی مقابل یکدیگر قرار گرفتند. استقلال ایران، الغرافه قطر، الاهلی عربستان والجزیره امارات در این گروه قرار داشتند. بازی رفت دو تیم در ورزشگاه آزادی با برتری ۳ بر صفر استقلال به پایان رسید، برای آبی‌پوشان در ان دیدار فرهاد مجیدی(۲) و پژمان منتظری گلزنی کردند. دیدار برگشت دو تیم نیز با تساوی یک بر یک به پایان رسید، تک گل الغرافه را ابتدا یونس محمود به ثمر رساند و سپس سیدمهدی سیدصالحی گل تساوی را وارد دروازه زردپوشان قطری کرد. برخلاف الغرافه که ۲ بازیکن خود را به...

title: Heartbreak for Rory McIlroy as Rasmus Hojgaard wins Irish Open
content: McIlroy looked on course to claim his first professional win on home soil when he led by two shots with four holes to play at Royal County Down, just an hour from where he grew up. But while Hojgaard completed a superb closing 65 with four birdies in the last five holes, McIlroy crucially bogeyed the 17th and then agonisingly missed an eagle putt on the 18th which would have forced a play-off. McIlroy, who missed out on a first major since 2014 when he bogeyed three of the last four holes in the US Open in June, took a one-shot lead into the final round and made the ideal start with birdies on the first and second. With playing partner Matteo Manassero then dropping shots on the third and fourth, McIlroy briefly enjoyed a four-shot lead before making a bogey on the seventh after failing to get up and down from left of the green. McIlroy then missed from inside 10 feet for birdie on both the eighth and the ninth as Hojgaard kickstarted his challenge with an outrageous chip-in for birdie on the 10th. A birdie on the 11th edged McIlroy two in front again, but that advantage was wiped out as Hojgaard birdied the 16th and McIlroy bogeyed the 15th. Hojgaard then dramatically holed out from a greenside bunker on the 17th and although McIlroy drew level with a birdie on the 16th, the four-time major winner charged his birdie putt on the 17th past the hole and missed the return. Hojgaard’s third birdie in a row on the 18th meant McIlroy needed to make an eagle on the same hole to...

title: عصيدة «الزقوقو».. وصفة تونسية فريدة للاحتفاء بالمولد
creator: العين الإخبارية
content: رغم الظروف الاقتصادية الصعبة للتونسيين وغلاء الأسعار الا أن عادة إعداد عصيدة الزقوقو للاحتفال بذكرى المولد النبوي الشريف لا تغيب عن أغلب البيوت التونسية. ويتميز إحياء ذكرى المولد النبوي الشريف في تونس باحتفالات وتقاليد تتوارثها العائلات جيلا بعد جيل ولعل أبرزها إعداد عصيدة "الزقوقو". وتقدم العصيدة صبيحة ذكرى المولد، وتقوم العائلات بتبادل الزيارات وتبادل صحاف "عصيدة الزقوقو". وعصيدة الزقوقو هي مزيج من حبات نبات "الصنوبر الحلبي" المطحونة حيث تخلط بالطحين والسكر، وتطهى على نار هادئة، وتحرك باستمرار إلى أن تتخثر، وبعد ذلك يتم سكبها في أوان صغيرة إلى النصف، ويملأ النصف الثاني بـ"الكريمة" وهي خليط من الحليب والبيض والسكر والنشا. ثم تزيّن بالفواكه الجافة واللوز والفستق والجوز والحلوى، كل حسب إمكانياته. وبسبب الإقبال الكثيف على الزقوقو، يشهد سعر كيلوغرام “الزقوقو” سنويًّا، ارتفاعًا ملحوظًا، ليبلغ هذه السنة ستين دينارًا (نحو 20 دولارًا)، وبإضافة سعر الفواكه المجففة، ولوازم التزيين، فإن كلفة “عصيدة الزقوقو” تتجاوز 200 دينارًا (70 دولارًا). من جهته، أكد رئيس المنظمة التونسية لإرشاد المستهلك (مستقلة) لطفي الرياحي تسجيل ارتفاع في أسعار أغلب المواد مقارنة بالسنة الماضية. وأكد الرياحي لـ"العين الإخبارية" أن سعر الكيلوغرام الواحد ارتفع بين 2023 و2024، من 30 دينارا (10 دولارات) إلى 56-60 دينارا، كما ارتفع سعر اللوز من 36 دينارا إلى 39 دينارا، والبندق من 41 دينارا إلى 50 دينارا، والفستق من 90 دينارا إلى 97 دينارا والصنوبر من 180 دينارا إلى 190 دينارا. وبيّن أن التكلفة لإعداد 2 كيلوغرام من الزقوقو لفائدة عائلة متكونة من 6 أفراد ارتفع من 180-200 دينار إلى...

title: Νέα «έκρηξη» Τραμπ κατά της Τέιλορ Σουίφτ - «Τη μισώ» έγραψε στο Truth Social
creator: Ανδρεας Μορφοπουλος
content: Ο Ντόναλντ Τραμπ πέρασε για πολλοστή φορά τα όρια. «Μισώ την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ », έγραψε ο υποψήφιος πρόεδρος των ΗΠΑ στις εκλογές του Νοεμβρίου στον λογαριασμό του στην πλατφόρμα του Truth Social. Μετά τη στήριξή της στην Κάμαλα Χάρις, η Τέιλορ Σουίφτ «προκάλεσε» αυτή τη φορά την οργή του Ντόναλντ Τραμπ, πενήντα ημέρες πριν τις προεδρικές εκλογές των ΗΠΑ. Ο Ντόναλντ Τραμπ «ξέφυγε» την Κυριακή (15.09.2024), γράφοντας ότι «μισεί» την Τέιλορ Σουίφτ, λίγα 24ωρα αφότου η διάσημη τραγουδίστρια ανακοίνωσε τη στήριξή της στην αντίπαλό του, την Κάμαλα Χάρις . Η Σουίφτ ανακοίνωσε τη στήριξή της στη Χάρις μετά το debate στο ABC στις 10 Σεπτεμβρίου ενόψει της μονομαχίας στις κάλπες του Νοεμβρίου. «ΜΙΣΩ ΤΗΝ ΤΑΪΛΟΡ ΣΟΥΙΦΤ!», έγραψε ο Τραμπ στην πλατφόρμα του Truth Social. «Πρόσφατα ενημερώθηκα ότι με τη χρήση τεχνητής νοημοσύνης φαίνεται να υποστηρίζω ψευδώς τον Ντόναλντ Τραμπ. Πραγματικά άρχισα να φοβάμαι για την τεχνητή νοημοσύνη και τους κινδύνους διάδοσης της παραπληροφόρησης», έγραψε η Σουίφτ στο Instagram. «Με οδήγησε στο συμπέρασμα ότι πρέπει να είμαι πολύ διαφανής σχετικά με τα πραγματικά μου σχέδια για αυτές τις εκλογές ως ψηφοφόρος», συνέχισε η Σουίφτ. «Ο απλούστερος τρόπος για την καταπολέμηση της παραπληροφόρησης είναι η αλήθεια. Θα ψηφίσω για την Κάμαλα Χάρις και τον Τιμ Γουόλς στις προεδρικές εκλογές του 2024». A post shared by Taylor Swift (@taylorswift) Ερωτηθείς...

title: Больше сотни создателей сувениров стали участниками конкурса в Заполярье
content: Победителей и призеров конкурса «Сувенир года. Арктика» наградили в Заполярье. Об этом сообщается в официальной группе регионального комитета по туризму в социальной сети «ВКонтакте». Церемония награждения прошла в Мурманской областной научной библиотеке в рамках проведения профильного семинара «Туристический сувенир – память о регионе». Участниками семинара стали более 50 мастеров из Мурманска, Кировска, Апатитов, Североморска, Ковдора и других муниципалитетов Заполярья. Они смогли обсудить волнующие вопросы с экспертами из Центра кластерного развития и Центра поддержки предпринимательства региона. Всего в конкурсе сувениров в 2024 году приняли участие 108 мастеров, они подали 129 заявок. Конкурсная комиссия определила 12 победителей в четырех номинациях: «Арктический сувенир», «Этнический сувенир», «Экологический сувенир», «Гастрономический сувенир». Еще 14 призеров получили поощрение в специальных номинациях. Напомним, региональный конкурс сувениров проводится с 2022 года. За три года в нем приняли участие 248 производителей сувениров. Ранее «МК в Мурманске» подробно писал о лучших работах конкурса.

title: Latest satellite launch defied anti-Iran sanctions: foreign ministry
content: TEHRAN – Iran's Foreign Ministry Spokesperson Nasser Kanaani has hailed the successful launch of the "Chamran 1" research satellite as a clear defiance of international sanctions. The satellite, now in a 550-kilometer orbit, was launched by the domestically-developed Qaem 100 carrier on Saturday. In a message on X, Kanaani expressed pride in the achievement, particularly recognizing the contributions of Iranian scientists and scholars. He declared, "Once again, those who impose irrational sanctions have received a definitive answer to their unreasonable actions." Kanaani further emphasized Iran's role as a "rational, strong, and constructive player on the global stage," urging Western nations to reconsider their policies. In separate remarks on Sunday, General Amir Rastegari, an official from the Iranian Defense Ministry and Managing Director of Iran Electronics Industries, confirmed the successful stabilization of the Chamran 1 satellite in its designated orbit. "This domestically manufactured satellite, weighing 60 kg, was successfully positioned in an orbit of 550 km on Saturday morning," Rastegari said, highlighting the satellite's unique capability. "Chamran 1 is the first Iranian-developed spacecraft capable of altering its orbit post-launch," he explained. "Previous satellites we launched primarily focused on imaging and telecommunications, and once they were placed in orbit, we lacked the ability to adjust their orbits as we did not possess orbital maneuvering...

title: Até onde vai o segredo de justiça?
creator: Frederico Pedreira
content: Uma comissão parlamentar de inquérito aprovou um requerimento do PSD para clarificar o conceito de segredo de justiça. Este pedido surgiu no seguimento no caso das gémeas luso-brasileiras, depois de Nuno Rebelo de Sousa ter recusado prestar esclarecimentos. Por ter alertado que iria exercer o seu direito ao silêncio antes da audição, o arguido no processo fez “disparar” o alarme: afinal o que é o segredo de justiça? Será necessário a sua clarificação? Rui Costa Pereira, associado coordenador da área de Penal e Contraordenacional da MFA Legal, é perentório: nada carece de “qualquer espécie” de clarificação, face ao que está consagrado no regime dos inquéritos parlamentares e na lei processual penal. “Todas as dúvidas que a comissão tem invocado seriam talvez evitadas se se tivesse acolhido aquela que terá sido a sugestão do presidente da Assembleia da República, a suspensão dos trabalhos da comissão até à conclusão da investigação criminal em curso, conforme, aliás, o regime dos inquéritos parlamentares prevê como possível”, aponta o advogado. Para Rui Costa Pereira, ao invés de ponderar alterações legislativas, talvez se justificasse mais fazer com que essa suspensão fosse obrigatória, ao invés de uma mera possibilidade. “ Com o inquérito criminal encerrado, já não haveria qualquer segredo de justiça a invocar, poderíamos até já nem ter arguidos constituídos que pudessem invocar direitos processuais, nomeadamente ao...

title: Gyopáros Alpár: Készülünk és ha kell, megyünk a gátra a Rábán és a Marcalon is
content: Gyopáros Alpár hozzátette, a Rábán és a Marcalon jelenleg harmadfokú készültség van érvényben. Ha szükséges, akár a Dunánál, akár a Lajtánál, akár a Rábaközben beavatkozni, akkor készülünk és megyünk, ahogy 2013-ban is ott voltunk a gáton - hangsúlyozta a politikus.

title: СМИ узнали о "заштатной армии" Украины из тысяч военных
creator: Газета.Ru
content: СМИ узнали о «заштатной армии» Украины из тысяч военных На фоне жесткой нехватки личного состава в Вооруженных силах Украины (ВСУ), в республике находятся тысячи военных, которые как бы есть, но в действительности их «нет», пишет «Страна.ua». Газета уточняет, что речь идет о «выведенных за штат» солдатах: их нет в кадровых списках подразделений, вместо зарплаты они получают около 500-600 гривен (1,1–1,3 тыс. руб.) «за звание». Эти военные не служат, но не уволены из ВСУ и поэтому не могут официально устроиться на работу. Согласно публикации, для выведения за штат у минобороны может быть 20 причин, в том числе ранения на фронте, травмы, уход в самоволку, пьянство, хулиганство, употребление наркотиков, отказ проходить военную службу и заведение уголовного производства. По словам капитана ВСУ Богдана Д., во многих подразделениях есть так называемые резервные роты, в которых содержатся «заштатники». Их дальнейшая судьба зависит от ценности специалиста для армии. При этом, как отмечает издание, самое проблемное положение при выведении за штат у наиболее возрастных военных, которые по состоянию здоровья не могут служить. Ранее была названа страна, куда украинские призывники стали чаще сбегать.

title: Asesinaron en Santa Marta a expolicia
creator: Yeinnis Hincapie
content: Un sicario acabó con la vida de un hombre a bala en el perímetro urbano de Santa Marta. Las autoridades informaron que la víctima sería Ever Guarnizo, un exagente de la Policía Nacional retirado, y que actualmente se ganaba la vida comercializando lechona y tamales en su vivienda. El crimen se presentó a las afueras de su lugar de residencia ubicado en la calle 21 con carrera 24 del barrio 7 de Agosto. Fue en ese momento cuando desconocidos aprovecharon que se encontraba sentado conversando y sin mediar palabra abrieron fuego contra él. Testigos y familiares trasladaron a Guarnizo de inmediato a la urgencia de la Clínica Gestión Salud, donde lamentablemente se confirmó su deceso minutos después de su llegada. Personal del Laboratorio Móvil de Criminalística de la Policía Judicial realiza la inspección a cadáver. De igual manera, investigadores iniciaron las labores para establecer los móviles del crimen.
