SPRINGFIELD, Ohio (AP) — For many Haitian immigrants, Sunday mornings in Springfield, Ohio, are spent joyfully worshipping God as they sing and pray in their native Creole. This Sunday, they needed that uplifting balm more than ever. Their community is reeling — confused, frustrated, hurt — from false accusations that they are eating their neighbor’s cats and dogs. The now viral and highly politicized rumors are being fueled by former President Donald Trump, his running mate JD Vance and others, and violent threats against the community are upending daily life in their city. “Jesus is with us in truth, and the truth is that Haitians are not eating pets and geese in Springfield,” said the Rev. Carl Ruby, preaching at Central Christian Church. He invited community members to join his congregation in prayer and peaceful protest of the false rumors leveled against...

title: Barcelona consigue su quinto triunfo al hilo tras baile al Girona
creator: Agencias
content: El Barcelona no para, no se detiene, no afloja y sigue corriendo, peleando, presionando, combinando... Y goleando. Esta vez fue en Montilivi, cuatro meses después de sufrir una remontada humillante que sentenció la Liga (y a Xavi), devolviéndole la bofetada a un Girona impotente. Le metió un incontestable 1-4 que pudo ser aún más duro y amplio en el marcador. Pero demostró que futbolísticamente disfruta de un momento inmejorable. Cinco de cinco, 15 puntos en el mejor inicio liguero desde 2017 y, lo más positivo, ofreciendo una imagen por momentos monumental y de principio a fin incontestable. El Barça, bestial, sigue siendo, de momento, intocable. ¿Cómo volverá del parón? se preguntaba un entorno azulgrana que sigue pellizcándose para convencerse de que todo esto es real. No era, en tiempos pasados, extraño que el parón de selecciones le pasara factura al Barça. Esta vez, al contrario, descubrió un equipo desbocado y con un hambre olvidada en el tiempo. Flick tiene entre sus mandamientos uno fundamental: empezar a tope, seguir a tope y acabar a tope. Revolucionados y sin regatear esfuerzos. La intensidad como arma principal. Y el Girona fue barrido sin más remedio. Tal como lo sufrió el Valladolid o lo padeció, en juego pero no en goles, el Rayo Vallecano en aquella segunda mitad el 27 de agosto, cuando fue remontado por un Barça que empezó a dar respeto... Antes del miedo que provoca ahora. Lo provoca porque físicamente este grupo es una bestia que...

title: رشادت جلال اسدی جهاد در راه خدا بود
content: به گزارش حجت الاسلام رضا نوری در دیدار با خانواده مرحوم جلال اسدی گفت: رشادت جلال اسدی جهاد در راه خدا بود.

title: Fenerbahçe'de Sofyan Amrabat ilk kez oynadı
content: Süper Lig'in 5. haftasında Fenerbahçe, deplasmanda karşı karşıya geldiği Kasımpaşa'yı 2-0 mağlup etti. Sarı-lacivertlilerde yaz transfer döneminde kadroya dahil olan Sofyan Amrabat, ilk kez Kasımpaşa maçında kadroya girdi. 81'DE OYUNA GİRDİ Müsabakaya yedek kulübesinde başlayan Faslı futbolcu, 81. dakikada Dusan Tadic'in yerine oyuna girdi. "ZOR BİR TAKIMA KARŞI OYNADIK" Sofyan Amrabat, maçın ardından açıklamalarda bulundu. Orta saha oyuncusu, sözlerine şu şekilde başladı: Geleli çok zaman olmadı, takımla birlikte ilk 3 antrenmana çıktım. Bugün de sahadaydım. Bana göre güçlü, zor bir takıma karşı oynadık. Taraftarlar, kendi evimizde oynuyormuş atmosferi yarattı. Isınmadan maç sonuna kadar hiçbir şekilde susmadılar. Galibiyetten dolayı mutluyuz. Umarım onları mutlu etmeye devam ederiz. GALATASARAY DERBİSİ AÇIKLAMASI Galatasaray derbisi ile ilgili de konuşan Faslı futbolcu, şunları dedi: Bu derbiyle ilgili çok şey duydum. Konsantrasyonu yüksek, güçlü bir maç olacağını düşünüyorum. Amacımız sahada güzel bir oyun ortaya koymak ve taraftarımızı mutlu edecek sonuç almak. Sabırsızlanıyoruz bu maç için. "KENDİMİ FİT HİSSEDİYORUM" Kendi ile ilgili değerlendirme de yapan Amrabat, şu ifadeleri kullandı: Fiziksel anlamda fit olduğumu söyleyebilirim. Takıma henüz geldim, elbette adaptasyon için bir süre gerekecek. Bu normal ama Fiorentina ve milli takımda maç oynadım. Kendimi fit hissediyorum.

title: Dangote Refinery Delivers Petrol, Marking Nigeria’s Path to Energy Independence
content: On Sunday, around 500 trucks from the state-operated Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation arrived at the massive facility to begin fuel deliveries, Dangote Group reported. Finance Minister Wale Edun hailed the moment as a "historic breakthrough day." The refinery, capable of producing 650,000 barrels a day, will meet the entire domestic fuel demand with just 44% of its output, while the remaining 56% will be exported. As petrol begins reaching stations by October 1, the Dangote refinery promises to not only ease fuel scarcity but also bolster Nigeria’s foreign exchange reserves through export revenue.

title: برشلونة يجهز مفاجأة لـ لامين جمال بشأن مستقبله
content: هاي كورة – كشفت مجلة اونز مونديال الفرنسية في تقرير لها ان إدارة برشلونة تنتظر بلوغ النجم لامين جمال سن ال18 في يوليو المقبل للتوقيع على عقد جديد مع النادي . و حسب المجلة فان يامال سيمضي عقدا مدته ستة مواسم في غضون صيف العام القادم 2025 مع شرط جزائي خيالي لفسخه و رفع راتبه الى مستوى قياسي يتماشى مع الدور المحوري الذي يؤديه في الفريق و مكانته المرموقة في النادي و في منتخب اسبانيا .

title: Canarias iniciará la semana sin cambios meteorológicos
creator: Efe
content: La estabilidad meteorológica presidirá el inicio de semana en Canarias, donde seguirán los cielos despejados o con intervalos y las nubes altas, según la Aemet. En el mar habrá noreste 3 o 4, localmente 5 en noroeste y sureste hasta la madrugada. Marejadilla o marejada. Mar de fondo del norte o noreste de 1 a 2 metros. En la costa oeste, variable 1 a 3 con brisas y rizada. PREDICCIÓN POR ISLAS PARA ESTE LUNES: LANZAROTE Intervalos nubosos en el norte y oeste, con apertura de grandes claros durante las horas centrales. En el resto, poco nuboso, con intervalos de nubes altas. Temperaturas con pocos cambios, con algún ligero descenso de las mínimas en el interior. Viento en general flojo con predominio de la componente norte, con intervalos de moderado en zonas de interior. Brisas en costas. TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMAS Y MÁXIMAS PREVISTAS (°C): Arrecife 20 26 FUERTEVENTURA Intervalos nubosos, tendiendo por la mañana a poco nuboso en el este y sureste, con intervalos de nubes altas. Temperaturas con pocos cambios, con algún ligero descenso en el interior. Viento en general flojo con predominio de la componente norte, con intervalos de moderado en zonas de interior y en Jandía. Brisas en costas. TEMPERATURAS MÍNIMAS Y MÁXIMAS PREVISTAS (°C): Puerto del Rosario 20 27 GRAN CANARIA Intervalos nubosos en el norte a primeras y últimas horas que tienden a poco nuboso durante el resto del día. En el resto de zonas, poco nuboso con intervalos de nubes altas. Temperaturas con...

title: Postecoglou, mesaj indirect către Romero, după ce a greșit flagrant în înfrângerea cu Arsenal
content: Postecoglou, mesaj indirect către Romero, după ce a greșit flagrant în înfrângerea cu Arsenal articol scris de Digi Sport 15.09.2024, 19:44 Tottenham a pierdut derby-ul cu Arsenal, scor 0-1, din etapa a patra de Premier League. Premier League Ange Postecoglou / Foto: Profimedia SuperLiga: UTA - Hermannstadt , luni, 18:00, DGS 1 SuperLiga: CFR Cluj - FCSB , duminică, 21:00, DGS 1 Gabriel Magalhaes a marcat singurul gol al partidei, în minutul 64, printr-o lovitură de cap, după ce Bukayo Saka a centrat perfect din corner. La faza respectivă, Cristian Romero, titularul de drept din apărare, l-a scăpat din marcaj pe fundașul brazilian, iar această greșeală a fost decisivă în stabilirea scorului final. Ange Postecoglou: ”Ne-am pierdut concentrarea la golul încasat” Ange Postecoglou a tras concluziile la finalul partidei, iar antrenorul lui Tottenham a ținut să evidențieze greșeala lui Romero, care, într-un moment de neatenție, i-a dat posibilitatea lui Gabriel să înscrie. ”Cred că, per total, a fost un meci destul de strâns. Am controlat partida în cea mai mare parte a meciului, dar nu am profitat de ocaziile pe care le-am avut și nu le-am concretizat. Ne-am pierdut concentrarea la golul încasat. Știam că ei au jucători înalți care atacă bine mingea, dar ne-am oprit pentru o secundă. Cred că am spus ce aveam de spus. În mare parte, am dominat și teritorial, am avut posesia, dar am profitat de ea și am fost pedepsiți” , a declarat...

title: Grupo de Guimarães prepara nova marca de calçado com ‘mira’ no Reino Unido, Estados Unidos e Canadá
creator: O MINHO / LUSA
content: Num ano “de transição” para a indústria portuguesa de calçado, cujas exportações caíram 13,8% em valor até julho, após recuarem 8,2% em 2023, o setor tenta inverter a tendência apostando na automatização, subcontratação e novas marcas. Em declarações à agência Lusa em Milão, Itália, onde até terça-feira 39 empresas portuguesas participam na maior feira de calçado do mundo – a Micam –, o diretor comercial da Kyaia revelou que o grupo de Guimarães se prepara para lançar uma nova marca de sapatos unissexo no outono/inverno de 2025. A apresentar “no final de outubro” aos agentes com que a empresa trabalha, a nova marca terá a designação Fred & Frederico (numa homenagem ao filho do fundador do grupo, Fortunato Frederico) e, segundo Paulo Monteiro, insere-se num segmento de calçado de “moda ‘outdoor’” que “não se enquadra no ADN” das outras marcas do grupo (Fly London, Softinos e As Portuguesas, esta última resultado de uma parceria com o grupo Amorim). De acordo com o diretor comercial da Kyaia, a estratégia da nova marca passa por “tornar o calçado de ‘outdoor’ num produto que possa ser usado no dia a dia, como um produto de moda”, e tem como alvo o “público jovem”. O responsável assume que “é um risco” lançar uma nova marca no atual contexto internacional, de retração de consumo devido à instabilidade geopolítica e às mais altas taxas de juro e de inflação, mas considera que no segmento da moda ‘outdoor’ “existe algum potencial de...

title: ‘তোমার মন ভেঙে থাকে, ভয়, নার্ভাস...’, প্রেমে আঘাত পেয়েই কি এই অবস্থা সারার?
creator: TV9 Bangla
content: সারা আলি খান ও কার্তিক আরিয়ানের প্রেম কাহিনি ২০২০ সালে চর্চার কেন্দ্রে জায়গা করে নিয়েছিল রাতারাতি। লাভ আজ কাল ২ ছবির শুটিং সেটেই চলে মন দেওয়া নেওয়ার পালা। যা পরতে-পরতে ধরা পড়ে ছবির প্রতিটা ফ্রেমে। বোল্ড দৃশ্যে অন্তর্বাসে যেভাবে ধরা দিয়েছিলেন কার্তিকের পাশে সারা আলি খান, তা মুহূর্তে সকলের নজরের কেন্দ্রে জায়গা করে নিয়েছিল। তবে ছবি মুক্তির আগেই বিচ্ছেদের পথে হাঁটেন তাঁরা খবর সামনে আসে কেরিয়ারের কথা ভেবেই নাকি তাঁরা একে অন্যের জীবন থেকে সরে যাওয়ার সিদ্ধান্ত নিয়েছিলেন। ঝড়ের গতিতে ভাইরাল হয় ছবির সেই বিশেষ দৃশ্যগুলো। যদিও ততদিনে প্রেম বিচ্ছেদে পরিণত হয়েছে। এরপর থেকে তা নিয়ে মুখ খুলতে শোনা যায়নি সারা আলি খানকে। যদিও একবার এই প্রসঙ্গে মুখ খুলেছিলেন তিনি, রণবীরের সঙ্গে পডকাস্টের আসরে নিজের কঠিন অধ্যায় নিয়ে সরব হন সারা। প্রসঙ্গ ট্রোলিং। কোনও সেলেবই ট্রোলের বাইরে নন। ট্রোলের শিকার হতে হয়নি এমন সেলেব মেলা ভার। তবে সারা আলি খান কীভাবে ট্রোলিং সামলে থাকেন? প্রশ্ন করাতেই উত্তর দেন সেলেব। তোলেন ব্যক্তিগত প্রসঙ্গ। জানান, সেই সময় তিনি নিজের জীবন নিয়ে এতটাই সমস্যায় ছিলেন যে বাড়তি ২০টা মানুষ তাঁকে নিয়ে কী বলছেন, তা খুব একটা প্রভাব ফেলত না। সারার কথায়, যে মানুষ ভেতর থেকে ইতিমধ্যেই ভেঙে রয়েছে, সে আবার আলাদা করে কি আঘাত পাবে? সারা বলেছিলেন, ”যখন তোমার সঙ্গে সত্যি খুব খারাপ কিছু ঘটছে, তা নিয়ে নেটে চর্চা হচ্ছে, তারপর লোকে কী বলছে সত্যি কি খুব একটা প্রভাব ফেলে? যদি তোমার মন ভেঙে থাকে, ভয়, নার্ভাস, তোমায় ঘিরে থাকে, তখন ২০ জন মানুষ তোমায় নিয়ে কী বলছে তাতে কার কী? তোমার নিজের ভেতরটাই তো জ্বালামুখী হয়ে রয়েছে”।

Madre nagmando ng trapiko sa Maynila: Subukan mong ‘wag sumunod!
content: “NAPA-STOP, look and listen” ang mga motorista nang magmando ng daloy ng trapiko ang isang madre sa isang kalye sa Vito Cruz, Manila. Nag-viral at umani ng milyun-milyong likes at views ang video kung saan makikitang inaayos ng madreng si Sister Constance Tecson ang traffic situation sa Kinagiliwan ng netizens ang isang madre na nakuhanan ng video habang nagmamando ng trapiko sa isang kalsada sa Vito Cruz sa Maynila. Baka Bet Mo: Madre na itinuturing na pinakamatandang tao sa mundo pumanaw na sa edad 118 Base sa ulat, ang video ay in-upload sa Facebook nina Francis at Christle Samonte na napadaan daw sa naturang kalsada pero naipit nga sa mabigat na daloy ng trapiko. Dito nga nila nakita si Sr. Constance Tecson na nagmamando ng traffic malapit sa St. Scholastica’s College Manila kung saan naroon ang kumbento ng St. Scholastica’s Priory kung saan siya nagsisilbi. “Subukan mo wag sumunod, minus one ka sa langit. Happy Monday! God Bless the week!” ang caption ng netizen sa kanyang Facebook post. “I was so impressed as she made sure traffic was moving well,” ang pahayag ni Francis sa panayam ng ABS-CBN. Kuwento naman ni Sister Constance, madalas naman daw niyang ginagawa ang pagsasaayos ng trapiko sa naturang lugar bilang isa sa kanyang tungkulin sa kumbento ng St. Scholastica’s Priory. Malaki raw ang naitutulong ng kanyang pagiging volunteer “traffic enforcer” tuwing umaga dahil mas maayos at mabilis na nakakapasok ang mga estudyante sa nabanggit ng kolehiyo. “Automatic sa akin...

creator: Ifreke Inyang
content: Daily Post Nigeria Cristiano Ronaldo suffers viral infection Home News Politics Metro Entertainment Sport Sport Cristiano Ronaldo suffers viral infection Published on September 15, 2024 By Ifreke Inyang Al Nassr have confirmed that Cristiano Ronaldo has suffered a viral infection. The Saudi Pro League side revealed this in a statement on Sunday. As a result of this, Ronaldo will not be making the trip to Iraq to face Al-Shorta in the AFC Champions League. His absence will be a huge blow for Al-Nassr, who have struggled to get going in this campaign and have already dropped four points in the first three matches of the Saudi Pro League. The statement read: “Al-Nassr captain Cristiano Ronaldo wasn’t feeling well today and was diagnosed with a viral infection. “The team’s doctor confirmed he needs to rest and stay at his place. “As a result, he will not be travelling with the team to Iraq today. title: Tuldok, September 16, 2024
Cine: "El guardián de la magia" llega a la cartelera peruana
creator: Redacción EP
content: En la antigüedad, los seres humanos y las criaturas fabulosas convivían juntos hasta que un monstruo despiadado capaz de destruir el mundo entero llegó al Reino de las Maravillas . Esta es parte de la trama de la cinta animada “El guardián de la magia” , que desde este 19 de setiembre llega a los cines peruanos gracias a Star Films. Este filme llega a la cartelera nacional lleno de magia, fantasía, aventuras, emociones , y una historia que atrapará a millones de fanáticos del séptimo arte, especialmente a toda la familia porque sus personajes dejarán un gran mensaje para chicos y grandes. ¿De que trata la película? Hace mucho tiempo la paz se vio abruptamente interrumpida cuando el aterrador Fantasma Blanco se hizo presente en la ciudad de magos y humanos. Este monstruo de proporciones enormes es capaz de aniquilar al mundo con sus destructivos poderes. En medio de esta crisis, surge un héroe inesperado conocido como Koschey, quien con su valiente espada decide aceptar la tarea de detener al temido Fantasma Blanco. Durante su peligrosa travesía hacia la ciudad capital del reino, Koschey deberá unir fuerzas con una joven hechicera que busca proteger su hogar. En medio de las tierras salvajes deberán enfrentarse a innumerables desafíos mientras aprenden a trabajar en equipo si desean vencer para siempre a este inquebrantable enemigo y restaurar la paz en el reino. "El guardián de la magia" , que llega a los cines peruanos este 19 de setiembre, ha captado la...

title: Crazy Jhenny, September 16, 2024
Model gives back by helping out
content: Ria Bolivar —BENCH With cheekbones that can cut glass and a lithe and lanky frame, Ria Bolivar is a model’s model. She’s a favorite of the local designers because she can make anything look good. Although she could have chosen to remain a top model where she continues to be in high demand, she decided to parlay that fame to help aspiring models who want to break into the industry. Last year, she took a couple of models from Iloilo City, her hometown, under her wing. “I’ve actually held a number of modeling workshops in Manila, Iloilo and Cagayan de Oro,” Ria told Inquirer Entertainment. “I decided to start my own agency so I can help these young models by teaching them how to walk and present themselves when meeting prospective clients She knows how dire the situation can get when a model is just starting out. Some brands and designers treat models poorly. “These brands earn because the models present their clothes in a nice way. Since that’s the case, the models should also be paid accordingly. I want to help them get a fair wage,” Ria said. So far, she has added three female models to her roster. She is also planning to hold a modeling workshop in Manila soon. “A photographer wants to do a shoot with me. Instead of me getting paid for the job, we made an exchange deal where he will also shoot my models for their set cards,” Ria said. For this long-limbed mannequin and mother of two, it’s time to pay it forward. INQ Subscribe to our daily newsletter By providing an email...

title: Пловдивчанка съди затвора за 30 000 лв., получи 3000 лв. - Труд
creator: Труд
content: Била болна, но не ѝ дали специална храна Бивша затворничка от Пловдив поиска 30 000 лв. обезщетение за преживени болки и страдания по време на престоя ѝ зад решетките на Сливенския затвор. Пловдивският административен съд уважи само 10% от иска и присъди на жената 3000 лева. Без да се уточнява за какви престъпления е била осъдена пловдивчанката, тя лежала зад решетките от юни 2012 г. до декември на следващата 2022 г. В иска си сочи, че заради лошите условия в килиите е преживяла обиди, психологически дискомфорт и притеснения. За година е половина е била местена в три помещения, като и трите пъти е била с различни съкилийнички. Но и трите пъти килиите били пренаселени. Претенциите ѝ били и към хигиената и достъпа до вода - топла и студена, за миене и пране. В справка от затворническата администрация тези твърдения били напълно опровергани - във всяка килия имало санитарен възел, на дамите всеки месец се раздавали по 200 гр. тоалетен сапун, 250 гр. сапун за пране и 500 гр. прах за пране, като и други препарати за хигиенизиране на стаите, пише сайтът “Трафик нюз”. За основателни били приети само медицинските претенции на бившата затворничка, която имало заболяване и трябвало да приема специална храна и да ходи на рехабилитатор, а от затвора не посочили доказателства, че са и осигурили тези грижи.

Sá sem varð fyrir árásinni á þrítugsaldri
content: Dyraverðirnir sem eru grunaðir um að hafa framið alvarlega líkamsárás við skemmtistað í nótt eru á þrítugs- og fertugsaldri. Þeir verða yfirheyrðir í dag. Þetta segir Þóra Jónasdóttir, aðstoðaryfirlögregluþjónn hjá lögreglunni á höfuðborgarsvæðinu, í samtali við mbl.is. Maðurinn sem varð fyrir árásinni er á þrítugsaldri en Þóra getur ekki sagt til um líðan hans annað en að hann er ekki í lífshættu. Í dagbók lögreglu frá því í morgun var greint frá því að tveir dyraverðir hefðu verið handteknir í nótt vegna alvarlegrar líkamsárásar. Þá kom jafnframt fram að margir hefðu orðið vitni að árásinni.

title: Stella: Norris help 50% of Piastri Baku win, as McLaren takes lead in constructors’
content: McLaren Formula 1 team boss Andrea Stella believes Lando Norris blocking Sergio Perez played a crucial part in Oscar Piastri's Azerbaijan Grand Prix victory. Piastri was shadowing Ferrari's leader Charles Leclerc in the first stint of a one-stop race when third-placed Sergio Perez attempted to undercut the McLaren driver by being the first to pit on lap 14. Rather than responding immediately, Piastri stayed out for two additional laps before his lap 16 pitstop, which saw him in danger of losing second to the Red Bull. But in the wake of McLaren backing Norris in his title bid against Max Verstappen , Norris actually helped Piastri in Baku. Having started 15th on the harder tyres, Norris had fallen a pitstop behind Perez and saw the Mexican come out behind him after his stop. As requested by his race engineer, Norris tried to hold up Perez for two laps, which allowed Piastri to make his pitstop and still come out ahead of the Red Bull. Piastri's quick in- and out-laps also cut his deficit to leader Leclerc once the Ferrari driver pitted, and on lap 20 the Australian made a late lunge to the inside of Turn 1 to take the lead of the race, which he would end up defending for a second career win. McLaren team principal Stella felt Norris' actions may well have been key to Piastri winning the race, as dropping behind Perez would have robbed the Australian of the chance to pass Leclerc before his tyres started fading too much in dirty air. title: Дзюба считает сохранение прописки в РПЛ главной задачей на сезон для "Акрона"
content: САМАРА, 15 сентября. /ТАСС/. Сохранение прописки тольяттинского футбольного клуба "Акрон" в Мир - Российской премьер-лиге (РПЛ) является главной целью для нападающего команды Артема Дзюбы. Об этом он рассказал журналистам. "Акрон" объявил о подписании контракта с Дзюбой 12 сентября. Нападающий дебютировал за тольяттинский клуб в матче РПЛ против подмосковных "Химок" (3:0), отметившись результативной передачей. "Задача номер один, чтобы команда сохранила прописку в РПЛ, - сказал Дзюба. - Потому что команда молодая, только вышла в РПЛ. Это будет большая честь остаться, мы все для этого сделаем. Если мне удастся забивать и отдавать, это будет прекрасно". "В любой команде, если хороший коллектив, рождаются лидеры, будем забивать и отдавать. Главное, чтобы команда играла правильно и хорошо. Я не буду ходить довольным, если забью, а мы будем проигрывать. Мне нужны победы, при хороших результатах будет хороший климат в команде, это очень важно", - добавил он. "Акрон" прервал свою серию из пяти матчей в чемпионате без побед. Команда поднялась на 10-ю строчку турнирной таблицы, набрав восемь очков. В следующем туре "Акрон" 21 сентября примет "Краснодар", а 18 сентября дома сыграет с воронежским "Факелом" в групповом этапе "пути РПЛ" Фонбет - Кубка России.

title: ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਵੀ ਦਿੰਦੀ ਕੈਂਸਰ ਨੂੰ ਸੱਦਾ? ਜਾਣੋ ਕੀ ਕਹਿੰਦੇ ਸਿਹਤ ਮਾਹਿਰ
creator: ABP Sanjha
content: ਔਰਤਾਂ ਆਪਣੇ ਹੱਥਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਪੈਰਾਂ ਦੇ ਨਹੁੰਆਂ 'ਤੇ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਲਗਾਉਣਾ ਪਸੰਦ ਕਰਦੀਆਂ ਹਨ। ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਉਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਦੀ ਖੂਬਸੂਰਤੀ ਦੇ ਵਿੱਚ ਚਾਰ ਚੰਨ ਲਗਾ ਦਿੰਦੀ ਹੈ। ਖਾਸ ਕਰਕੇ ਜਦੋਂ ਕੋਈ ਖਾਸ ਮੌਕਾ ਹੋਵੇ। ਕੁੜੀਆਂ ਵੀ ਮੌਕੇ ਦੇ ਹਿਸਾਬ ਨਾਲ ਆਪਣੇ ਨਹੁੰਆਂ 'ਤੇ ਵੱਖ-ਵੱਖ ਰੰਗਾਂ ਵਾਲੀ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਲਗਾਉਣਾ ਪਸੰਦ ਕਰਦੀਆਂ ਹਨ। ਕੁਝ ਕੁੜੀਆਂ ਨੂੰ ਹਰ ਰੋਜ਼ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟ ਬਦਲਣ ਦਾ ਕ੍ਰੇਜ਼ ਹੁੰਦਾ ਹੈ। ਅਜਿਹੇ 'ਚ ਜੇਕਰ ਤੁਹਾਨੂੰ ਪਤਾ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟ ਲਗਾਉਣ ਨਾਲ ਕੈਂਸਰ ਵੀ ਹੋ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ ਤਾਂ ਕੀ ਹੋਵੇਗਾ? ਜੀ ਹਾਂ, ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਈ ਕੈਮੀਕਲਸ ਦੀ ਵਰਤੋਂ ਕੀਤੀ ਜਾਂਦੀ ਹੈ, ਜੋ ਕਿ ਕਾਰਸੀਨੋਜਨਿਕ ਹੁੰਦੇ ਹਨ। ਇਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਰਸਾਇਣਾਂ ਤੋਂ ਬਣੇ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟ ਨੂੰ ਲਗਾਉਣ ਨਾਲ ਤੁਸੀਂ ਕੈਂਸਰ ਦਾ ਖ਼ਤਰਾ ਵਧਾ ਸਕਦੇ ਹੋ। ਹਾਲਾਂਕਿ ਕੋਈ ਵੀ ਮਾਹਿਰ ਇਹ ਨਹੀਂ ਕਹਿੰਦਾ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਲਗਾਉਣਾ ਬੰਦ ਕਰ ਦੇਣਾ ਚਾਹੀਦਾ ਹੈ, ਪਰ ਕੁਝ ਰਿਪੋਰਟਾਂ ਅਤੇ ਲੋਕਾਂ ਨੂੰ ਪਤਾ ਲੱਗਾ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਵਿੱਚ ਅਜਿਹੇ ਤੱਤ ਹੁੰਦੇ ਹਨ ਜੋ ਕਾਰਸੀਨੋਜਨਿਕ ਹੁੰਦੇ ਹਨ। ਉਦਾਹਰਨ ਲਈ, ਹਾਲ ਹੀ ਵਿੱਚ ਇੱਕ ਸੁੰਦਰਤਾ ਸਮਾਜਿਕ ਪ੍ਰਭਾਵਕ ਨੇ ਇੰਸਟਾਗ੍ਰਾਮ 'ਤੇ ਇੱਕ ਵੀਡੀਓ ਸ਼ੇਅਰ ਕੀਤੀ ਹੈ ਜਿਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਿਹਾ ਗਿਆ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਕਿਵੇਂ ਉਸਨੇ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਬਣਾਉਂਦੇ ਹੋਏ ਦੇਖਿਆ ਅਤੇ ਜਿਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਕਈ ਕੈਮੀਕਲ ਮਿਲਾਏ ਗਏ, ਜਿਸ ਕਰਕੇ ਹੁਣ ਉਸ ਨੇ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟ ਤੋਂ ਹੀ ਦੂਰੀ ਬਣਾ ਲਈ ਹੈ। ਹੋਰ ਪੜ੍ਹੋ : ਕੀ ਅਸਮਾਨ ਤੋਂ ਗਾਇਬ ਹੋਣ ਜਾ ਰਹੇ ਤਾਰੇ! ਜਾਣੋ ਕਿੰਨਾ ਖਤਰਨਾਕ ਹੋ ਸਕਦਾ Light Pollution ਅਸਲ 'ਚ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟ ਬਣਾਉਣ ਲਈ ਇਸ 'ਚ ਟੋਲਿਊਨ, ਫਾਰਮਾਲਡੀਹਾਈਡ ਅਤੇ ਡਾਇਪ੍ਰੋਪਾਈਲ ਵਰਗੇ ਪਦਾਰਥ ਮਿਲਾਏ ਜਾਂਦੇ ਹਨ, ਜੋ ਕੈਂਸਰ ਦਾ ਕਾਰਨ ਬਣ ਸਕਦੇ ਹਨ। ਮਾਹਿਰਾਂ ਅਨੁਸਾਰ ਇਨ੍ਹਾਂ ਨੇਲ ਪੇਂਟਸ ਦੀ ਵਰਤੋਂ ਕਰਨਾ ਜੋਖਮ ਭਰਿਆ ਹੋ ਸਕਦਾ ਹੈ। ਮਾਹਿਰਾਂ ਅਨੁਸਾਰ ਇਸ ਵਿੱਚ ਕੋਈ ਸ਼ੱਕ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ ਕਿ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਕਾਰਸੀਨੋਜਨਿਕ ਨਹੀਂ ਹੈ। ਬਿਊਟੀ ਪ੍ਰੋਡਕਟਸ ਨੂੰ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਪਹਿਲਾਂ ਵੀ ਕਈ ਵਾਰ ਨੁਕਸਾਨਦੇਹ ਖੁਲਾਸੇ ਹੋ ਚੁੱਕੇ ਹਨ। ਇਸ ਲਈ ਨੇਲ ਪਾਲਿਸ਼ ਦੀ ਵਰਤੋਂ ਕਰਦੇ ਸਮੇਂ ਵੀ ਮਾਹਿਰ ਇਸ ਨੂੰ ਸਾਵਧਾਨੀ...

title: Asesinato de empresario limonero de Buenavista apunta a extorsión: Fiscalía de Michoacán
creator: Milenio
content: Michoacán.- La Fiscalía General de Michoacán confirmó que el crimen de José Luis Aguiñaga Escalera, empresario limonero de Buenavista , está relacionado a la extorsión . Adrián López Solís , fiscal estatal, indicó que lo anterior se ha podido establecer como línea preliminar de la investigación con base a declaraciones de testimonios. “ Por los datos recabados se puede establecer una línea preliminar de la investigación, que uno de los factores estarían extorsionando a la persona y en un momento determinado fue privado de la vida”, declaró. Precisó que al interior de la institución no se tiene registro de alguna denuncia previa por parte de la víctima ni de otros posibles afectados. Al respecto, López Solís lamentó que el miedo a denunciar tras ser víctimas de algún caso de extorsión prevalezca entre la población. ¿Qué pasó con José Luis Aguiñaga? José Luis Aguiñaga Escalera fue ultimado a balazos al interior del rancho “Los 2 Potrillos” por civiles armados el pasado jueves. Tras su asesinato, la industria limonera de Buenavista suspendió labores el día viernes como protesta .

title: Why Iraq matters to Iran
content: MADRID – Iranian President Masoud Pezeshkian made his first official visit to Iraq since taking office. On the first day of his trip, Pezeshkian held individual meetings with Iraq's President, Prime Minister, Chief Justice, leaders of the Coordination Framework of Iraq’s Shiite forces, and the First Deputy Speaker of Iraq’s Parliament. Additionally, he met with Iranian expatriates in Baghdad and participated in discussions with business leaders active in Iraq. On the second day, the President of the Islamic Republic of Iran traveled to Erbil and Sulaymaniyah for talks with officials from the Kurdistan Regional Government. He also visited the holy cities of Najaf and Karbala, where he paid respects at the sacred Shiite shrines. This visit underscores Iraq's geopolitical and geoeconomic importance to the Islamic Republic. This article aims to shed light on the recent relations between the two countries and analyze Iraq's significance to Iran’s security and regional stability. In this regard, it is crucial to recognize that the convergence between the Islamic Republic of Iran and Iraq and their bilateral relations can impact regional security, potentially enhancing security levels and mitigating regional challenges. Iran’s foreign policy strategy toward Iraq after the fall of Saddam Hussein has been shaped by various factors, including geography, economics, and its role within the Axis of Resistance. This strategy, developed in the context of the U.S. occupation of Iraq, the...

title: हर 3 महीने में काल की बदलती है चाल, घर बनवाने या प्रवेश के पहले जान लें ये बात
creator: News18 Hindi
content: दरभंगा : शास्त्रों के अनुसार, सनातन धर्म में हर एक कार्य के लिए शुभ मुहूर्त बनाए गए हैं. ज्योतिष शास्त्र के विद्वानों द्वारा गणना के बाद शुभ मुहूर्त का दिन निर्धारित किया जाता है. यदि आप नए घर के निर्माण या प्रवेश की सोच रहे हैं, तो जान लें कि किस महीने में किस दिशा की ओर घर निर्माण या प्रवेश नहीं करना चाहिए. कामेश्वर सिंह दरभंगा संस्कृत विश्वविद्यालय के ज्योतिष विभाग के HOD कुनाल कुमार झा बताते हैं कि गृह आरंभ के समय में यह प्रमुख रूप से देखना चाहिए कि काल का निवास उस दिशा में न हो जिस दिशा में आप अपने घर का निर्माण करवा रहे हैं. गृह आरंभ के समय में यह प्रमुख रूप से देखना चाहिए कि उस दिशा में काल का निवास ना हो जिस दिशा में आप अपने घर का निर्माण करवा रहे हैं. पूर्व दिशा में काल का वास अगहन, पौष और माघ इन तीन महीनों में काल पूर्व दिशा में होते हैं तो पूर्व दिशा का घर इस समय में नहीं बनाना चाहिए. सम्मुख काल हो जाने के कारण इस दिशा का घर इस 3 महीने में निर्माण नहीं किया जाता है. दक्षिण दिशा : दक्षिण दिशा में काल का वास फाल्गुन, चैत्र और वैशाख इन 3 महीनों में होता है. तो इन तीनों महीनों में न ही घर बनवाएं और न ही गृह प्रवेश करें. पश्चिम दिशा : ज्येष्ठ, आषाढ़ और सावन इन महीनों में काल का वास पश्चिम दिशा में होता है. इन तीन महीने में पश्चिम दिशा का जो मुख का घर होता है उस दिशा में घर का निर्माण नहीं किया जाना चाहिए. उत्तर दिशा : उत्तर दिशा में भादप्रद, आश्विन और कार्तिक यह तीन महीना उत्तर दिशा में गृह आरंभ नहीं होगा क्योंकि उसमें भी इस दिशा में सम्मुख काल हो जाते हैं. title: World News | Bangladesh Interim Govt's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus Visits Army Headquarters
content: Dhaka, Sep 15 (PTI) Bangladesh interim government's Chief Adviser Muhammad Yunus on Sunday for the first time visited the army headquarters, where he was briefed about important issues of national security. On his arrival at the army headquarters, Army chief Gen Waker-Uz-Zaman welcomed Yunus, the army said in a press release. The chief adviser was briefed on important issues of national security, the state-run BSS news agency reported, citing the release. title: La Liga: Με τρομερό Γιαμάλ η Μπαρτσελόνα 4-1 εκτός έδρας τη Τζιρόνα - Δείτε τα γκολ
content: Στο αντίστοιχο περυσινό παιχνίδι, η προηγήθηκε 2-1, αλλά δέχθηκε τρία γκολ μέσα σε επτά λεπτά και γεύτηκε δεύτερη τεσσάρα (αμφότερες με σκορ 4-2) από την απίθανη Τζιρόνα στην ίδια σεζόν. Η φετινή Μπάρτσα του Χάνζι Φλικ, όμως, είναι διαφορετική. Προηγείται στο σκορ και συνεχίζει να ψάχνει το γκολ, να «πνίγει» τον αντίπαλο, όπως έκανε με την Τζιρόνα στο «Μοντιλίβι» (4-1) για να φτάσει στο «5 στα 5» και να βρεθεί εκ νέου στο +4 από την Ρεάλ Μαδρίτης, στην πρώτη δυάδα της La Liga. Ο Γιάνγκελ Ερέρα δεν ξεπέρασε εγκαίρως τον τραυματισμό του και δεν ενίσχυσε την μεσαία γραμμή των γηπεδούχων, από την οποία απουσίαζε και ο Οριόλ Ρομέου, ως δανεικός από την Μπάρτσα. Με το γνωστό... νοσοκομείο των έξι απόντων, στους οποίους προστέθηκε από τις εθνικές ομάδες ο Φερμίν Λόπεθ, ο Φλικ παράταξε την ιδανική του ενδεκάδα, με τον Ντάνι Όλμο να ξεπερνάει τις ενοχλήσεις που τον ταλαιπωρούσαν τις τελευταίες ημέρες. Οι Μπλαουγκράνα ξεκίνησαν με πίεση ψηλά και απείλησαν πρώτοι με τον Λαμίν Γιαμάλ, η ευκαιρία του οποίου ήταν... προάγγελος για το τι επρόκειτο να ακολουθήσει στο πρώτο ημίχρονο. Ο 17χρονος εξτρέμ είναι ό,τι καλύτερο έχει βγάλει η Μασία μετά τον Λιονέλ Μέσι και φέτος φροντίζει να το αποδεικνύει, έχοντας βελτιώσει και την τελική προσπάθεια, χάρη στην οποία σκόραρε δις μέσα σε επτά λεπτά (30’, 37’), ανοίγοντας διάπλατα τον δρόμο προς μια ακόμα νίκη. Ο Αλεχάντρο...

title: Haitians in Ohio find solidarity at church after chaotic week of false pet-eating claims
creator: By LUIS ANDRES HENAO - Associated Press
content: SPRINGFIELD, Ohio (AP) — For many Haitian immigrants, Sunday mornings in Springfield, Ohio, are spent joyfully worshipping God as they sing and pray in their native Creole. This Sunday, they needed that uplifting balm more than ever. Their community is reeling — confused, frustrated, hurt — from false accusations that they are eating their neighbor’s cats and dogs. The now viral and highly politicized rumors are being fueled by former President Donald Trump, his running mate JD Vance and others, and violent threats against the community are upending daily life in their city. title: Haitians in Ohio find solidarity at church after chaotic week of false pet-eating claims
creator: By LUIS ANDRES HENAO - Associated Press
content: SPRINGFIELD, Ohio (AP) — For many Haitian immigrants, Sunday mornings in Springfield, Ohio, are spent joyfully worshipping God as they sing and pray in their native Creole. This Sunday, they needed that uplifting balm more than ever. Their community is reeling — confused, frustrated, hurt — from false accusations that they are eating their neighbor’s cats and dogs. The now viral and highly politicized rumors are being fueled by former President Donald Trump, his running mate JD Vance and others, and violent threats against the community are upending daily life in their city. “Jesus is with us in truth, and the truth is that Haitians are not eating pets and geese in Springfield,” said the Rev. Carl Ruby, preaching at Central Christian Church. He invited community members to join his congregation in prayer and peaceful protest of the false rumors leveled against their Haitian neighbors. They also demanded an apology. “It is truth that a retraction of these rumors will help to restore peace in Springfield," Ruby said. “We respectfully call on all politicians and media figures who are promoting this rumor to help make Springfield great and safe again by speaking the truth about our community.” Viles Dorsainvil, the leader of Haitian Community Help and Support Center in Springfield, accepted Ruby's invitation to worship together at Central Christian, and was grateful to be relying on his faith. “It’s important to be here because we’re Christian — despite everything, we worship in...

title: MUP: Sutra sednica Republičkog štaba za vanredne situacije
creator: Radmila Marković
content: Sednica Republičkog štaba za vanredne situacije biće održana sutra, najavljeno je večeras iz Ministarstarstva unutrašnjih poslova. Kako se navodi u saopštenju, sednica počinje u 11 časova u zgradi Vlade Srbije, a prisustvovaće i premijer Srbije Miloš Vučević. Podsetimo, širom Srednje Evrope su poplave. u oluji, a više hiljada građana je evakuisano.

title: ENG vs AUS 3rd T20I 2024: England, Australia Settle for 1–1 Draw After Rain Washes Out T20I Series Decider in Manchester
content: Manchester (England) September 15: England's T20I series decider against Australia was washed out Sunday without a ball being bowled at Old Trafford. The series finished tied 1-1. The forecast never looked likely to allow for any meaningful play to take place in the third T20I and the umpires finally called the abandonment at 4:20 p.m. local time, almost two hours after the scheduled start. Jos Buttler Ruled Out of ENG vs AUS ODI Series 2024 Due to Calf Injury, Liam Livingstone Named Replacement; Harry Brook to Captain England. Australia won the series opener by 28 runs at Southampton before England levelled the series with a three-wicket win at Cardiff. The first of five one-day internationals between the teams starts Thursday at Trent Bridge. Harry Brook, a 25-year-old batter, is set to captain England for the first time in the series after Jos Buttler's persistent calf injury saw him ruled out. (AP) UNG 7/21/2024 (This is an unedited and auto-generated story from Syndicated News feed, LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body)

title: Kommentti: Red Bullin imperiumi rapistui
content: Azerbaidžanin GP jää historiaan kisana, jossa Red Bull menetti valmistajien MM-sarjan johtopaikan. Se olisi tapahtunut riippumatta viimeisten kierrosten tapahtumista, mutta toki Carlos Sainzin ja Sergio Pérezin kolari pahensi tilannetta merkittävästi. Meksikolainen olisi tuonut energiajuomatallille hyvät pisteet vähintään nelostilallaan, mutta hänen keskeytyksensä lahjoitti sen McLarenin Lando Norrisille. Papaijatalli ohitti samalla Red Bullin, joka tippui kakkoseksi ensimmäisen kerran vuoden 2022 Espanjan gp:n jälkeen. Piste-ero revähti samalla 20:een. Tuomaristo päätti lopulta, ettei kumpikaan kuski ollut syyllinen. Totta onkin, että vaikka Sainz hivuttautuikin Pérezin linjalle, olisi meksikolainen voinut helposti välttää kontaktin. Nahkapäätöksen taustalla voidaan nähdä myös yhden imperiumin rapistuminen. Vielä kesäkuun lopussa Red Bullin etumatka McLareniin oli 87 pistettä. Sen jälkeen McLaren on kerännyt 107 pistettä enemmän vain kuudessa kisassa. MM-sarjaa on jäljellä vielä seitsemän GP-viikonloppua. Mutta uskooko kukaan, että sisällissodasta ja aivovuodosta kärsivä mestaritalli pystyisi kääntämään momentumin puolelleen?

title: Pintér Sándor: Megfelelő módon szervezzük a védekezést a Dunán és a Lajtán
content: A tárcavezető elmondta, hogy az előrejelzések szerint a 2013-as árvízhez hasonló, vagy azt meghaladó magasságot ér majd el a Duna és a Lajta vízszintje, így a két folyón kiemelt védekezésre van szükség. A kormány a Belügyminisztériumot (BM) hatalmazta fel, hogy szervezze meg az árvízi védekezést – mondta, hozzátéve: meg fogják akadályozni, hogy a víz áttörje a Duna és a Lajta a gátjait. A védekezés részeként már az előző héten elkezdte a munkát az Országos Katasztrófavédelmi Főigazgatóság (OKF) és az Országos Vízügyi Főigazgatóság (OVF). Kijelölték azokat a helyeket, ahol a vízszint emelkedéséből rendkívüli helyzet adódhat, például esetlegesen meg kell emelni a gátakat vagy ki kell telepíteni a lakosságot – mondta a miniszter. "Meggyőződésem, hogy a kitelepítés nem fog bekövetkezni”, mert a megfelelő védművek közé tudjuk szorítani a vizet – tette hozzá. A belügyminiszter elmondta, hogy a Kopernikusz programon keresztül az Európai Unió is támogatja a védekező munkát, mert a rendszer mutatja a pillanatnyi vízállásokat a vízgyűjtő medencén belül, és ennek révén jobban fel lehet készülni. Pintér Sándor hangsúlyozta, hogy az eredményes munkára szervezetileg is felkészültek, a Magyar Honvédség mintegy tizenhétezer emberrel kész arra, hogy a védekezésben megfelelő hátteret tudjon biztosítani, gépjárművekkel és helikopterekkel is. A védekezés segítésére...

title: Saudi MODON Signs Contract for First Food Factory in Jeddah
creator: كاتب
content: The Saudi Authority for Industrial Cities and Technology Zones (MODON) signed a contract with Nestlé to allocate a 117,000-square-meter industrial plot in the Jeddah Third Industrial City. The contract aims to establish the first food factory in the Kingdom, scheduled to open in 2025, with an initial investment of SAR270 million to boost local production, reported the Saudi Press Agency on Sunday. The signing ceremony was held under the patronage and in the presence of Minister of Industry and Mineral Resources Chairman of MODON Bandar bin Ibrahim Al-Khorayef, MODON CEO Eng. Majed Al-Argoubi and Nestlé Saudi Arabia CEO Robert Helou. In its initial phase, the project will focus on producing baby food and launching an automated production line equipped with the latest packaging technologies operated by qualified national food industry personnel. The project is expected to create hundreds of direct and indirect jobs during its first phase, with an initial annual production capacity of 15,000 tons. In line with the National Industrial Strategy, MODON seeks to boost the food industries sector through the food cluster initiative in Jeddah's second and third industrial cities. The food cluster aims to enhance supply chains and promote exports by providing an integrated and supportive environment, which positively impacts the growth and development of the food industry sector in the region.

title: मॉडल के उत्पीड़न में नप गए 3 IPS ऑफिसर, मुंबई के हाई प्रोफाइल अधिकारी का मामला
creator: News18 Hindi
content: अमरावती. आंध्र प्रदेश सरकार ने मुंबई की एक्ट्रेस-मॉडल कादम्बरी जेठवानी को गलत तरीके से गिरफ्तार करने और उनके उत्पीड़न में शामिल भारतीय पुलिस सेवा (आईपीएस) के तीन सीनियर अधिकारियों को सस्पेंड कर दिया है. महानिदेशक (डीजी) रैंक के एक अधिकारी सहित इन सभी पर आरोप है कि उन्होंने बिना जांच किए ही मॉडल को ना सिर्फ ‘जल्दबाजी में गिरफ्तार’ किया, बल्कि उसे ‘परेशान’ भी किया. एक सरकारी आदेश के मुताबिक, पूर्व खुफिया प्रमुख पी. सीताराम अंजनेयुलु (महानिदेशक रैंक), विजयवाड़ा के पूर्व पुलिस आयुक्त कांथी राणा टाटा (महानिरीक्षक रैंक) और तत्कालीन पुलिस उपायुक्त (विजयवाड़ा) विशाल गुन्नी (पुलिस अधीक्षक रैंक) को एक्ट्रेस के कथित उत्पीड़न में उनकी भूमिका का खुलासा होने के बाद निलंबित कर दिया गया. एक्ट्रेस ने आरोप लगाया है कि पिछली सरकार के दौरान पुलिस अधिकारियों ने उन्हें धमकी दी थी कि अगर उन्होंने मुंबई में निगम के एक शीर्ष अधिकारी के खिलाफ दर्ज मामला वापस नहीं लिया तो उन्हें गंभीर परिणाम भुगतने होंगे. एक्ट्रेस को इस वर्ष की शुरुआत में पिछली वाईएसआर कांग्रेस सरकार के दौरान पार्टी के एक नेता को उस शिकायत के आधार पर गिरफ्तार किया गया था, जिसमें उन पर धोखाधड़ी का आरोप लगाया गया था. आरोप है कि उस वक्त के खुफिया प्रमुख ने दो अन्य अधिकारियों को अभिनेत्री को गिरफ्तार करने का निर्देश दिया, हालांकि उस तारीख तक उनके खिलाफ कोई अपराध दर्ज नहीं हुआ था. सरकारी आदेश के मुताबिक, रिकॉर्ड के अनुसार एक्ट्रेस के खिलाफ एफआईआर दो फरवरी को सुबह 6:30 बजे दर्ज की गई थी, जबकि अंजनेयुलु ने एफआईआर दर्ज करने से पहले 31 जनवरी को ही कांथी राणा टाटा और विशाल गुन्नी को निर्देश दिए थे. title: PSG sends support to defender Nuno Mendes after racial abuse
creator: The Associated Press
content: PARIS (AP) — Paris Saint-Germain defender Nuno Mendes was the target of abusive and racist comments on social media after a French league game. Read this article for free: Already have an account? Read unlimited articles for free today: Already have an account? PARIS (AP) — Paris Saint-Germain defender Nuno Mendes was the target of abusive and racist comments on social media after a French league game. The club condemned the abuse and expressed its “full support” Sunday for the Portugal left back, who was targeted following PSG’s 3-1 win against Brest on Saturday. Mendes, who is Black, shared on his Instagram account a racist message he received. During the match, Mendes brought down Ludovic Ajorque in the box for a penalty that Romain Del Castillo converted to give Brest the lead. “Paris Saint-Germain doesn’t tolerate racism, antisemitism or any other form of discrimination,” the club said. “The racial insults directed at Nuno Mendes are totally unacceptable ... we are working with the relevant authorities and associations to ensure those responsible are held accountable for their actions.” Fridays The Free Press sports editor keeps you up to date on all that’s happening on the ice, the field, the court, and places in between. ___ AP soccer: https://apnews.com/hub/soccer Advertisement

title: Juan Cota y Borja García protagonistas en el Racing Weekend del Circuit Ricardo Tormo
content: El Circuit Ricardo Tormo ha celebrado este fin de semana, 14 y 15 de septiembre, la segunda cita de la temporada del NAPA Racing Weekend ante más de 10.000 espectadores. El trazado de Cheste ha celebrado las carreras de la Fórmula 4 Española, la Porsche Sprint Challenge Ibérica y la Toyota GR Cup , que han terminado con victorias de Juan Cota, Borja García y el piloto formado en el CETDM Adrián Benito. El madrileño Juan Cota, que cumolirá 17 años el próximo 19 de septiembre, ha sido el claro protagonista del fin de semana en la Fórmula 4 Española. Tras conseguir el sábado su primera victoria del año, ha vuelto a subir a lo más alto del podio. En la primera carrera del día, el piloto de Drivex partía segundo, se ha puesto al frente en la salida y ha liderado la prueba hasta el final. El italiano Mattia Colnaghi y el emiratí Keanu Al Azhari han completado el podio. En la segunda carrera, Cota ha conseguido la pole y no ha dado opción a sus rivales. El madrileño ha liderado de semáforo a bandera para lograr así su tercer triunfo del fin de semana. "Tres de tres victorias y una pole, estoy súper contento con este fin de semana", ha asegurado el joven piloto. Al Azhari y Colnaghi han vuelto a terminar en el podio en la última prueba del fin de semana . La piloto del Centro de Tecnificación del Circuit Nerea Martí ha disputado la cita de este fin de semana de la F4 en el Circuit con el objetivo de preparar su carrera de la próxima semana de la F1...

title: "러, 우크라군이 점령했던 쿠르스크 보르키 마을 탈환"
creator: geun@sbs.co.kr(박찬근)
content: 러시아가 우크라이나군에 내줬던 쿠르스크주(州)의 보르키 마을을 탈환했다고 러시아군 사령관이 주장했습니다. 타스 통신에 따르면 러시아 체첸공화국 아흐마트 특수부대의 압티 알라우디노프 사령관은 현지시각 15일 텔레그램에서 쿠르스크 수잔스키 지구에 있는 보르키 마을을 우크라이나군으로부터 해방했다고 말했습니다. 알라우디노프 사령관은 제801여단의 아르바트 부대가 보르키에서 적군을 소탕하고 포로를 잡았다고 설명했습니다. 보르키는 러시아산 천연가스를 유럽으로 수송하는 가스관 계측소가 있는 요충지 수자의 남동쪽에 있는 마을입니다. 우크라이나군이 지난달 6일부터 쿠르스크에서 공세를 시작, 일부 영토를 장악한 가운데 러시아군은 최근 빼앗긴 영토를 되찾는 반격에 나섰습니다. 러시아 국방부는 지난 12일 쿠르스크 마을 10곳을 해방했다고 발표했으며, 볼로디미르 젤렌스키 우크라이나 대통령도 같은 날 "러시아는 (쿠르스크에서) 반격 행동을 개시했다"고 인정했습니다. (사진=AP, 러시아 국방부, 연합뉴스)

title: PAŠĆE NAM 40 LITARA KIŠE Izdato upozorenje za Srbiju, ČEKAJU NAS JAKE PADAVINE
content: Nastavlja se uticaj snažnog ciklona nad Srbijom, a njegov centar ušao je iznad severne Vojvodine iz Mađarske. Vrlo je hladno i vreme je kao usred jeseni, s obzirom na to da su temperature u većini predela oko 10 stepeni i bez većeg kolebanja su čitavog dana Na višim planinama pada i sneg, a temperatura je opala na 0°C. Uticaj snažnog ciklona očekuje se i naredna 24 sata. Do kraja dana i tokom večeri obilne padavine očekuju se u Vojvodini, u Pomoravlju, u Braničevskom okrugu i na istoku i jugoistoku Srbije. U ovim predelima do jutra se očekuje dodatnih 20 do 40 litara kiše po kvadratnom metru, lokalno i više. Kiša će biti praćena jačim pljuskovima . Temperatura će biti bez bitnije promene i u većini predela kretaće se oko 10 stepeni. U Srbiji u ponedeljak umereno do potpuno oblačno i hladno sa kišom i pljuskovima, ponegde i sa grmljavinom. Na jugu i jugoistoku biće nešto toplije i sa dužim sunčanim periodima. Vetar slab, južnih pravaca. Jutarnja temperatura od 8 do 12 stepeni, maksimalna dnevna od 13°C na severu i zapadu do 19°C na jugu i jugoistoku Srbije, u Beogradu do 14°C. U toku večeri i noći u većini predela očekuje se prestanak padavina, a najduže će se zadržati na severozapadu Srbije. ( Telegraf .rs) BONUS VIDEO PROČITAJTE KLIKOM OVDE NAJVAŽNIJE AKTUELNE VESTI

title: حضور 317 کسب‌وکار در نمایشگاه زنان و تولید ملی
content: به گزارش خبرنگار اجتماعی ، مریم اردبیلی در نشست خبری امروز خود، اظهار کرد: در حال حاضر 20 هزار بانوی سرپرست خانوار و علاقمند به کار مشترک تولیدی با شهرداری تهران شریک ما هستند. وی با بیان اینکه امسال نمایشگاه‌های متعددی در شهر تهران با هدف معرفی و عرضه محصولات زنان سرپرست خانوار برگزار می‌شود، ادامه داد: این نمایشگاه‌ها در بوستان گوفت‌گو و چهار نقطه دیگر از جمله بوستان ملت، باغ فیض، میدان شهدا و بوستان لاله دایر شده‌اند. در این رویدادها، تولیدات پوشاک به ویژه مورد توجه قرار گرفته و محصولات بیش از 3500 زن سرپرست خانوار به نمایش درآمده است. مدیرکل امور زنان و خانواده شهرداری تهران با اشاره به اینکه در این نمایشگاه‌ها، 317 کسب و کار خرد و متوسط حضور دارند، خاطرنشان کرد: بانوانی که تمایل به کارآفرینی دارند، فضای تقریباً رایگان برای عرضه محصولاتشان ارائه می‌شود. حقوق ماهانه بانوان در مراکز توانمندسازی کوثر نزدیک به 100 میلیارد تومان است که از طریق کارآفرینان تأمین می‌شود و نه از بودجه شهرداری. وی افزود، شهرداری به ارائه فضا و حمایت‌های مشاوره‌ای و مددکاری به بانوان سرپرست خانوار می‌پردازد تا آن‌ها بتوانند به استقلال مالی دست یابند. اردبیلی همچنین به مشکلات موجود در فضاهای دستفروشی اشاره کرد و گفت که برخی از این فضاها به باندهایی اختصاص یافته که محصولات چینی می‌فروشند. در این میان، بانوان مولد از حمایت‌های ویژه‌ای برخوردارند تا بتوانند تولیدات خود را به فروش برسانند. وی تأکید کرد که تلاش‌ها برای تأمین حداقل‌های قانون کار برای بانوان در مراکز کوثر ادامه دارد و هدف این است که با همکاری کارآفرینان، بانوان به رشد و موفقیت اقتصادی دست یابند. انتهای پیام/

title: Ricardo Velho e o futuro: «Logo se vê»
content: Ricardo Velho, guarda-redes do Farense, na flash interview da SportTV, após a derrota frente ao FC Porto, por 2-1, na quinta jornada da Liga: [Aguentar o resultado] «Eu e toda a equipa. Foi um todo. Ter os nossos avançados, desde o Tomané até cá atrás aos nossos defesas, fizemos um bom jogo dentro das nossas condições. A equipa está a crescer. Uniu-se e é este espírito que temos de levar para os próximos jogos. É continuar a batalhar e lutar, do primeiro ao último minuto. Infelizmente sofremos golos, mas o futebol é assim. «Esta equipa vai continuar a crescer e vai dar muitas alegrias aos nossos adeptos.» «Foi a união que nos trouxe até aqui, até ao final do jogo a discutir o resultado. Só assim conseguimos os nossos objetivos. Unidos, compactos e tentar jogar o melhor possível. Assim certamente vamos ser felizes futuramente.» [Futuro noutro clube] «Eu faço o meu trabalho todos os dias para tentar evoluir. Continuar a ajudar o Farense. O futuro logo se vê. Neste momento estou empenhado em ajudar o farense e continuar a crescer. Só assim os bons resultados vão aparecer.» [Melhor exibição da carreira?] «Para ser a melhor tínhamos de sair daqui com pontos.»

title: Пименов: «За Батраковым нужно следить еще минимум два сезона»
content: Бывший футболист сборной России Руслан Пименов поделился впечатлениями от игры полузащитника «Локомотива» Алексея Батракова на старте сезона. «Считаю, что уже можно сравнивать Батракова с Лоськовым. По крайней мере, на этом отрезке. У Алексея великолепная статистика. Но за ним еще нужно следить минимум два сезона», — сказал Пименов «РБ Спорт». Батраков забил пять мячей и отдал пять результативных передач в восьми турах РПЛ. В матче 8-го тура РПЛ против «Оренбурга» Батраков оформил дубль и помог команде одержать победу со счетом 4:2.

title: KECMANOVIĆ ZADOVOLJAN POSLE POBEDE NAD GRČKOM Da nastavimo tamo gde smo stali
content: Teniska reprezentacija Srbije pobedila je Grčku sa 3:1 i tako obezbedila opstanak u Svetskoj grupi Dejvis kupa. Nakon pobede se oglasio Miomir Kecmanović i izneo svoje utiske. - Bilo je jako velika tenzija u drugom setu za mene koji sam gledao, svaka čast na borbi momcima, na dobroj igri na kraju. Drago mi je da smo opet u Svetskoj grupi, da nastavimo gde smo stali - kaže Kecmanović. Rekao je i gde će sve nastupati do kraja sezone. - Igraću Peking i Šangaj i par turnita u Evropi i to je to od mene za ovu sezonu. Mislim da sam okej, sad opet ide beton, nadam se da ću uspeti jako da završim ovu godinu. O Hamadu, Maksimoviću i nextgenu je rekao: - Hamad je jako dobar, ima velika oružja, udara jako, snažan je, samo da se to poklopi... Ne može da ne bude dobar i uspešan. Ima toliko dobru igru da teško da ne može da napravi nešto. Samo da bude vredan, samo.je pitanje vremena. Mali Maksa se stvarno trudio, dao sve od sebe, jako fin dečko, drago mi je da je bio sa nama i nadam se da će se ubrzo izboriti da bude stalni član. O dublu u reprezentaciji Srbije: - Uglavom se trudim, igram dublove nekad na turnirima, pokušavam da koliko mogo doprinesem. Fali nam neko ko se time bavi i nadam se da će neko da se pojavi da nam barem malo olakša. Filip Krajinović je i zvanično završio karijeru. - Iskreno, danas malo lakše jer smo već imali naš oproštaj u Njujorku, posle smo imali večeru, tad je bilo baš emotivno i teško prihvatiti da neće biti više tu sa...

title: Chồng nói dối đi làm để "bắt gian" vợ ngoại tình: Kết quả một người mất mạng, một người lĩnh án 13 năm tù
content: Tại một ngôi làng bình thường ở huyện Phương Thành, Nam Dương, tỉnh Hà Nam (Trung Quốc), Lương Quốc Hữu và Lý Phương gặp nhau qua một bà mối. Lương Quốc Hữu là một chàng trai nông thôn giản dị, trong khi Lý Phương là một cô gái sôi nổi đến từ một ngôi làng lân cận. Dưới sự sắp đặt của cha mẹ, họ nhanh chóng trở thành vợ chồng và bắt đầu chung sống. Để nuôi gia đình, anh Lương phải lên thành phố làm việc, còn vợ ở nhà chăm sóc con cái và bố mẹ. Sự xa cách lâu ngày khiến cuộc hôn nhân trở nên mong manh hơn. Lương Quốc Hữu quanh năm vắng nhà, ngay cả khi về nghỉ, anh cũng ít khi trò chuyện với vợ. Lý Phương dần cảm thấy thất vọng và cô đơn với cuộc sống như vậy. Sự hiểu lầm và ghẻ lạnh giữa hai người ngày càng sâu sắc, những rạn nứt trong hôn nhân lặng lẽ xuất hiện. Do chấn thương khi làm việc, anh Lương về quê nghỉ ngơi một thời gian. Những ngày ở nhà, anh nhận thấy vợ có nhiều hành vi bất thường. Cô mỗi ngày đều đi ra ngoài rất lâu, thậm chí có khi còn về nhà vào đêm khuya. Lương Quốc Hữu cố gắng hỏi nhưng luôn nhận được những câu trả lời chiếu lệ. Điều khiến anh nghi ngờ hơn nữa là thái độ của vợ ngày càng trở nên lạnh lùng, thậm chí cô còn...

title: Michał Olszański otrzymał od współpracownic ksywkę "mammograf". Teraz odbiła się czkawką: "Mówił o przekazywaniu energii" (OKIEM PUDELKA)
content: Ostatni tydzień przyniósł w show-biznesie wiele, ale niestety dla celebrytów, niewiele dobrego. W "Okiem Pudelka" przyglądamy się tym, którzy oberwali najbardziej i to nie zawsze niezasłużenie. Macie swoje typy? Od dłuższego czasu jesteśmy świadkami ogromnego kryzysu wizerunkowego Smolastego, który pomimo okupowania szczytów list przebojów, raz po raz rozwściecza fanów i organizatorów koncertów. Popularny performer, choć niebawem będzie to nieadekwatne określenie jego działalności, ma już na koncie kilka odwołanych w ostatniej chwili występów, czym skutecznie niszczy swoją reputację i stawia na szali przyszłą koncertową karierę. Ogromna fala krytyki, ale i zaniepokojenie stanem jego zdrowia sprawiły, że Smolasty w końcu powziął kroki do tego, aby wyjść na prostą. Gwiazdor opublikował krótkie oświadczenie, w którym ze szpitalnego łóżka poinformował o odwołaniu zaplanowanych na najbliższe miesiące występów i skupienie się na powrocie do formy. Nie da się ukryć, że to swojego rodzaju happy end, bo w ostatnich tygodniach sytuacja Smolastego wyglądała gorzej niż źle, a publiczność i organizatorzy koncertów nie mogli się zdecydować kto jest tutaj prawdziwym winowajcą: niestabilny artysta czy pazerny management. Jak zawsze, prawda leży pewnie gdzieś po środku. Reputacja, której dorobił się pop raper, nie wzięła się z powietrza, a plotki w branży krążące o jego "rock’n’rollowym" stylu życia jedynie przybierały na...

title: Desplazamiento forzado causa desnutrición a niños de Chihuahua
creator: La Jornada
content: Chihuahua, Chih.- Cuatro menores indígenas , con cuadros de desnutrición , fueron trasladados vía aérea al Hospital Infantil de Especialidades, desde la comunidad de Cinco Llagas , municipio de Guadalupe y Calvo, a la capital del estado, después de que sus familias fueron desplazadas por el crimen organizado . La Secretaría de Salud estatal informó que personal de brigadas médicas detectó los cuadros de desnutrición y trasladó a los cuatro infantes en avionetas para su atención inmediata , como parte de la ayuda humanitaria que el gobierno del estado proporciona a 300 personas indígenas desplazadas, incluido apoyo en alimentos, medicinas y asesoría jurídica. Se trata de dos niñas y dos niños de entre 1 y 5 años de edad , quienes presentan desnutrición moderada, y permanecerán bajo tratamiento en el albergue de cuidados del Hospital Infantil de Especialidades , en la ciudad de Chihuahua. Desde la detección de los casos se actuó conforme al protocolo de desnutrición y diagnóstico, que se implementa dentro de la estrategia “Juntos por la Sierra Tarahumara”. Como parte de este programa interinstitucional, la Secretaría de Salud mantiene el despliegue de brigadas médicas , integradas por personal que brinda consulta, detección de factores de riesgo, prevención y promoción a la salud, así como entrega de medicamentos. Además, se han suministrado más de 3.8 toneladas de alimento , una tonelada de harina de maíz por parte del DIF estatal, cinco...

title: Real Madrid confirma lesão de Brahim Díaz, que pode ficar até 3 meses afastado
creator: AFP
content: O Real Madrid confirmou neste domingo (15) que o meia marroquino Brahim Díaz sofreu uma lesão muscular durante a vitória sobre a Real Sociedad por 2 a 0 pelo Campeonato Espanhol, o que pode afastá-lo dos gramados por até três meses, segundo a imprensa local. "Após os exames realizados hoje pelo Departamento Médico do Real Madrid, foi diagnosticada uma lesão no adutor longo da perna direita em nosso jogador Brahim Díaz. Evolução pendente", informou em nota o clube merengue, que não deu um prazo de recuperação. Segundo a imprensa espanhola, Díaz deve desfalcar o Real Madrid por um mês, embora o jornal Marca tenha noticiado uma ausência mais longa, de até três meses. Titular contra a Real Sociedad, Brahim Díaz teve que ser substituído aos 23 minutos do primeiro tempo quando levou a mão à parte interior da coxa direita. O meia marroquino se junta a Eduardo Camavinga, Aurélien Tchouaméni, Jude Bellingham, David Alaba e Dani Ceballos em uma longa lista de jogadores lesionados ou em recuperação no departamento médico do Real Madrid.

title: Tripulação da primeira missão espacial privada retorna com sucesso à Terra
creator: redacao@odia.com.br (AFP)
content: A missão Polaris Dawn, da empresa SpaceX, pousou neste domingo (15) na costa da Flórida, Estados Unidos, depois de sua tripulação fazer história com a primeira caminhada espacial realizada por civis. A cápsula Dragon pousou no oceano às 3h37 locais (4h37 de Brasília), segundo imagens transmitidas ao vivo pela empresa de Elon Musk. Uma equipe foi imediatamente enviada para recuperar a nave e os quatro tripulantes. A engenheira da SpaceX, Anna Menon, foi a primeira a sair da nave, sorridente e acenando. Ela foi seguida por Sarah Gillis, também engenheira, o piloto Scott Poteet e o empresário bilionário Jared Isaacman, comandante da missão. Sarah e Anna se tornaram as duas mulheres que viajaram mais longe da Terra. Os principais objetivos da missão, que representa uma nova etapa na exploração comercial do espaço, foram cumpridos. A nave decolou na terça-feira do Centro Espacial Kennedy, na Flórida, e se aventurou no espaço mais longe do que qualquer outra tripulação desde as missões Apollo, há mais de meio século. A missão atingiu uma altitude de 1.400 km, mais de três vezes a distância orbital da Estação Espacial Internacional (EEI). O momento crucial da missão ocorreu na quinta-feira. A bordo da cápsula Dragon, a órbita foi reduzida a cerca de 700 km para a caminhada espacial, na qual Isaacman abriu a escotilha e saiu para o espaço preso a uma estrutura chamada "Skywalker", com uma vista da Terra ao fundo. Ele retornou ao interior da cápsula...

title: Boarding Fee Hike: Parents vow to disrupt school resumption in Lagos
creator: Qosim Suleiman
content: Resumption of staff and students for the 2024/2025 academic session at the Lagos State-owned model colleges may be disrupted by protesting parents over the more than 180 per cent increment in the schools’ boarding fees. In videos obtained by PREMIUM TIMES, protesting parents on Sunday stormed Eva Adelaja Girls Secondary School, Bariga, one of the more than 10 model colleges with boarding systems in the state, and demanded reversal of the decision by the state government. The protesters chanted solidarity songs and carried placards with inscriptions such as “We Say No to this increment,” and “No reversal, No resumption”. Students are supposed to resume for another session on Sunday (today) but the protesting parents have threatened there would be no resumption until the government reverses the fee hike. The Lagos State Government had announced the increment in a memo addressed to the school principles by the state’s education ministry. According to the memo which was signed by the Director of Basic Education Services, Olufemi Asaolu, announced the increment from N35,000 to N100,000. The memo noted that the directive followed the approval by the state government. Support journalism driven by facts, created by Nigerians for Nigerians. title: El partido más especial para Íñigo Pérez: "Vienen amigos..."
content: , actual entrenador del , declaró este domingo que contra tienen que estar "perfectos para poder ganar" y destacó que el potencial del conjunto navarro está "en las transiciones". El técnico pamplonés , club de la ciudad dónde nació y en el que jugó entre 2018 y 2022. " . Es un partido especial para mí", confesó el entrenador del Rayo, que tiene bien estudiado a Osasuna. "El potencial de Osasuna está en las transiciones. Es un equipo difícil de que se sienta incómodo. Si queremos llevarnos los tres puntos tenemos que saber defender estas características e intentar tener el balón", dijo Iñigo Pérez, en conferencia de prensa. "Sabemos que el partido será difícil y tenemos que estar perfectos para poder ganar. Tenemos que atacar continuamente porque ", comentó el técnico navarro, que no quiere que se vuelva a repetir lo ocurrido frente al Espanyol, cuando perdieron en el tiempo añadido. "El equipo ha intentado solucionar lo de Cornellá. El error está antes del ataque final", señaló. Para este partido está disponible Sergi Guardiola, último refuerzo de la plantilla, ya con el mercado cerrado, y también Raúl de Tomás, que espera su oportunidad. "No he tenido la sensación en ningún momento de que Raúl de Tomás pudiera salir en este mercado de fichajes. No me quita el sueño tener jugadores de más. ", finalizó.

title: Houthi missile reaches central Israel, riddling air shield
creator: Dan Williams - Bloomberg News (TNS)
content: A missile fired by Yemen’s Houthis reached central Israel on Sunday, setting off sirens from Tel Aviv to the Jerusalem foothills and apparently breaking up in mid-air as several attempts were made to shoot it down, the Israeli military said. The rebel group, whose long-range attacks on Israel in solidarity with Hamas’ almost year-old war against it from Gaza have mostly been intercepted over the Red Sea, said the missile they used to penetrate the Tel Aviv outskirts was new and hypersonic. They didn’t elaborate on the model. It marked the deepest reach yet for a missile launched from Yemen — some 2,000 km (1,240 miles) away from Israel — by the Houthis, who in July managed to guide a drone into Tel Aviv, where it exploded, killing a local man. Then, Israel retaliated with a counterstrike on Yemen’s Red Sea port of Hodeida the following day. “The Houthis should already have been aware that we exact a heavy price for any attempt to attack us,” Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu said in a statement. “Anyone who needs a reminder is welcome to visit Hodeida.” The military said both the high-altitude Arrow interceptor and the short-range Iron Dome interceptor were repeatedly activated against Sunday’s projectile and that their performance was still under review. “An initial inquiry indicates that the missile most likely fragmented in mid-air,” it said. In March, Tel Aviv University’s Institute for National Security Studies analyzed reports that the Houthis had developed...

title: Jos Buttler ruled out of ODIs- ECB announces New Captain
creator: Krishnakant Kukreti
content: Due to a calf injury, Jos Buttler is not going to play in the upcoming ODI series against Australia. Star batter Harry Brook has been named captain until Buttler stays absent. For this particular series, Liam Livingstone has been named as Buttler’s replacement. Buttler gave his last appearance in June, during the semifinal match against India in the T20 World Cup 2024. His initial idea was to make a comeback during T20 Blast’s knockout rounds, but could not do so, due to a setback in his recovery. Along with that, Brook is going to be leading the Three Lions for the first time in international level. Pace bowler Jos Hull has also been ruled out of the upcoming ODI series because of a quad injury. He made his debut aof England in a recent Test against Sri Lanka. The first game of the 5-match ODI series will take place at Nottingham’s Trent Bridge on Thursday, September 19. The next four matches are set to be held at September 21, 24, 27, and 29 at Leeds, Chester-le-Street, Lord’s, and Bristol, respectively.

title: Un nou tip de înșelătorie. Un șofer de taxi din Suceava a rămas fără 6000 de lei după ce a fost rugat să plătească niște facturi
content: Poliția atrage atenția că o nouă înșelătorie face victime. De data aceasta sunt vizați taximetriștii sau livratorii de mâncare. După ce primesc o comandă, aceștia sunt sunații de persoanele care se dau drept clienți și le cer anumite favoruri, cum ar fi să depună sume de bani la un bancomat cu mențiunea că îi vor recupera în momentul în care se va finaliza comanda, transmite News.ro. Infractorii fac o comandă de mâncare sau de taxi, după care sună șoferii și spun că au nevoie să li încarce o cartelă SIM sau să depună diverse sume la bancomat, cu promisiunea că vor primi înapoi banii şi un comision. Aceștia invocă fel și fel de motive, că sunt bolnavi sau că au grijă de un copil mic și nu pot ieși din casă. Cum a rămas un șofer de taxi din Suceava fără 6000 de lei Cel mai recent caz este cel al unui taximetrist din Suceava care a fost păcălit de un așa zis client să depună la mai multe bancomate de tip self-pay mai multe sume de bani. În total, 6000 de lei a depus, iar când tânărul șofer în vârstă de 25 de ani i-a spus clientului său că nu mai are bani, acesta i-a închis telefonul. Bărbatul înșelat a depus plângere la poliție și se fac cercetări pentru identificarea făptașului. Poliția trage un semnal de alarmă și spune că în ultima vreme a primit tot mai multe plângeri din partea persoanelor care acuză că au fost rugate să facă anumite favoruri clienților, după care aceștia nu au mai...

title: कांग्रेस के दांव का तोड़ निकाल रही BJP, जल्द ही धारा 370 जैसे 2 बड़े कदम
creator: News18 Hindi
content: नई दिल्ली. पीएम नरेंद्र मोदी की अगुवाई वाली एनडीए सरकार अपने इसी कार्यकाल में ‘एक राष्ट्र, एक चुनाव’ को लागू करेगी. इसके साथ ही मोदी सरकार कांग्रेस के हर दांव की काट निकाल रही है. इन कदमों से विपक्ष को भारी झटका लगने की उम्मीद है. बीजेपी के सूत्रों ने यह भी कहा कि जनगणना की प्रक्रिया भी जल्द शुरू होगी. इसके साथ ही चुनाव के बाद कम से कम समय में जम्मू-कश्मीर को राज्य का दर्जा बहाल कर दिया जाएगा. सरकार के सूत्रों ने न्यूज18 को बताया कि ‘एक राष्ट्र, एक चुनाव’ ‘एक हकीकत’ होगा. उन्होंने कहा कि निश्चित रूप से इसे इसी कार्यकाल में लागू किया जाएगा. पिछले महीने स्वतंत्रता दिवस के अवसर पर अपने संबोधन में प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने ‘एक राष्ट्र, एक चुनाव’ की वकालत की थी और तर्क दिया था कि बार-बार चुनाव होने से देश की प्रगति में बाधा आती है. पीएम नरेंद्र मोदी ने लाल किले की प्राचीर से अपने संबोधन में कहा था कि देश को ‘एक राष्ट्र, एक चुनाव’ के लिए आगे आना होगा. प्रधानमंत्री ने राजनीतिक दलों से लाल किले से और राष्ट्रीय तिरंगे को साक्षी मानकर देश की प्रगति सुनिश्चित करने की अपील की थी. प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी के नेतृत्व वाली एनडीए सरकार के तीसरे कार्यकाल के 100 दिन पूरे होने पर सूत्रों ने कहा कि सत्तारूढ़ गठबंधन के भीतर एकजुटता शेष कार्यकाल के लिए जारी रहेगी. उन्होंने पार्टियों से यह सुनिश्चित करने के लिए भी कहा कि राष्ट्रीय संसाधनों का उपयोग आम आदमी के लिए किया जाए. ‘वन नेशन वन इलेक्शन’ बीजेपी का एजेंडा गौरतलब है कि ‘वन नेशन वन इलेक्शन’ बीजेपी द्वारा लोकसभा चुनाव के लिए अपने घोषणापत्र में किए गए प्रमुख वादों में से एक है. इस साल मार्च में पूर्व राष्ट्रपति रामनाथ कोविंद की अध्यक्षता में...

title: СКА одержал победу над «Ладой» со счётом 4:3
content: Петербургский хоккейный клуб СКА провёл свой второй домашний матч нового сезона чемпионата КХЛ, встретившись с тольяттинской «Ладой». В основное время для петербургского клуба забили Марат Хайруллин, Михаил Григоренко и Иван Демидов, который отличился первым голом в своей карьере в КХЛ. «Зыков был на пятаке – и завершает Валя эту игру! Есть победа!», – отметила игру Валентина Зыкова пресс-служба СКА. В следующем матче, который состоится 19 сентября, команда Романа Ротенберга встретится с «Сочи».

title: LaLiga: Το «τρένο» της Μπαρτσελόνα με οδηγό τον Γιαμάλ πέρασε και από την Τζιρόνα με σκορ 4-1
content: Η Μπαρτσελόνα του Χάνσι Φλικ είναι μια... άλλη ομάδα στο ξεκίνημα της σεζόν, επί του παρόντος ασταμάτητη στη LaLiga . Η ομάδα της Βαρκελώνης έδωσε σήμερα ένα ακόμη ποδοσφαρικό «σόου», διαλύοντας τη Τζιρόνα με 4-1, για την 5η αγωνιστική της La Liga, κάνοντας το 5Χ5. Μεγάλος πρωταγωνιστής των «μπλαουγκράνα» το παιδί-θαύμα, ο Λαμίν Γιαμάλ, ο οποίος διέλυσε την αντίπαλη άμυνα, πετυχαίνοντας δύο γκολ (30', 37'), ενώ τα άλλα τέρματα σημείωσαν οι Ολμο (47') και Πέδρι (64'). Αξίζει να σημειωθεί πως το σκορ θα μπορούσε να έχει πάρει μεγαλύτερες διαστάσεις, αν δεν ήταν ο Καζανίγκα να κάνει απίστευτες αποκρούσεις στις... κατά κύματα επιθέσεις της Μπαρτσελόνα. Η ομάδα του Φλικ έχει την καλύτερη επίθεση στο πρωτάθλημα, με 17 γκολ, και μια από τις καλύτερες άμυνες, έχοντας δεχτεί μόλις τρία γκολ. Νωρίτερα, η Θέλτα κατάφερε να λυγίσει την αντίσταση της Βαγιαδολίδ και να πάρει στο Βίγκο τη σημαντική νίκη με 3-1 επί της Βαγιαδολίδ. Ο Τάσος Δουβίκας ήταν στον πάγκο των γηπεδούχων, μπήκε στον αγώνα στο 68ο λεπτό και κατάφερε να σφραγίσει τη νίκη, πετυχαίνοντας το τρίτο γκολ στις καθυστερήσεις. ΑΠΕ-ΜΠΕ

title: PSG sends support to defender Nuno Mendes after racial abuse
creator: AP
content: PARIS (AP) — Paris Saint-Germain defender Nuno Mendes was the target of abusive and racist comments on social media after a French league game . The club condemned the abuse and expressed its "full support” Sunday for the Portugal left back, who was targeted following PSG's 3-1 win against Brest on Saturday. Mendes, who is Black, shared on his Instagram account a racist message he received. During the match, Mendes brought down Ludovic Ajorque in the box for a penalty that Romain Del Castillo converted to give Brest the lead. “Paris Saint-Germain doesn't tolerate racism, antisemitism or any other form of discrimination,” the club said. “The racial insults directed at Nuno Mendes are totally unacceptable ... we are working with the relevant authorities and associations to ensure those responsible are held accountable for their actions.” AP soccer: https://apnews.com/hub/soccer

title: 64 agricultores desaparecidos em naufrágio na Nigéria
creator: portal@cmjornal.pt (Correio da Manhã)
content: 64 pessoas estão desaparecidas e as autoridades acreditam que tenham morrido num naufrágio em Gummi, na Nigéria, no sábado. Segundo a agência Reuters , o barco transportava 70 agricultores que tentavam fazer a travessia para chegar a terras agrícolas. Foi montada uma operação de busca e resgate e foram retiradas seis pessoas com vida. "Esta é a segunda vez que um incidente destes ocorre na área do governo local de Gummi", disse Aminu Nuhu Falale, que liderou as operações. De acordo com a Reuters , mais de 900 agricultores dependem da travessia diária do rio para aceder às suas terras agrícolas, mas apenas dois barcos estão disponíveis, o que leva à sobrelotação e a acidentes.
