title: Camila Fernández cambia la letra del Himno Nacional Mexicano
creator: Sara Pacheco
content: Camila Fernández se convirtió en tendencia en redes sociales tras cometer un error al interpretar el Himno Nacional Mexicano durante la pelea de Saúl “Canelo” Álvarez contra Edgar Berlanga , celebrada el 14 de septiembre en el T-Mobile Arena de Las Vegas . La hija de Alejandro Fernández y nieta de Vicente Fernández equivocó la frase “profanar con su planta tu suelo ”, cambiándola por “profanar con su planta tu tierra” , lo que generó diversas reacciones en redes. Este error generó una ola de reacciones mixtas en redes sociales y entre quienes presenciaron la pelea, por un lado hay quienes critican a Camila por haber cometido una falta de respeto a uno de los tres símbolos patrios de nuestro país, mientras que por otro lado hay quienes defienden a la cantante señalando que fue un error sin malicia que cualquiera podría cometer. Hasta el momento Camila no ha hecho declaraciones públicas respecto a este momento que sin duda marcará sus diez años de carrera. Por su parte, Saúl el “Canelo” Álvarez resultó vencedor contra Berlanga defendiendo su título de superligeros . En redes sociales comenzaron circular videos de la reacción del boxeador en el momento en que Camila comete el error al cantar el himno nacional, en los videos se puede notar la sorpresa de “Canelo” por percibir el cambió que hizo la cantante por equivocación. En un encuentro con la prensa posterior a la pelea se le preguntó su opinión al respecto y se mostró comprensivo con Camila...

title: Cost of living: Making just four simple changes can slash your car fuel costs
creator: website@rsvpmagazine.ie (Erica Carter)
content: While inflation is coming down, the costs of maintaining a car and paying for fuel are still high. Fuel consumption tends to be affected most by your driving style, excessive rapid acceleration, unnecessary short trips, a cold engine, poor car maintenance and incorrect tyre pressure. A less aggressive, energy conscious driving style could save as much as 10% on your fuel costs, according to the Sustainable Energy Authority of Ireland. Read more: Cost of living Ireland: Everything we know about Budget 2025 - social welfare, workers & families Read more: Parents set for double Child Benefit to be paid before Christmas There are some thing you can do to save money on your fuel - in fact, there are four key steps you can take, according to MoneySavingExpert.com . Combined with more efficient driving habits, you can stand to save up to 30% on your fuel costs. Lower tyre pressures increase drag on a car, meaning you need more fuel. Regularly check the pressures are correct (overinflating will also use more fuel) and your car will need less oomph to keep it moving. A roof rack, even unused, adds wind resistance to a car, increasing drag and making the engine work harder. If you don't need it, take it off, along with anything else inefficient. Even closing the windows and removing any flags will make the car run slightly more efficiently. Air-conditioning uses engine power and therefore fuel – so make sure it's turned off unless you really need it. The general consensus is it's more...

title: VIDEO Lotus zagolicao maštu fanova. Pokazao djelić novog sportskog auta
content: LOTUS prelazi na električni pogon, što potvrđuju njegovi modeli SUV Emeya i limuzina Eletre. Emira je, pak, posljednje vozilo s motorom na benzin u ponudi marke i preživjet će još samo nekoliko godina. No to ne znači da nećemo vidjeti sportske automobile u sklopu nove strategije elektrifikacije Lotusa. Prvi (barem u obliku koncepta) bit će predstavljen 16. rujna. "Digitalno, prirodno i analogno" Lotus je na društvenim mrežama objavio tri videa koja najavljuju sljedeći sportski automobil. Lotus ga naziva Theory 1 i koristi riječi poput "digitalno", "prirodno" i "analogno" za njegovo opisivanje, s namjerom da evocira zlatne dane automobilske marke. Zasad samo koncept Iz onoga što možemo vidjeti u teaseru, vozilo ima tanke trake svjetala na stražnjem dijelu s oznakom "Lotus". Ima Kammback-stil stražnjeg dijela i agresivan spojler na vrhu. S tih kutova svakako ne izgleda kao Emeya ili Eletre. Ime Theory 1 sugerira da je riječ samo o konceptu, no može poslužiti kao predočavanje budućeg proizvodnog superautomobila ili sportskog automobila. Novi Lotus coupe trebao je biti predstavljen 2027. godine, koji je tvrtka kodirala kao Type 135, no možda će biti odgođen zbog problema s tehnologijom baterija. Taj EV trebao bi konkurirati nadolazećim Porscheovim električnim modelima. Glasine sugeriraju da bi ovaj električni sportski automobil imao 469 konjskih snaga u osnovnoj verziji i do 872 konjske snage s modelom s dvostrukim motorom, dok bi cijena počinjala...

title: Пропустили сім голів. Збірна України з футзалу стартувала на ЧС-2024 з поразки від Аргентини
content: Збірна України з футзалу (Фото:УАФ) Збірна України розпочала виступи на чемпіонаті світу з футзалу 2024 року. У першому матчі групового етапу синьо-жовті поступилися Аргентині з рахунком 1:7. Українці відкрили рахунок наприкінці першого тайму: влучним ударом відзначився Петро Шотурма. Утім, ще до перерви Аргентина зуміла не лише відігратись, а й вийти уперед. Спершу Кевін Арр'єта реалізував пенальті, а згодом Алан Бранді забив другий гол південноамериканців. Одразу після перерви аргентинці збільшили перевагу зусиллями Матіаса Роси. У середині тайму голи Крістіана Борруто та дубль Арр'єти фактично закріпили перемогу « альбіселесте». Наприкінці поєдинку Аргентина забила ще два м’ячі. Груповий етап, 1-й тур Аргентина — Україна — 7:1 Голи: Арр'єта, 19 ( пенальті), 32, Бранді, 19, Роса, 21, Борруто, 30, 40, Алемані, 38 — Шотурма, 18 Після першого туру Україна посідає останнє місце у групі. У наступному матчі синьо-жовті 18 вересня зіграють з Анголою, яка на старті ЧС програла Афганістану 4:6. На нашому сайті можна глянути повний розклад і результати матчів на ЧС-2024 . Теги: збірна України з футзалу Збірна Аргентини Футзал Якщо ви знайшли помилку в тексті, виділіть її мишкою і натисніть Ctrl + Enter

title: FC Porto-Farense, 2-1 (crónica)
content: Futebol ao sol e à sombra, como escreveu Eduardo Galeano: 15h30, casa cheia, gente de sorriso no rosto. Que bonita é uma matiné de futebol! Que raro é isto acontecer para a Liga Portuguesa, no Dragão – há quase meia dúzia de anos que não havia jogo neste horário (desde dezembro 2018). Parecia as Antas nos idos 90 num duelo com um histórico, embora já sem o aroma marroquino do futebol de Hassan ou Hadjry pelos leões de Faro, ou a classe de Deco e o instinto matador de Jardel pelos dragões da Invicta. Há protagonistas diferentes e «do banco o Farense partiu a ganhar», como disse na véspera Vítor Bruno, comparando os seus cinco jogos como técnico principal contra os quase 500 de carreira de José Mota. O técnico portista remodelou a defesa, recuperou João Mário (por troca com Martim Fernandes) e lançou de início os reforços Nehuén Pérez e Francisco Moura, adiantando Galeno e tendo deixado de fora também Zé Pedro e Vasco Sousa. Dos restantes Samu Omorodin ficou no banco, adiando por mais um jogo a sua assunção como titular na frente de ataque; e Fábio Vieira, lesionado, Tiago Djaló e Deniz Gül não constaram sequer da ficha de jogo. O entusiasmo da matiné deu lugar a um filme de suspense, que se prolongou até ao intervalo. O 4-2-3-1 portista balanceado para o ataque até encostou o Farense às cordas, sem, contudo, chegar ao KO. Era como um Rocky Balboa vigoroso no ringue, porém com uma série de uppercuts falhados. Logo aos 3m, já se gritava...

title: 'Government must stop giving away beach space for deckchairs' - Sandra Gauci
creator: Jessica Arena
content: The government must stop giving away precious space on beaches for operators to fill up with deck chairs, ADPD leader Sandra Gauci said on Sunday. Gauci was speaking at a protest at Buġibba's Perched Beach, where St Paul's Bay residents and NGOs Flimkien għa lAmbjent Aħjar and Moviment Graffitti occupied the small free patch of sand typically taken up by the tables and chairs of a nearby beach club. Struggling to be heard against music blaring from the club, the leader of Malta's green party said the situation on the beach was emblematic of a problem affecting most beaches across Malta and Gozo. She said that with the blessing of a permit, beach club operators had been given free reign to occupy every inch of the beach and pollute the area with unending noise and loud music. “Why should we have to pay to come down to swim and enjoy our beaches,“ she said. “I am not ready to put up with this noise when I want to enjoy the beach in peace just because someone has a permit. We resident came to live here to enjoy the sea not to be plagued by rats and mountains of garbage.” Gauci said that by continuing to approve permits for deck chairs and tables and chairs, the government was harming people’s quality of life. She encouraged the public to speak up and fight back against the encroachment of businesses onto beaches, warning if they did not, the situation would only get worse. “We have to fight for every centimeter, and the centimeters you don’t fight for today you will lose next...

title: Iranian Navy's 98th fleet returns from Red Sea mission
content: TEHRAN – The Iranian Army's Navy's 98th Fleet has returned to its home base in Bandar Abbas after successfully completing its mission in the Red Sea. The fleet, comprised of the destroyer Jamaran and the support vessel Bushehr, spent over 126 days safeguarding Iran's maritime communication routes in the Gulf of Aden and the Red Sea. The fleet's arrival at Bandar Abbas on September 15, 2024, was met with a welcoming ceremony led by Iranian Navy commanders. Rear Admiral Babak Baluch, Deputy Coordinator of the Strategic Navy of Iran's Army, highlighted the significance of the mission's successful completion for Iran's national security. He emphasized the Jamaran's effectiveness in ensuring the safety of Iranian maritime communication lines, as well as the country's commercial and oil tankers, amidst a challenging military environment in the region. Admiral Baluch further noted that the 99th Fleet, consisting of the destroyer Dena and the support vessel Bushehr, is currently deployed in the Gulf of Aden, Bab al-Mandab Strait, and the Red Sea, continuing to protect Iran's national interests. The 98th Fleet plays a crucial role in Iran's naval defense strategy, actively patrolling international waters and key regional routes to safeguard Iranian maritime interests and shipping routes. The fleet's operations contribute to Iran's efforts to promote peace and security in the region.

title: Sami Uotilasta eronnut Kerttu Rissanen saapui TTK-studiolle –näin hän kommentoi ex-parin välejä nyt
content: Kisaajien joukossa on myös Kerttu Rissasen ex-puoliso näyttelijä Sami Uotila . Pari ilmoitti erostaan elokuussa sosiaalisessa mediassa. – Tulin kannustamaan Samia ja toki kaikkia muitakin. Näissä lähetyksissä on aina jotain taikaa ja pukuloistoa, Rissanen tunnelmoi IS:lle. – Olemme hyviä ystäviä, Rissanen tarkentaa nykyisiä välejään Uotilaan. Ensimmäiseksi perintöprinsessaksi valittiin Tiia Aalto ja toiseksi perintöprinsessaksi Amanda Hakalax . Rissanen istui lauantaina kisan tuomaristossa. Hän ylistää voittajakolmikkoa. – He ovat kaikki aivan upeita ja omalla tavallaan lahjakkaita. Olen tosi tyytyväinen meidän valintoihin, Rissanen toteaa.

title: Culiacanazo sigue: Balacean a mujer, secuestran a 3 y hallan 5 muertos con sombrero
creator: Redacción GH
content: SINALOA.- Este domingo 15 de septiembre, alrededor de las 5:00 horas de la mañana, la capital del estado de Sinaloa , Culiacán , volvió a vivir momentos de terror. Un violento ataque armado en la colonia Miguel Hidalgo dejó como saldo la muerte de una joven de 19 años y el secuestro de tres personas más . Este incidente se suma a otros hechos violentos que han sacudido a la región, reflejando la constante escalada de inseguridad. La joven que perdió la vida fue identificada por las autoridades como Daniela “N” , de 19 años de edad. El ataque ocurrió en su domicilio, el cual fue asaltado por un grupo armado que, además de acabar con su vida, privó de la libertad a tres miembros de su familia , cuyas identidades no han sido reveladas hasta el momento. Según testigos y reportes preliminares, el ataque fue sorpresivo y violento. Los agresores ingresaron a la vivienda y, utilizando la fuerza, sacaron a los familiares de Daniela, llevándolos en camionetas a un destino desconocido. Las autoridades fueron alertadas por un llamado de emergencia, pero al llegar, solo encontraron a la joven sin vida. La ola de violencia no se detuvo ahí. Un segundo hecho violento ocurrió poco después, alrededor de las 6:50 de la mañana, cerca de la carretera México-Nogales, en la salida Sur de Culiacán. En este lugar, se localizaron los cuerpos de cinco hombres , todos ellos con impactos de bala . Las víctimas, de entre 25 y 35 años de edad, fueron encontradas sin camisas, algunos...

title: Many people are missing after a boat capsizes in Nigeria, authorities say
content: At least 40 people have drowned in a boat accident on a river in northwest Nigeria, said President Bola Tinubu on Sunday (September 15, 2024). The accident happened in Zamfara state, as farmers were trying to get to their land, said Mr. Tinubu in a statement. The president promised support for the victims and directed emergency agencies to assess the incident. Yazid Abubakar, a police spokesperson in Zamfara, told media that the accident happened on Saturday (September 15, 2024) and that five people were rescued, but 40 are still missing. It was not immediately clear how many people were on the boat when it went down. The boat was carrying mostly farmers who use the crossing regularly to sell produce at the markets and locals say they’re often overloaded. Zamfara state is rampant with armed groups who kidnap for ransom, steel cattle and engage in illegal mining. Boat accidents are common in remote communities across Nigeria because of overloading and boats that are in poor condition. In August, more than 20 people died in a boat accident on a river in southern Nigeria after the engine exploded. Most boats don’t carry life jackets or have proper safety measures in place, say locals. Published - September 15, 2024 10:10 pm IST Copy link Email Facebook Twitter Telegram LinkedIn WhatsApp Reddit Nigeria / disaster and accident

Tua Tagovailoa concussion: Dolphins QB currently has no plans to retire ahead of meeting with neurologists
creator: Shanna McCarriston
content: Miami Dolphins quarterback Tua Tagovailoa suffered his third documented NFL concussion after lowering his shoulder and colliding his head with Buffalo Bills safety Damar Hamlin on Thursday night. Tagovailoa limped off under his own power after laying on the ground for a few minutes, and he was immediately ruled out of the game with a concussion. Tagovailoa is the only NFL quarterback over the past five seasons to enter the concussion protocol three times, which has led to many in NFL circles -- including former and current players and coaches -- to suggest the Dolphins QB prioritize his health and consider retirement. Tagovailoa currently has no plans to retire ahead of a Monday meeting with specialists, per NFL Network's Ian Rapoport , in a report confirmed by ESPN's Adam Schefter later Sunday morning: "He still would like to continue playing and doesn't have any plans to retire." While the 26-year-old does have the option to medically retire, if that's what he ultimately decides, Tagovailoa will first meet with specialists. The Dolphins and coach Mike McDaniel are leaving all decision making in the hands of their player and his doctors with no existing timeline for a call to be made. Tagovailoa admittedly considered retirement after the 2022 season but said it would be difficult for him to walk away from the game, especially considering his youth. He mentioned wanting to play long enough for his son to know he was watching his father on the field. "I love the game of...

title: Vorarlberg bietet Ostösterreich Hilfe an
content: "Wir stehen bereit, in den betroffenen Regionen mit den benötigten Ressourcen zu unterstützen“, betonte der Landeshauptmann am Sonntagabend. Auch Sicherheitslandesrat Christian Gantner (ÖVP) sagte gegenüber dem ORF, er stehe im laufenden direkten Kontakt mit seinen Amtskollegen in den betroffenen Gebieten. Etwaige Hilfe werde mit dem Landesfeuerwehrinspektor, dem Rettungs- und dem Militärkommandanten koordiniert. Aktuelle Lage und Spenden Das aktuell Lagebild liefert der Liveticker des ORF (news.ORF.at). Spenden sammelt der ORF mit der Aktion Österreich hilft Österreich . Pumpen und Material „Wir können verschiedene Pumpen unterschiedlicher Größe sowie weiteres Material zur Verfügung stellen“, so Gantner. Dazu gehören große Pumpen aus Lustenau, Wolfurt und Thüringen sowie Schlammpumpen aus Göfis, Lauterach, Mellau und Langen bei Bregenz. Zudem stehen auch Kleinpumpen direkt vom Landesfeuerwehrverband bereit. Hilfe steht auf Abruf bereit „Die Entscheidung, ob und welche Hilfe benötigt wird, liegt natürlich bei den betroffenen Bundesländern. Wir haben gemeinsam mit Landesfeuerwehrinspektor Herbert Österle alles vorbereitet, um sofort zu helfen, wenn der Bedarf besteht“, so der Landeshauptmann. Heer und Rettung bieten ebenfalls Hilfe an Das Bundesheer, insbesondere die Pionierkräfte, sind österreichweit in Alarmbereitschaft. VIDEO: Záverečný špurt pretekov mužov na ME 2024 Na európskom šampionáte sa zišla kvalitná konkurencia, čo nebýva pravidlom. Tento rok však cestné preteky na MS vo Švajčiarsku šprintérom vyhovovať nebudú, a tak šampionát v Belgicku bol pre viacerých z nich posledným významným podujatím v sezóne. Merlier sa dokázal presadiť, hoci Belgičania si nepripravili jednotnú tímovú taktiku a jeho súperom v špurte bol aj jeho krajan Jasper Philipsen, ktorý napokon obsadil 4. priečku. title: Murat Kurum'un TOKİ mağdurları meydanda isyan etti
content: TOKİ 'nin Tuzla'daki konut projelerinde taksit ve konut bedellerinin artması nedeniyle mağdur olan hak sahipleri, bugün seslerini duyurmak için bir protesto düzenledi. Tuzla Belediyesi Gençlik Gemisi önünden Tuzla Sahil Tören Alanı'na yürüyen mağdurlar, "Mağdurlar burada Murat Kurum nerede?" ve "Mağduruz, haklıyız, kazanacağız" sloganlarıyla taleplerini dile getirdi. Eyleme, Tuzla Belediye Başkanı Eren Ali Bingöl de destek vererek mağdurların yanında yer aldı. Hak sahipleri, sabit ödeme ve yüzde 1 KDV oranı taleplerini yeniden vurguladı. Mağdurların sözcüsü Fırat Balta şunları söyledi: "MURAT KURUM VERDİĞİ SÖZÜ TUTMADI" "2019 yılında Cumhurbaşkanı Erdoğan , Çevre ve Şehircilik Bakanı Murat Kurum ve Berat Albayrak tarafından müjdelenen sosyal konutlar 1,5 sene içerisinde yapılacak sözünü vermişlerdi. En az 190 bin, en fazla 250 bin TL olacak şeklinde bizlere vaat etmişlerdi. Ödemeler devlet bankalarından 0,49 sabit taksit şeklinde olacak, KDV'ler yüzde 1 olacaktı. Hak sahipleri belirlendikten sonra 2023 yılına kadar hiçbir somut adım atılmadı. Sabır ve umutla bizler bu dairelerin yapılmasını bekledik. Dönemin Çevre ve Şehircilik Bakanı Murat Kurum genel seçimler öncesi bizlere, başlangıç şartları değişmeyecek diye söz verdi. Söz verdiği halde sözlerini birinci dönemde tutmadı. Ve sonrasında TOKİ resmi sitesinde aynı açıklamalarla birlikte duyurular yaptı. 2023 yılı sonunda fiyatlar ve yeni şartlar açıklandı....

title: Texas mom and sex offender boyfriend arrested as fisherman finds body of infant girl inside backpack
creator: Ayeesha Walsh
content: A Texas mother has been arrested alongside her boyfriend after the were discovered at an Abilene lake. The Abilene Police Department received a call at about 9pm on August 31 from a fisherman who said he'd found a backpack on the shore of Lake Ft. Phantom Hill containing the body of an infant girl. Police immediately launched an investigation following the . Heather Rose Kennedy, 20, and Donald Schultz, 35, both of Abilene, were taken into custody by authorities early on Friday morning to be charged over the death. Kennedy has been charged with , while Schultz has been charged with tampering with a human corpse and failure to comply with the sex offender Registry. Police confirmed that an anonymous tip to Crime Stoppers led them to identify the suspects and subsequently arrest and charge them. Kennedy told police the infant was in the custody of her father in Idaho, according to court documents seen by . When she was questioned about the baby's whereabouts, she stopped talking and requested a lawyer. Schultz, however, confessed that the infant had been living with the couple in Abilene, according to court documents. He claimed she had died in her car seat while the couple were sleeping. A witness also claimed the girl was found dead at her home and had been kept there for two to four days before the couple took her body to Lake Fort Phantom Hill near Sea Bee Park, court documents stated. Police say Schultz told them he and Kennedy used a red and black tool back to dispose of...

title: Gisèle Pélicot is a one-woman challenge to the still too common myths about rape
content: Dominique Pélicot is on trial in France, accused of drugging and filming his then wife, Gisèle, while strangers, recruited through a now-defunct chatroom called Against Her Knowledge, raped her. Fifty other men aged between 26 and 74 are also on trial for their alleged involvement. Detectives were unable to identify and trace more than 30 other men who were recorded. The 71-year-old former electrician, whom illness may prevent appearing in court this week, has been called "the Monster of Avignon"; as yet, there is no sobriquet for the many locals who reportedly visited the house in the village of Mazan, including a fireman, a nurse and a journalist – "ordinary men". Bravely, Gisèle Pélicot, 72, has waived her right to anonymity to seek justice for all women who are victims of voyeurism, drug rape and secret surveillance, an unholy trinity of crime that can turn a 21st-century "smart" home into a chamber of horrors. Some of the accused claim that she had given consent, an issue at the heart of most rapes. "I was a dead woman," she said quietly in an electrifying testimony at the criminal court in Avignon. "These people knew exactly what they were doing... They treated me like a rag doll." Pélicot told the court that her calm demeanour masked "a field of devastation". She is a one-woman challenge to the many myths that surround rape and obscure the reality that in a misogynistic patriarchal society such as the UK, less than 3% of rapes result in charges, much less a...

title: Australia's decades of harmful policy will be repaid in intergenerational trauma, and inquiries can only do so much
content: How many more inquiries into the decades-long consequences of bad policy must we live through? How many more times must the traumatic legacy of lives damaged by the state and its agencies be presented in tearful testimony to well-meaning commissioners? How many more carefully calibrated recommendations must pile up waiting for consideration by interdepartmental committees? How many possible solutions will be pushed to the too-hard basket? How many politicians must say sorry, before rinsing and repeating? Over the past three decades there have been dozens of inquiries addressing how the wrongs of the past have devastated lives. I wouldn't be surprised if Australia had set a world record; the reports have certainly created a tragically rich body of mistakes, data, cases, and stories. Stolen children, deaths in custody, stolen wages, forced child migrants, mothers whose babies were taken and children brutalised in custody. Victims of nuclear testing, asbestos, chemicals, poisoned water, sexual abuse, institutional abuse. Mistreatment in care of the most vulnerable aged, disabled, and young. Robodebt. Organisational cultures that protect bullies and predators. Failure to act on the data that is assiduously collected and that – had it been acted on – might have saved lives. 2:58 Marles tables royal commission report into defence and veteran suicide – video And more. On and on they go. This week we were reminded that, despite scores of inquiries, three veterans a fortnight take...

title: Trump's fantasy that migrants are eating cats proves the meme has prevailed over real politics
content: If one town could be emblematic of the vicissitudes of blue-collar life in America, Springfield, Ohio, might be as good a pick as any. At the heart of the midwest, Springfield's prosperity was built on manufacturing and publishing. But its decline began early. The giant Crowell-Collier publishing plant closed on Christmas Eve 1956. Three decades later, in 1983, Newsweek dedicated a whole issue to Springfield. Entitled "The American Dream", it concluded sadly that "The times have not been hospitable to dreaming". The years that followed proved even less hospitable as manufacturers deserted the town and wages plummeted. A 2016 Pew Research report found that Springfield had lost more high-income earners and gained more low-income earners than any other metropolitan area in America. The town became stalked by the diseases of despair that now haunt many other post-industrial working-class communities, from soaring alcohol and opioid addiction to rising numbers of suicides. Then, a decade ago, the city council crafted a programme to draw in new employers, including food-service firms and logistics companies, an Amazon warehouse and a microchip maker. Thousands of new jobs were created, though most remained poorly paid. The problem now became not too few jobs for the workers, but too few workers for the jobs. And, so, migrants came in to fill the gap, mainly Haitians living legally elsewhere in America. The influx of migrants helped revive a dying city. It also created tensions, as...

title: The new owner of the Spectator didn't cough up £100m just for the fun of it
content: 'Expect the unexpected" is the bland but pointed advice given by the evasive editor of the Daily Beast to the bemused William Boot, accidental protagonist in Evelyn Waugh's deathless Fleet Street satire, Scoop. This has turned out to be durable counsel when observing the ins and outs of newspaper proprietors: much that is solid has a tendency to melt. So the Spectator (for which I worked in the late 1990s under the Telegraph Group ownership of Conrad Black) had a long period under the sway of the Barclay family, which has come to a debt-laden crashing close. The weekly magazine has been sold for a reassuringly high £100m to the hedge funder Sir Paul Marshall, after an Abu Dhabi-backed bid to buy it collapsed amid concerns that state-backed entities should not own UK news outlets. The Daily Telegraph and its Sunday sister have attracted last-round bids from Marshall, a former Lib Dem and later Brexiter (though not at the same time) who has clearly decided that he is prepared to empty considerable pockets into UK media via his backing for the rightwing GB News channel and eclectic UnHerd website. In a donkey derby of remaining bidders, the recipe is ideological with a major injection of investment or private equity cash. Despite promises to 'protect editorial independence', the culture and presence of a changed ownership is always felt Many thousands of miles away in Nevada, the future shape of the nonagenarian Rupert Murdoch's vast News Corp will be decided in the coming...

title: Kate's 'Eat, Pray, Picnic' video vibe was corny but the subtext was clear: I've changed
content: Give the Princess of Wales her due, she got our full attention with that video. Posted on Instagram to mark the completion of chemotherapy to treat her cancer, and her reintroduction to public life, filmed by Will Warr in rural Norfolk, it was instant PR dynamite. The Veronica Beard boho dress (a sell-out, naturally). Those flickering sepia-soaked scenes with Prince William and the children; wheat fields, haystacks, hugs, kisses. The heartfelt voiceover, and overall "Eat, Pray, Picnic" vibe, all pulsing with keynotes: home, family, recovery and hard-earned positivity. How fascinating. Pointed. Revealing. You could appreciate why some fellow cancer sufferers might find it overly photogenic and filtered, and not just in terms of the images. Might the rupture with Harry and Meghan be playing into it? Probably. (When does it not?) It's also telling how the video swerves palaces, grandeur and other jarring wealth motifs (mindful that British people are under financial pressure?). After the cyclone of scrutiny surrounding her diagnosis, one could easily imagine Kate feeling pressured into appeasing the ever-ravenous double-headed triffid of media and public. Rarefied regal reserve doesn't cut it these days. Red meat must be thrown to the hounds. All these could be significant factors, but are they the only ones – and are they the core motivators? Beyond the surprise of it all (the wafting about in the £595 peasant-dress, the Boden-mysticism, the pastoral smooching), is something...

title: Unappealing as some life peers are, entitled lords are defending the indefensible
content: Say what you like about Charlotte Owen, Boris Johnson's pet baroness, but for an accepted nonentity she is doing valuable work. Valuable, that is, to hereditary peers. It is the young baroness's achievement, with the help of some similarly resented colleagues, to make the hereditaries look – almost – legit. Now that Labour has returned to the task, bungled by Tony Blair, of abolishing hereditary peers in the House of Lords, the endangered peers have in turn resumed their primary activity of defending the indefensible: themselves. The ritual arguments are as desperate as ever. Already, half-forgotten apparitions like the 2nd Baron Strathclyde, whose title goes back all the way to 1955, are working themselves up, demanding to know why, basically, elected politicians didn't ask permission before tinkering with privileges 92 men are still able to acquire due to being, as David Lloyd George once put it, "first of the litter. You would not choose a spaniel on these principles". "Twenty-five years ago, countless debates and questions took place in the House," Strathclyde has informed Baroness Smith, leader of the House, "and, ultimately, we finished up with a consensual way forward agreed among the parties". Ah. Those would be the events the hereditary Lord Caithness described as "the plague of 99". The deal whereby Blair's government agreed, idiotically, to spare 92 hereditaries who would be replaced as and when, via elections (usually among hereditaries), of like-for-like...

title: Egnatia u kthehet fitoreve
content: Egnatia ka marrë një fitore bindëse sot për të lënë pas krahëve humbjen e mesjavës ndaj Vllaznisë . Rrogozhinasit kanë mundur me rezultat të pastër 4-0 Bylisin, në një ndeshje ku treguan potencialin e tyre. Dueli ishte i hapur me raste në të dy portat derisa vendasit gjetën golin e parë me Ahmetajn. Nga ai moment, thuajse u luajt gjithmonë me një portë dhe erdhën me radhë breshëria e golave të tjerë me anë të Xhemajlit, përsëri Ahmetajt e në fund Ndrecës, për të vulosur një sukses shumë bindës që lë pak vende për diskutim.

title: Jose Mourinho: Skor güzel ama oyunu beğenmedim
content: Haberin Devamı Süper Lig 'in 5. haftasında Kasımpaşa'yı deplasmanda 2-0 mağlup eden Fenerbahçe 'de teknik direktör Jose Mourinho maç sonrası konuştu. "İKİNCİ YARIDA OYUNU BEĞENMEDİM" Skor güzel, oyunu ilk yarıda iyi kontrol ettik. İkinci yarı takımı beğenmedim. İlk yarıdaki hırsı ikinci yarıda göstermedik. Çok hata yaptık, sanki oyuncular 3 puanı alıp eve gitmek istiyor gibiydi. Ancak milli arada oyuncular rutinini kaybedebilir, o yüzden 3 puanı almak önemli bizim için. "BİR HIRS PROBLEMİMİZ VARDI" Çok fazla top kaybı yaptık, topu tutamadık. İkinci yarıdaki tek pozisyonumuz kornerden Çağlar ile geldi. Bir hırs problemimiz vardı ve ben daha farklı şekilde olmasını tercih ederdim. 2-0 oyuncuları rahatlatmış gibiydi. Ancak kazanmayı bildik.

title: MRB cooperates with Emerald Developments to develop Stone Capital at New Capital

content: Mohamed Rashid, CEO of MRB Holding Group, announced the adoption of an integrated strategic plan after merging a group of companies under its umbrella, in preparation for its launching in a different way within the Egyptian real estate market during the coming period, showing that his group intends to change the concept of project management companies, to achieve the maximum benefit for real estate projects in all their forms, whether residential, commercial or administrative. Rashid noted that MRB cooperated with Emerald Developments to launch its latest project in the New Administrative Capital, a mixed-use mall on 6,600 sqm, with total investments amounting to approximately EGP 3bn. title: मोदी 3.0 के 100 दिन का रिपोर्टकार्ड, 4 राज्‍यों में चुनाव से पहले कहां सबसे ज्‍यादा फोकस?
content: नई दिल्‍ली: भारतीय जनता पार्टी (BJP) नीत राष्ट्रीय जनतांत्रिक गठबंधन (NDA) सरकार ने अपने अपने तीसरे कार्यकाल के पहले 100 दिनों के दौरान तीन लाख करोड़ रुपये की बुनियादी ढांचा परियोजनाओं को मंजूरी दी है। इसमें 25,000 गांवों को सड़क नेटवर्क से जोड़ना और महाराष्ट्र के वधावन में एक विशाल बंदरगाह का निर्माण शामिल है। सरकार का बुनियादी ढांचे के अलावा कृषि पर भी फोकस रहा है। इस अवधि में उसने खरीफ फसलों के लिए न्यूनतम समर्थन मूल्य (एमएसपी) में बढ़ोतरी की। प्याज और बासमती चावल पर न्यूनतम निर्यात मूल्य (एमईपी) को हटाया। कच्चे पाम, सोयाबीन और सूरजमुखी तेलों के आयात शुल्क में इजाफा किया। प्रधानमंत्री नरेंद्र मोदी ने इस साल नौ जून को लगातार तीसरी बार पदभार ग्रहण किया। मोदी सरकार का जोर नीतिगत मोर्चे पर स्थिरता प्रदान करने पर रहा है। मूल अवधारणा को कमजोर किए बिना शुरुआती समस्याओं को दूर करने के लिए कुछ बदलावों को अपनाने के लिए लचीला दृष्टिकोण अपनाया गया है। इसका एक उदाहरण वस्तु एवं सेवा कर (जीएसटी) है, जिसमें टकराव कम करने के लिए 140 बदलाव किए गए हैं। वधावन बंदरगाह को मंजूरी सरकार ने महाराष्ट्र में 76,200 करोड़ रुपये की लागत से विशाल वधावन बंदरगाह को मंजूरी दी, जो दुनिया के शीर्ष 10 बंदरगाहों में से एक होगा। प्रधानमंत्री ग्रामीण सड़क योजना-4 (पीएमजीएसवाई-IV) के तहत 49,000 करोड़ रुपये की केंद्रीय सहायता से 25,000 गांवों को पक्की सड़क से जोड़ने के लिए 62,500 किलोमीटर सड़कों और पुलों के निर्माण/उन्नयन को मंजूरी दी गई। इनमें से कई गांवों की आबादी 100 से कम है। सरकार ने 50,600 करोड़ रुपये के निवेश से भारत के सड़क नेटवर्क को मजबूत करने को भी मंजूरी दी है। इसमें 936 किलोमीटर लंबी आठ राष्ट्रीय...

title: Liga : Avec ses pépites Lamine Yamal et Dani Olmo, le Barça se balade à Gérone et réalise un début de saison canon
creator: A.H. avec AFP (20 Minutes)
content: Et si, l’année dernière, le problème du Barça, se nommait Xavi . Malades la saison passée, les Catalans semblent complètement guéris depuis la fin du mois d’août et l’arrivée de l’antidote Hansi Flick . Le coach allemand a complètement transformé les Blaugrana, avec un pressing énorme, un jeu plus vertical et une réussite offensive monstre, avec 17 buts en 5 matchs. Le FC Barcelone, porté par ses champions d’Europe espagnols Lamine Yamal , auteur d’un doublé, Dani Olmo et Pedri, a signé ce dimanche une cinquième victoire en cinq journées en allant battre largement Gérone (1-4), la surprise de la saison passée, dans le derby catalan, et conserve la tête du championnat. Doublé pour Lamine Yamal Le club blaugrana, toujours invaincu et premier de Liga avec 15 points et 17 buts en cinq rencontres, se déplacera jeudi à Monaco en pleine confiance pour la première journée de Ligue des champions, tandis que Gérone ira à Paris mercredi sans certitude pour ses grands débuts en coupe d'Europe. Le prodige catalan Lamine Yamal, 17 ans , a parfaitement lancé les siens avec un doublé en sept minutes (30e, 37e), avant que ses coéquipiers en sélection Dani Olmo et Pedri ne creusent l’écart en seconde période (47e, 64e) pour couronner une nouvelle prestation collective convaincante des hommes d’Hansi Flick. Gérone, bien moins séduisant que la saison passée, a sauvé l’honneur par son vétéran uruguayen Cristhian Stuani, 37 ans (80e), dans une fin de...

title: Kahramanmaraş'ta baraj göletinde ailesinin gözü önünde boğuldu
content: Kahramanmaraş'ta merkez Onikişubat ilçesinin Suçatı Mahallesi'nde ailesiyle birlikte baraj göleti kenarına pikniğe giden Ahmed Akrağ, serinlemek için suya girdi. Akrağ, bir süre sonra yardım istemeye başladı ve ardından gözden kayboldu. EKİPLER SEVK EDİLDİ Ailesinin ihbarı üzerine olay yerine jandarma, sağlık ve Kahramanmaraş Büyükşehir Belediyesi İtfaiye Daire Başkanlığı'na bağlı su altı arama kurtarma ekibi sevk edildi. CANSIZ BEDENİNE ULAŞILDI Dalgıçların yaklaşık yarım saatlik arama-kurtarma çalışması sonrasında Ahmed Akrağ'ın cansız bedenine ulaşıldı. Olay yerinde yapılan incelemenin ardından Akrağ'ın cenazesi otopsi için Kahramanmaraş Adli Tıp Kurumu morguna götürüldü.

title: Rory McIlroy prize money as he takes home huge cheque for 2nd placed finish at Irish Open as Shane Lowry also wins big
creator: news@irishmirror.ie (Oisin Doherty)
content: Rory McIlroy and Shane Lowry both took home huge cheques for their performances at this week's Amgen Irish Open. A second-placed finish for McIlroy netted the Holywood star a staggering €595,419 ($660,000), while Lowry finished in a tie for 12th. Solo 12th would have netted him €93,108 ($103,200), but even still the Offaly man will take home a huge cheque for his week's work. While McIlroy has won big, the prize money will be scant consolation for the four-time major winner who led for the majority of the week before being pipped at the death by Rasmus Hojgaard. READ MORE: How to watch Irish Open final round on TV as Rory McIlroy goes for glory READ MORE: Irish Open LIVE final round updates as Rory McIlroy aims for Royal County Down glory The Dane reeled off three-birdies in a row on the final three holes to shoot 65 and take him to -9. McIlroy on the other hand, needed an Eagle on 18 to force a play-off following a three-putt Bogey on 17. The County Down native stuck a superb iron shot close on the final hole to give himself a chance but failed to drain a 15-footer for Eagle as he missed out on winning his home championship by a single stroke. title: Rebeldes Houthis do Iêmen atingem Israel com míssil, e Netanyahu diz que pagarão 'preço alto'
creator: Estadão Conteúdo
content: Um míssil disparado por rebeldes apoiados pelo Irã no Iêmen caiu em um espaço aberto no centro de Israel neste domingo, 15, e disparou alarmes antiaéreos em seu aeroporto internacional, em um novo efeito colateral da guerra que começou há quase um ano em Gaza . Não houve relatos de vítimas ou danos graves, mas a mídia israelense transmitiu imagens de pessoas correndo para abrigos no aeroporto internacional Ben Gurion. A autoridade aeroportuária disse que as operações normais foram retomadas pouco tempo depois. Um incêndio era visível em uma área rural da região central de Israel, e a mídia local mostrou imagens do que parecia ser um míssil ou fragmento de interceptador caindo em uma escada rolante em uma estação de trem na cidade central de Modiin. O exército disse que o som das explosões na área era devido aos interceptadores. O primeiro-ministro israelense, Binyamin Netanyahu , alertou os rebeldes Houthis do Iêmen sobre a possibilidade de retaliação, depois que o grupo reivindicou a responsabilidade pelo lançamento do míssil. "Esta manhã, os Houthis lançaram um míssil terra-terra do Iêmen em nosso território. Eles já devem saber que cobramos um preço alto por qualquer tentativa de nos prejudicar", disse Netanyahu no início de uma reunião do gabinete, de acordo com um comunicado de seu escritório. Os rebeldes Houthis no Iêmen, apoiados pelo Irã, lançaram drones e mísseis em direção a Israel várias vezes desde o início da guerra...

title: Yeni aldığı aracın üzerine ağaç devrildi! "Daha borcunu bile ödememdim"
content: Düzce'de kökünden sökülen ağaç, park halindeki bir aracın üzerine devrildi. Araç sahibi, aracını 10 gün önce aldığını ve daha kullanamadan devrilen ağacın azizliğine uğradığını söyledi. Olay, saat 17.15 sıralarında şehir merkezinde bulunan Eski Bolu Caddesi üzerinde meydana geldi. Edinilen bilgilere göre, caddede dükkanı bulunan Ercan Koçyiğit, 81 AEH 282 plakalı otomobili dükkanının önüne bırakarak alışveriş yapmak için çarşıya gitti. Bu esnada kaldırımda bulunan ağaç, kökünden sökülerek aracın üzerine devrildi. Çevrede bulunanların haber vermesi üzerine aracının başına gelen Ercan Koçyiğit, aracının üzerindeki ağacı görünce neye uğradığını şaşırdı. Hemen 112 Acil Çağrı Merkezi'ni arayan Koçyiğit'in ihbarı üzerine olay yerine Düzce Belediyesi itfaiye ekipleri ve polis ekipleri sevk edildi. İtfaiye ekipleri aracın üzerindeki ağacı kaldırırken, polis ekipleri de olay yerinde inceleme yaptı. Ercan Koçyiğit, aracını yeni aldığını söyleyerek, “Dükkanımızın önüne aracı getirdim bıraktım. Ağabeyimle çarşıya kadar gittim. Arkadaşlar telefon açtı. Ağaç aracın üstüne düşmüş. Bir geldim arabanın hali perişan. Daha yeni almıştım, 10 gün oldu. Mağdurum, daha borcunu bile ödememiştim” dedi.

title: TORL-1-23 Is Tolerable, Active in Heavily Pretreated CLDN6+ Advanced Ovarian Cancer, Other Solid Tumors
content: Gottfried E. Konecny, MD Treatment with the Claudin-6 (CLDN6)–targeted antibody-drug conjugate (ADC) TORL-1-23 was well tolerated and generated responses in patients with heavily pretreated, CLDN6-positive advanced solid tumors, including platinum-resistant ovarian cancer, according to data from the phase 1 TORL-123-001 trial (NCT05103683) trial presented at the 2024 ESMO Congress . 1 Findings showed that among all efficacy-evaluable patients, those treated with TORL-1-23 at doses of less than 2.4 mg/kg (n = 19), the overall response rate (ORR) was 26%, which was comprised exclusively of partial responses (PRs); 42% of patients had stable disease (SD), and 32% of patients had progressive disease (PD). At a dose of 2.4 mg/kg (n = 19), the ORR was 42% with all responders achieving a PR; the rates of SD and PD were 47% and 11%, respectively. At a dose of 3.0 mg/kg (n = 26), the ORR was 31%, including a complete response rate of 4% and a PR rate of 27%; the respective SD and PD rates were 46% and 23%. In patients with CLDN6-positive platinum-resistant ovarian cancer, the ORRs were 30% at doses less than 2.4 mg/kg, 50% (n = 4/8) at the 2.4-mg/kg dose, and 42% (n = 5/12) at the 3.0 mg/kg dose. Lead study author Gottfried E. Konecny, MD, said the ADC was well tolerated with a favorable safety profile. The risk of neutropenia was mitigated by prophylactic pegfilgrastim, and the maximum-tolerated dose (MTD) of TORL-1-23 had not yet been reached. “The promising activity was confirmed...

title: Başkan Altay’ın oğlu Ali Necati dünyaevine girdi
content: Çiftin nikahını kıyan Konya Büyükşehir Belediye Başkanı Uğur İbrahim Altay, bir aile için çocukların mürüvvetini görmenin, onların mutluluğuna şahit olmanın en büyük hamd ve şükür vesilesi olduğunu ifade ederek, “Mutluluklar paylaştıkça çoğalır ve artar, bugün her biriniz burada bulunarak bizim mutluluğumuza şahitlik ettiniz, ortak oldunuz ve mutluluğumuzun artmasına vesile oldunuz. Allah sizlerden razı olsun” dedi. Başkan Altay, bugüne kadar yüzlerce nikah kıydığını ama kendi evladının nikahını kıyarak farklı duygular yaşadığını belirterek, katılan herkese teşekkür etti. title: Browns Made Major Change to Deshaun Watson's Contract Over Offseason: Report
content: The Cleveland Browns quietly removed a clause from starting quarterback Deshaun Watson's contract over the offseason that would have protected him from a future suspension. Insider Jay Glazer reported the news and Ari Meirov of The 33rd Team posted it on social media. Per the report, if Watson is suspended again, Cleveland could retain the guaranteed money that he is owed. The quietly removed a clause from Deshaun Watson's contract this offseason that would have protected him in the event of a future suspension, according to on FOX. Per the report, if Watson is suspended again, Cleveland could reclaim his guaranteed money.

title: Vance won't back away from false claims about migrants in Ohio amid threats to community
content: Republican vice presidential candidate JD Vance did not back away on Sunday from the false claims he and Donald Trump have been making that Haitians in an Ohio community are abducting and eating pets, even as the state’s GOP governor and other officials insist there is no evidence of such behavior. Vance, an Ohio senator, said constituents in Springfield are bringing concerns to him and that at least 10 were “verifiable.” In a series of news show interviews, he said he was amplifying the claims as a way to draw attention to Democrat Kamala Harris’ immigration policies, which he said are lax, while adding, “Everybody who has dealt with a large influx of migration knows that sometimes there are cultural practices that seem very far out there to a lot of Americans.” Local and state officials have said the claims are untrue, wrongly cast the city in a negative light and have brought unwanted and frightening negative attention since Trump mentioned it in the presidential debate last week, when he called out Springfield by name. For two days straight, bomb threats prompted the evacuation of schools and government buildings, with some emailed threats referencing an influx of migrants into the community. But it wasn’t just Springfield officials who were refuting the claims. Ohio Gov. Mike DeWine, a Republican, said Sunday that “there’s a lot of garbage on the internet and, you know, this is a piece of garbage that was simply not true. There’s no evidence of this at all.” He went on...

title: Crisis en la relación entre Mar Flores y su hijo tras su plantón en el desfile: "La vida es así"
creator: EP
content: (Foto De ARCHIVO) Mar Flores Durante El Front Row Del Desfile De Malne En Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week Madrid, A 13 De Septiembre De 2024, En Madrid (España). EP El pasado viernes, 14 de septiembre, vivía uno de los días más importantes de su vida al cumplir un sueño: presentaba en la MBFW de Madrid 2024 su cápsula colección para Malne. Allí, porque "hoy es un sueño para mí y la moda la llevo en las venas y en la sangre". Sin embargo, ese gran sentimiento se vio empañado por la tristeza que vivió al ver que la dejaba plantada. Y es que Mar contaba con de hecho le tenía reservado un sitio... pero nunca acudió a apoyar a su madre en ese gran momento para ella. Este sábado pudimos hablar con ella de nuevo en la MBFW de Madrid 2024 y que ha sido súper sonado en los medios de comunicación, pero prefirió pasar por alto y esquivar la pregunta. "La vida es así" contestaba a la gran ausencia de y, además, evitaba responder cuando se le preguntó si habló con él tras el desfile, limitándose a decir "gracias". Unas declaraciones que y que cada vez es más palpable. Noticia guardada en tu perfil

title: मरीजों से सलीके से बात करना सिखा रही सरकार:स्टॉफ को अच्छे बर्ताव की मिलेगी ट्रेनिंग, सीएम के निर्देश पर शुरू हुई पहल
content: यूपी के सरकारी अस्पतालों के फ्रंटलाइन स्टॉफ को मरीजों और तीमारदारों से बेहतर व्यवहार करने का प्रशिक्षण दिया जाएगा। मकसद अस्पताल में आने वाले मरीजों और तीमारदारों को इलाज के साथ बेहतर माहौल मुहैया कराना हैं। इस दौरान मरीजों को इलाज के दौरान व्यवहार सं सीएम के निर्देश पर शुरू हुई पहल प्रमुख सचिव चिकित्सा स्वास्थ्य एवं परिवार कल्याण पार्थ सारथी सेन शर्मा ने बताया कि मुख्यमंत्री योगी आदित्यनाथ के निर्देश पर मरीजों और उनके तीमारदारों को सरकारी अस्पताल में अच्छा अनुभव प्रदान करने के लिए मास्टर ट्रेनर को ट्रेनिंग दी गई हैं। सीएम योगी ने एक उच्च स्तरीय बैठक में कहा था कि सम्मानजनक और गुणवत्तापूर्ण स्वास्थ्य देखभाल जन स्वास्थ्य सेवा का अहम हिस्सा है। ऐसे में चिकित्सा इकाई पर आने वाले मरीज के लिए फ्रंटलाइन स्टॉफ और उसका व्यवहार अत्यंत महत्वपूर्ण होता है। क्योंकि यहीं से अस्पताल की छवि बनती या बिगड़ती है इसलिए सम्मानजनक देखभाल प्रदान करने के लिए फ्रंटलाइन स्टाफ को प्रशिक्षण दिया जा रहा है। एक बार स्वस्थ होने के बाद मरीज जीवनपर्यंत इस व्यवहार को याद रखता है। स्वास्थ्य कर्मी की व्यवहार कुशलता मरीज के इलाज में भी सहयोगी बनती है क्योंकि स्वास्थ्य इकाइयों पर आने वाले मरीज और तीमारदार मानसिक और शारीरिक कष्ट के दौर से गुजर रहे होते हैं। ऐसे में स्वास्थ्य कर्मी का व्यवहार मरहम का काम करता है और उन्हें उस कठिन परिस्थिति से निकलने में मददगार होता है। रिसेप्शनिस्ट , समेत वॉर्ड स्टॉफ को दी गई ट्रेनिंग राष्ट्रीय स्वास्थ्य मिशन की मिशन निदेशक डॉ. पिंकी जोवल ने बताया कि सीएम योगी के निर्देश पर प्रदेश के सभी फ्रंटलाइन स्टाफ जिसमें रिसेप्शनिस्ट,वार्ड सहायक, सुरक्षा गार्ड, स्टाफ नर्स, फार्मासिस्ट, लैब...

title: Korhan Saygıner’den Şampiyon Melekler Derneği’ne destek konseri
content: Türk pop müziğinin sevilen ismi Korhan Saygıner, 14 Eylül’de Yakın Doğu Üniversitesi Kampüsü içerisinde yer alan Moe Açık Hava Sahnesi'nde unutulmaz bir konser verdi. Sanatçının tüm gelirini Şampiyon Melekler Derneği’ne bağışlayacağı bu özel etkinlik, büyük bir ilgiyle karşılandı. Konsere katılan kalabalık, Saygıner’in enerjik sahnesi eşliğinde, hep bir ağızdan şarkılar söyleyerek geceye renk kattı. Gecenin sürprizlerinden biri, Zuhal Topal’ın sahneye davet edilmesiydi. Saygıner ile birlikte bir şarkı seslendiren Topal, seyircilerden büyük alkış aldı ve konserin anlamına anlam kattı. Hem müzikal performansıyla hem de anlamlı yardımlaşma mesajıyla hafızalarda yer eden konser, Şampiyon Melekler Derneği’ne önemli bir katkı sağlayacak. Yaklaşan diğer etkinlikler kapsamında, 20 Eylül’de Güldür Güldür, 24 Eylül’de Cem Yılmaz, ve 4 Ekim’de Ata Demirer de Moe Açık Hava Sahnesi’nde sahne alacak.

title: Fewer grapes on table, less wine in glasses – extreme heat takes its toll
Fórmula 2: Bortoleto assume liderança do campeonato após corrida em Baku
creator: Esporte News Mundo
content: O piloto brasileiro Gabriel Bortoleto terminou a corrida em Baku deste domingo (15) na 4aposição. Essa colocação, no entanto, foi o suficiente para o colocar na liderança do campeonato de pilotos da Fórmula 2, superando Isack Hadjar. A etapa foi vencida por Richard Verschoor, seguido por Victor Martins e pelo futuro piloto da Mercedes, Kimi Antonelli. O destaque, além da liderança de Bortoleto, foi um acidente generalizado que deixou a corrida paralisada por meia hora. Logo na largada, Maini, que corre pela Invicta Racing ao lado de Gabriel, ficou parado na pista. Maini acabou sendo atingido por e e Josep Martí, e Oliver Goethe. Ninguém se feriu, mas o incidente acionou a bandeira vermelha e a prova ficou paralisada. Na relargada, Bortoleto, que não se envolveu no acidente, manteve sua posição. O brasileiro ainda esteve na vice-liderança provisoriamente antes da parada nos boxes, que o levou à 8a posição. Ele recuperou até voltar a sua posição de origem, terminando na 4 a colocação.O pódio do domingo foi composto por Verschoor na liderança, seguido por Martins e Antonelli. Mas por causa do incidente, os pontos foram parcialmente atribuídos. Como apenas 17 voltas foram consideradas válidas, o líder recebeu 19 pontos, ao invés de 25. Com a sua colocação, Bortoleto conquistou 10 pontos mais 1 extra pela volta mais rápida, deixando Baku com 15 pontos no total, pelas demais corridas. O brasileiro superou por 4,5 pontos o agora ex-líder Hadjar, que...

title: Espanha nega ligação de cidadãos presos com suposto plano contra governo da Venezuela
creator: Reuters
content: Os dois espanhóis presos na Venezuela não têm nenhuma conexão com o serviço secreto Espanhol, e a Espanha não está envolvida em nenhum plano para desestabilizar politicamente o país sul-americano, disse uma fonte do ministério das Relações Exteriores neste domingo. Dois espanhóis, três norte-americanos e um tcheco foram presos na Venezuela sob a acusação de conexões com planos de desestabilização do país sul-americano, disse o ministro do Interior venezuelano no sábado. "A Espanha nega e rejeita de forma absoluta qualquer insinuação de estar implicada em uma operação de desestabilização política na Venezuela", disse a fonte do ministério das Relações Exteriores. "O governo confirmou que (os dois espanhóis) detidos não fazem parte do Centro de Inteligência Nacional ou qualquer organização do governo. A Espanha defende uma solução pacífica e democrática para a situação na Venezuela." Os espanhóis foram nomeados como José María Basoa e Andrés Martínez Adasne. Fotografias dos homens foram mostradas na televisão estatal. "A embaixada espanhola enviou uma nota verbal para o governo venezuelano pedindo acesso aos cidadãos presos, para verificar a identidade e nacionalidade deles, e para saber da acusação exata", disse a fonte, falando sob a condição de anonimato.

title: Red Bull o McLaren: ¿Cuántos puntos hay en juego en el resto de la temporada de la Fórmula 1?
creator: Daniela Bárcenas
content: Lo que necesitas saber: Aún restan tres sprints en la temporada 2024 de la Fórmula 1. Red Bull y McLaren están peleando por el Campeonato de Constructores, una lucha que no esperábamos ver al inicio de la temporada 2024 de la Fórmula 1. Y está situación se debe, en gran parte, a que el RB20 no es el mismo auto dominante que su antecesor el RB19. Los puntos que cada equipo consiga de aquí hasta el Gran Premio de Abu Dabi, última carrera del calendario , serán decisivos para definir al campeón. Así que, es momento de saber cuántos puntos hay en juego. ¿Cuántas carreras faltan en la temporada 2024 de la Fórmula 1? La F1 se encuentra en la última parte de la temporada y antes de Abu Dabi aún hay seis carreras de por medio, además de tres sprints. Lo que quiere decir que hay una gran cantidad de puntos en juego y una gran oportunidad para Red Bull y Max Verstappen de defender ambos campeonatos o para McLaren de robarse ambos campeonatos . En total restan siete Grandes Premios y tres Sprint Race. Una victoria en GP reparte 25 puntos, más un punto extra por la vuelta más rápida . En la Sprint, el ganador se lleva 8 unidades. ¿Cuántos puntos hay en juego en la Fórmula 1? Tomando en cuenta las siete carreras restantes, hay 182 puntos en juego incluido el punto a la vuelta más rápida, más los 24 que otorgan las tres sprints . Es decir, un total de 206 unidades. Hasta ahora y después del Gran Premio de Azerbaiyán , McLaren lidera el Campeonato de...

title: Oscar Piastri, McLaren big winners at Azerbaijan Grand Prix
creator: Field Level Media
content: Oscar Piastri won the Azerbaijan Grand Prix after a late crash impacted the race and required it to finish behind a virtual safety car. The win, combined with the fourth-place finish of McLaren teammate Lando Norris, gave the team a 20-point lead over Red Bull in the constructors standings. Red Bull had topped the standings for the past 55 races; McLaren last held the position in 2014. Charles Leclerc (Ferrari) started from the pole position but Piastri made his move at the start of lap 20, after the drivers' lone pit stop, with a bold decision to pass Leclerc. As the race progressed, and with Leclerc's tires having given out in the final five laps, Leclerc did all he could to try to hold off Sergio Perez (Red Bull) and Carlos Sainz (Ferrari). And as Perez tried to pass Leclerc, Sainz got past Perez, and the two drivers got tangled and wound up touching the barrier, forcing them both out of the race. "After the stop, I saw we were pretty close again and I felt like we had a little bit of extra grip and I had to go for it," Piastri said. "I knew that if I didn't get past at the start of the stint, I was never going to get past, so I went for a pretty big lunge but managed to pull it off and then hang on for dear life for the next 35 laps. ... It definitely goes down as one of the better races of my career." George Russell (Mercedes) was third and Max Verstappen (Red Bull) fifth in the race at Baku City Circuit in Baku, Azerbaijan. This article first appeared on Field Level...

content: El Barça ha resuelto el derbi catalán contra el Girona ( 1-4 ) por la vía rápida. En una hora de encuentro, el conjunto entrenado por Hansi Flick ha liquidado el partido en Montilivi con cuatro goles . Sin embargo, la contundente victoria ha vuelto a tener una nota negativa. El FC Barcelona ha terminado el partido con diez jugadores sobre el campo, puesto que el árbitro Alejandro Muñiz Ruiz ha expulsado a Ferran Torres en el minuto 86. El delantero valenciano se ha apagado como una vela en el nuevo proyecto del técnico alemán, al contrario que el resto de jugadores del primer equipo. Desde el debut de Dani Olmo contra el Rayo Vallecano, el tiburón perdió su condición de titular . El canterano azulgrana retrató a su compañero durante una segunda parte magnífica en Vallecas. La oveja negra del Barça no consigue encajar ni vestida de blaugrana ni con la camiseta negra. Doble vara de medir En Montilivi, el delantero de 24 años ha entrado en el minuto 69 para sustituir a Pedri. El exceso de ímpetu le ha jugado una mala pasada en el 86, cuando ha llegado tarde en la presión a Yáser Asprilla y ha pisado el tobillo del extremo colombiano . Una entrada similar a la que Pathé Ciss le propinó a Pedri en Vallecas. El colegiado César Soto Grado solo castigó aquella infracción con cartulina amarilla . title: Lemondta hivatali programjait a magyar miniszter, hogy a gáton segítsen
content: Nagy István agrárminiszter közösségi oldalán közölte vasárnap, hogy teendői között az árvízvédelem kapja a legnagyobb prioritást. Minden hivatali program lemondva! Most a gátakon a helyem. Az élet- és értékvédelem a legfontosabb – ismertette Facebook-bejegyzés ében a miniszter. Mint írtuk, Nagy István a korábban Facebookra feltöltött videójában kiemelte, hogy minden idők legnagyobb árvize fenyegeti Mosonmagyaróvárt és a Szigetköz térségét. A Duna és a Lajta vízgyűjtő területein rendkívüli módon megnőtt a lehullott csapadék mennyisége, ami rohamosan közeledik, ezért a vízügyi szakemberek és katasztrófavédelmi munkatársak munkájára most megfeszítetten szükség van. Kiemelte, hogy csúcsközeli állapotok és 2002-es árvízszintek várhatóak. Donald Tusk lengyel kormányfő a közösségi oldalán közölte, hogy katasztrófahelyzetet hirdetnek Lengyelországban. Az illetékes miniszterekkel és szolgálatokkal folytatott egyeztetést követően utasítottam a Minisztertanácsot, hogy készítsenek elő egy rendeletet a természeti katasztrófahelyzet bevezetéséről – írta Donald Tusk az X-en a BBC szerint. Mint a hírportál megjegyzi: a katasztrófahelyzet bevezetése nagyobb eszköztárat biztosít a kormányzat számára annak érdekében, hogy fellépjenek a természeti katasztrófával szemben (ugyanakkor bizonyos szabadságjogok korlátozásával járhat). title: MND Where to Live in Mexico Guide 2024: Mid-Pacific trio
creator: Greg Custer
content: Once upon a time, vacationers to Mexico patronized a string of Pacific destinations, each with its own personality and vibe. Collectively known as the Mexican Riviera, five places garnered nearly all of Mexico’s international tourism receipts: Mazatlán, Puerto Vallarta, Manzanillo, Ixtapa-Zihuatanejo and Acapulco. Daily nonstop flights from the Western U.S. and Canada filled these places with beach-starved, beer-guzzling northerners who came for the trappings of the classic Mexican beach vacation: golden sand, blue waters, beach vendors, parasailing, seafood and — maybe — an outing to get some “culture.” It’s here that we make our latest stop in the MND Where to Live in Mexico Guide 2024, with a look at our Mid-Pacific trio. All-inclusive resorts were not the thing — with the exceptions of Club Maeva and Club Med — and a vengeful Montezuma lurked behind every salad bar or street food stall. People were out and about, shopping and dining were robust enterprises and visitors collected Pacific Mexican destinations like badges, hopping down year after year, remembering their favorite bartenders, bellboys and waiters. It was, in some ways, a time of tourism’s infancy and innocence. Few big corporate lodging players were in the space, Mexicana de Aviación ruled the skies and the Tourism Ministry and Fonatur poured mountains of pesos into marketing and advertising. The resulting success slathered upon the Mexican Riviera begat the emergence of two new poles of development, Baja...

title: محمدی راد: غریب بودن تیم فولاد دروغ است/ خودشان جو را متشنج کردند
content: به گزارش ، رحمان محمدی‌راد، سرمربی شهداب درباره شکست تیمش در این مسابقه گفت: در دریافت خیلی مشکل داشتیم و این یکی از نکات اثرگذار بود. شرایط بازی به گونه‌ای پیش رفت که در هر سه ست قدرتشان را به ما دیکته کردند. وی در پاسخ به اینکه محمد موسوی تیمش را تحت فشار قرار داد، بیان کرد: همه بازیکنان مقابل خوب بودند. محمدی‌راد درباره اینکه در پایان مسابقه بازیکنان تیمش را وسط زمین جمع و با آنها صحبت کرد، گفت: از تلاششان تشکر کردم. ورزش برد و باخت دارد. ما امروز باختیم اما سعی کردیم با تمام وجود بازی کنیم. از تماشاگران عذرخواهی می‌کنیم. سرمربی تیم شهداب یزد درباره برنامه‌اش برای جام باشگاه‌های جهان گفت: برای باشگاه‌های آسیا دو یار کمکی داشتیم و سعی کردیم تیم را به گونه‌ای ببندیم که در لیگ هم خوب باشد. بعد از جداشدن این دو بازیکن لیگ شروع می‌شود. برای باشگاه‌های جهان نفراتمان همین نفرات فعلی است. وی درباره رفتار هواداران شهداب در دیدار فینال و شعارهایی که علیه تیم سیرجانی سر دادند، گفت: تاییدش نمی‌کنم. سعی کردیم جو را آرام کنیم. از ابتدا خواهش کردم میزبانی خوبی داشته باشیم. فولاد سیرجان مهمان ماست و دوست داشتم با خاطره خوش خارج شوند اما فکر می‌کنم استارتش را خودشان زدند. اینکه گفتند ما اینجا غریبه بودیم دروغ محض است. آنها در این سالن تمرین کردند و همه امکانات را به خوبی داشتند. او افزود: آقای عطایی گفتند اگر خارج بود راحت‌تر بودم اما در خارج یک جلسه حق تمرین در سالن مسابقات را دارید نه چند جلسه. خودشان جو را اینگونه کردند. الان هم تیم ما باخته است و چنین حرف‌هایی درست نیست.

title: KRG agrees to release imprisoned Iranian nationals: envoy
Rory McIlroy's season of heartbreak continues as he suffers US Open repeat at Irish Open
creator: mirrornews@mirror.co.uk (Sam Frost)
content: Rory McIlroy suffered a brutal repeat of his US Open heartbreak, throwing away victory at the Irish Open on Sunday. Rasmus Hojgaard took advantage, producing a sensational back nine at Royal County Down in Northern Ireland to take victory by one shot at nine-under-par McIlroy held a two-shot lead down the stretch but he was made to pay for a sloppy three-putt bogey at the par-four 17th, falling two shots behind the Dane. To McIlroy's credit, he bravely chased an eagle at the par-five last and struck two perfect shots to leave little more than 10 feet to force a playoff. Agonizingly for a partisan home crowd, the Ulsterman's putt drifted narrowly past the cup. The 35-year-old held a one-shot lead heading into the final round and finished with a two-under-par card of 69. The echoes from the nightmare conclusion at Pinehurst No. 2 – when McIlroy let a two-shot lead and his first major win in a decade slip through his fingers – were profound, as his season of heartache continues. McIlroy has three wins this season, but none since the events of the US Open, and this was another example of the world No. 3 losing his nerve in the final moments of the tournament. He will have to go back to the drawing board ahead of the BMW PGA Championship at Wentworth, which tees off on Thursday. There will be more to follow on this breaking news story and Mirror Sport will bring you the very latest updates, pictures and video as soon as possible. Please check back regularly for updates on this...

title: Drake Callender is flourishing as the last line of defense for Lionel Messi and Inter Miami
creator: By TIM REYNOLDS - AP Sports Writer
content: FORT LAUDERDALE, Fla. (AP) — Drake Callender is the answer to a pretty strong trivia question. Years from now, it’s likely that some folks — when guessing who scored the goal that gave Inter Miami its first-ever trophy in the summer of 2023 — will choose Lionel Messi, for obvious reasons. The greatest player of his generation, probably the greatest player ever, would be the logical pick. Spoiler alert: It wasn’t Messi. “I did what had to be done,” Callender said. Indeed, it was Inter Miami’s goalie — in the 11th round of a penalty-shot shootout — who scored what became the winner of that Leagues Cup final last year against Nashville SC. He scored, then saved Nashville goalie Elliot Panicco's attempt to tie the game and extend the shootout to finish off the win. It’s a moment that forever will live in Inter Miami lore. It's also a reminder that in big moments, Callender is already proven. Major League Soccer's playoffs start in about a month-and-a-half, and Callender — the go-to goalie for the best team in the league right now — can’t help but think about what it’s going to be like to challenge for the next trophy. The MLS Cup is very much on his mind, and with the way Inter Miami is playing and with Messi now back after a two-month absence because of an ankle injury, everything is looking good in his world. “I think anytime you have opportunity to win a trophy and you do win that trophy, it makes you believe," Callender said. “Now we know we can. We all believe and know we...

title: Jordynne Grace Says She Won’t Face Wendy Choo & Rosemary Alone, Choo Not Done With Grace
creator: Jeremy Thomas
content: Wendy Choo and Jordynne Grace aren’t done with each other following their match at TNA Victory Road. Grace defeated Choo to retain her Knockouts Championship at Friday’s TNA+ event, and Grace appeared in a digital exclusive where she said she wouldn’t be alone the next time she ran into Choo and Rosemary, who teamed up to attack Grace after the match. title: Latest News | Mathura: Man Diverts Woman's Attention, Kidnaps Her Child from Railway Station
content: Mathura (UP), Sep 15 (PTI) An man on Sunday kidnapped a seven-month-old child from Mathura railway station allegedly after diverting his mother's attention, police said. The woman has registered a case with the Government Railway Police (GRP) station here. They have identified the person by scanning the CCTV footage and are searching for him, they said. Also Read | Konkan Railway Recruitment 2024: Registration Process for 190 Vacancies of Konkan Railway to Begin Tomorrow at konkanrailway.com, Know Who Can Apply and Other Details Here. GRP station in-charge Samar Bahadur Singh said that Sunita, a resident of Agra, works as a labourer near the railway station. This morning, she was heating milk on a platform to feed her child. At that time an unknown person came to her and told her not to feed such hot milk to the child, the police said. Also Read | 7th Pay Commission: Central Govt Employees to Receive 3% DA Hike Ahead of Dussehra? Check Details Here. He later took the child in his hands and when the woman started packing her belongings and putting them in a bag, the man disappeared with the child, they said. The woman immediately informed the GRP and efforts were made to search for the man and the child but the police could not trace them. Singh said when the police scanned the CCTV footage, the man wearing a white T-shirt and pants was seen going out of the railway station premises with the child. He said that a case has been filed against the unknown man and efforts are on...

title: Ibon Navarro: "Hay que dar a este título mucho valor"
creator: Juanje Fernández R.
content: suma su tercer título con el . El nombre del entrenador vitoriano ya figura al lado de otros muchos ídolos que han pasado por el banquillo cajista como . Un tercer entorchado que fue muy celebrado por el preparador del equipo malagueño. Un Ibon Navarro que sacó pecho por los suyos en sala de prensa. “ , con una diferencia muy amplia, pero insisto que para estar aquí tuvimos que ganar muchos partidos el año pasado, y dos muy difíciles en Belgrado. Solo el que gana la BCL puede estar aquí, hemos sido nosotros, y No siempre gana el equipo europeo, y hemos mostrado ser mejores contra los equipos a los que nos hemos enfrentado aquí. ”, señaló el vitoriano. El coach del también quiso alabar a su rival en la final. “ , ganaron a un equipo muy bueno, con una gran mentalidad, así que hay que darle mucho valor a esto. No solo el mérito de ganar los tres partidos, sino haber llegado hasta aquí”, comentó. tuvo un detalle con sus jugadores del curso pasado y con los que han abandonado la plantilla esta temporada 2024-25. title: الجيش الإسرائيلي يشن سلسلة غارات عنيفة على بلدات عدة جنوبي لبنان (فيديوهات)
content: ووثقت مقاطع فيديو مشاهد تظهر الغارات العنيفة التي شنها الطيران الحربي الإسرائيلي، مستهدفا أطراف بلدة المحمودية ومنطقة الجرمق والعيشية جنوبي لبنان. هذا وأشارت "الوكالة الوطنية للإعلام" في لبنان إلى أن "الطيران الحربي الإسرائيلي نفذ، اعتبارا من الساعة السادسة وخمس دقائق من عصر اليوم، عدوانا جويا، حيث شن سلسلة غارات، مستهدفا منطقة المحمودية عند الأطراف الشرقية - الجنوبية لسهل الميدنة - كفررمان، ملقيا عددا من صواريخ جو- أرض على المنطقة المستهدفة، أحدث انفجارهم دويا تردد صداه في أرجاء منطقتي النبطية وإقليم التفاح". في الجهة المقابلة، أفادت مصادر عبرية عصر اليوم، بسقوط عدد من الإصابات جراء انفجار طائرة مسيّرة داخل قاعدة عسكرية إسرائيلية في الجليل. وجاء ذلك بعد لحظات من دوي صافرات الإنذار في كامل مناطق الجليل شمالي إسرائيل وفي الجولان السوري المحتل، بعد أن أصدرت الجبهة الداخلية تحذيرات متتالية بشأن تسلل طائرات مسيّرة من لبنان. المصدر: RT

title: 卡式瓦斯爐、瓦斯罐直接丟垃圾車 清潔隊員大喊「會害死人」!
content: 彰化縣福興鄉清潔隊員收運垃圾,卻碰到把卡式瓦斯爐連同瓦斯罐,以及紙餐盒一起打包,當作一般垃圾要丟給垃圾車。(民眾提供) 〔記者劉曉欣/彰化報導〕又到中秋全民瘋烤肉季節,彰化縣福興鄉清潔隊員在收運垃圾時,卻碰上有年輕女子把卡式瓦斯爐與瓦斯罐,直接要丟垃圾車的離譜行徑,隊員嚇到大喊「這樣會害死人」,馬上退回整袋垃圾,成功拆除「垃圾地雷」。 福興鄉清潔隊員指出,因為彰化縣從7月起就實施垃圾分類新制、提高整車退運標準,沿線收運垃圾也加強垃圾破袋頻率,但他還是第一次碰到有民眾丟垃圾,竟然是整台卡式瓦斯爐,連同瓦斯罐裝在塑膠袋一起要丟垃圾車,實在有夠離譜,他原本只看到黃色垃圾袋裡有紙餐盒,當他把整包垃圾接過來之後,才發現垃圾袋有點重量,仔細一看,垃圾袋底部裝的是連同瓦斯罐的卡式瓦斯爐,他當場就說「小姐,你這樣會害死人」,並把整包垃圾退給民眾。 請繼續往下閱讀... 福興鄉清潔隊員強調,卡式瓦斯爐與瓦斯罐都是要進行回收,瓦斯罐為高壓瓶罐,因為瓶內裝的液態燃料如果經過擠壓、摩擦,容易產生火花造成爆炸,在回收前應該確認已經使用完畢,並獨立打包,標示「內有高壓瓶」警語,再交給資源回收車,才能確保收運垃圾的清潔隊員安全。 福興鄉長蔣煙燈表示,清潔隊員收運垃圾非常辛苦,尤其是中秋節前後是烤肉旺季,讓垃圾量大增,尤其是還要面對瓦斯罐誤丟垃圾車的潛藏風險,目前已透過社區與社團烤肉場合,再次加強宣導垃圾分類的原則,尤其是瓦斯罐、髮膠噴霧、殺蟲劑、噴漆等高壓瓶罐,請民眾務必要做好回收。 彰化縣環保局統計,去年中秋節加強破袋檢查,在25000包垃圾就發現了210包藏有高壓瓶罐,還好及早發現,降低危險的發生。 又到中秋烤肉季,對清潔隊員來卻是垃圾量爆增的惡夢。(民眾提供) 不用抽 不用搶 現在用APP看新聞 保證天天中獎 點我下載APP 按我看活動辦法

title: حملات هوایی اسرائیل به جنوب لبنان+ جزئیات
content: ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی در سلسله حملاتی هوایی مناطق جنوبی لبنان را هدف قرار داد. منابع لبنانی گزارش دادند که نیروی هوایی ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی بیش از ۶ حمله هوایی را علیه منطقه «المحمودیه» در جنوب لبنان صورت داده است. علاوه بر این ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی منطقه جنگلی «الوردیه» در برابر شهرک «بلاط» در جنوب لبنان را نیز هدف حملات هوایی قرار داد. خبرنگار الجزیره گزارش داد که اطراف شهرک «العیشیه» در جنوب لبنان نیز از سوی نیروی هوایی ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی مورد هجوم قرار گرفته است. حزب‌الله لبنان خبر داد که مرکز جاسوسی اسرائیل را در بلندی‌های کفرشوبا هدف قرار داده است. خبرنگار المیادین در جنوب لبنان نیز از حملات توپخانه‌ای پیاپی ارتش رژیم صهیونیستی به شهرک «میس الجبل» در جنوب لبنان خبر داد.

title: Bengals look to bounce back from Patriots loss, face Chiefs in Kansas City
creator: Molly Schramm
content: KANSAS CITY, Mo. — The Cincinnati Bengals are back in Arrowhead Stadium to face the Kansas City Chiefs. Cincinnati is looking to bounce back from a messy Week 1 performance against the New England Patriots. The Chiefs are coming off a opening-night win against the Ravens. While the Bengals and Chiefs have a storied rivalry, Bengals coach Zac Taylor said for them, "its just Week 2." "It's the next opponent, and we're excited to turn the page and move forward," he said earlier this week. "We got the taste out of our mouth, we're done with that and now we get a chance to move forward." The last time Cincinnati and Kansas City met was last New Year's Eve. The Chiefs clinched the AFC West title with a 25-17 victory over the Bengals. Despite that, the Bengals hold a 3-2 record over the Chiefs in their last five meetings with Joe Burrow at the helm. Cincinnati also holds the all-time series record over the Chiefs at 18-16-0. If they want to extend that winning record, the Bengals are going to need to fix their clunky performance from last week. Cincinnati dealt with several turnovers that led to points for New England. Cincinnati is also going to need to gel better on offense. Burrow only threw 21-for-29 and 164 yards with zero touchdowns. Wide receiver No. 1 Ja'Marr Chase should feel more comfortable on the field after he headed into Week 1 with little practice due to ongoing contract negotiations. Tee Higgins, who is nursing a hamstring injury, is doubtful against the Chiefs...

title: Sin noticias de Carmen un año después de desaparecer en un barco del CSIC: “Me sentía inferior, estaba siendo acosada”
creator: Pilar_F.C.
content: Se llamaba Mari Carmen Fernández y trabajaba como camarera en el buque oceanográfico del CSIC García del Cid. Había puesto en marcha el protocolo contra el acoso sexual por los hechos que había sufrido por parte de un compañero del barco. El organismo comenzó a instruir el expediente y elevó el caso al juzgado, donde se cerró en falso. Eso paralizó para siempre el expediente laboral: ni el trabajador fue nunca sancionado ni ella obtuvo el cambio de puesto que pidió. En septiembre de 2023, cuando se reincorporó a su empleo después de una larga..

title: Поне 40 души изчезнаха след преобръщане на лодка в Нигерия
creator: Милен Ганев
content: Най-малко 40 души са се удавили при инцидент с лодка в река в северозападна Нигерия, съобщи президентът Бола Тинубу, предаде Асошиейтед прес, цитирана от БТА. Инцидентът е станал в щата Замфара, докато фермерите са се опитвали да стигнат до земята си, се казва в изявление на Тинубу. Президентът обеща подкрепа за пострадалите и нареди на службите за спешна помощ да направят оценка на инцидента. Язид Абубакар, говорител на полицията в Замфара, заяви пред АП, че инцидентът е станал в събота и че петима души са спасени, но 40 все още са в неизвестност. Не е ясно веднага колко души са били на лодката, когато тя се е преобърнала и потънала.

title: Người chăm ăn sáng hay bỏ bữa sáng khỏe mạnh hơn? Câu trả lời của chuyên gia gây bất ngờ
I feel exhausted and depressed since renovation work started on my house
creator: Sally Land
content: DEAR DEIDRE: SINCE renovation work started on my house late last year I have developed flu-like symptoms. I’m very stressed as the house is still not finished. I’m tired all the time and just want to sleep. I have panic attacks, depression and anxiety but several blood tests found nothing to be wrong. I am always blowing my nose. The doctor thinks it is down to my depression and anxiety. I feel rubbish every day. I don’t even want sex. I have no energy and cannot be bothered to eat unless food is cooked for me. I am nearly 63. I feel like giving in as I’ve had enough of everything. Every problem gets a personal reply from one of our trained counsellors. Fill out and submit our easy-to-use and confidential form and the Dear Deidre team will get back to you. You can also send a private message on the DearDeidreOfficial Facebook page or email us at: deardeidre@the-sun.co.uk DEIDRE SAYS: I’ve worked with Dr Zoe Williams, our resident specialist and practising NHS GP on your email. She suggests your symptoms could be caused by depression, burnout or other mental health conditions, or physical health problems – including infection, or any chronic disease. It is interesting your symptoms began around the time of your renovations – it’s worth investigating if there is a link. Dr Zoe suggests: “You may have been exposed to something at that time that triggered an autoimmune or chronic illness, or could have been exposed to fungus or bacteria that could have triggered something....

title: جزائريون تحت ثأثير الاقراص المهلوسة يتزعمون مجموعات الهجرة السرية بالفنيدق
content: أخبارنا المغربية- عمر أياسينن حسب معطيات توصل بها موقع "أخبارنا"، يتزعم شبان جزائريون تحت تأثير الأقراص المهلوسة رأس مجموعات الهجرة السرية في مدينة الفنيدق، في خطوة تهدف إلى زعزعة استقرار المنطقة. وتشير مصادرنا إلى أن هذه العمليات لا تبدو عشوائية أو فردية، بل مخطط لها بشكل مسبق وتهدف إلى خلق نوع من الفوضى في المدينة، التي تعاني بالفعل من أزمات اجتماعية واقتصادية متراكمة. وتؤكد المصادر أن هذه الأقراص المهلوسة، التي يتم جلبها من الجزائر، تلعب دورًا كبيرًا في تفجير طاقات عدوانية وغير طبيعية لدى أفراد هذه المجموعات، مما يجعلهم أكثر استعدادًا للعنف والفوضى. هذه المواد المخدرة تؤدي إلى تدهور السلوكيات وتخلق حالة من عدم الاستقرار في صفوف الشباب الذين ينجرون وراء الهجرة السرية، مما يفاقم الوضع الأمني في المنطقة. تتزايد المخاوف من أن هذه المخططات قد تكون جزءًا من استراتيجية أكبر تهدف إلى زعزعة استقرار الحدود المغربية من طرف عناصر مشبوهة، وهو ما يتطلب تعزيز الإجراءات الأمنية وتكثيف الجهود لضبط الحدود والحد من انتشار الأقراص المهلوسة التي تشكل تهديداً كبيراً لاستقرار المنطقة. وفي ضوء هذه المعطيات، يبقى من الضروري أن تتحرك السلطات المختصة لتشديد المراقبة والقبض على المتورطين في هذه الأنشطة، وتقديمهم للعدالة، من أجل حماية المجتمع من هذه المخاطر التي تهدد أمنه واستقراره.
