title: Зеленски: Понасяме големи загуби заради бавните доставки на западно оръжие
creator: Милен Ганев
content: Украинските войски страдат от високи загуби поради твърде бавното пристигане на западни оръжия, за да се оборудват въоръжените ни сили както трябва, заяви президентът Володимир Зеленски в интервю пред Си Ен Ен, предаде Ройтерс, цитирана от БТА. Русия печели позиции в някои части на Източна Украйна, включително около Покровск. Превземането на транспортния възел може да даде възможност на Москва да открие нови линии за нападение. Зеленски посочи, че ситуацията в източната част на страната е "много тежка“, като добави, че половината от украинските бригади там не са оборудвани. "Затова губиш много хора. Губиш хора, защото те нямат въоръжени превозни средства... те нямат артилерия, те нямат артилерийски снаряди", каза Зеленски, говорейки на английски. От Cи Ен Ен съобщиха, че интервюто е било проведено в петък. Зеленски също така каза, оръжията, обещани от САЩ и европейските държави, пристигат много бавно. "Нуждаем се от 14 бригади, за да сме готови. Досега... от тези пакети [с пратки оръжие] не сме оборудвали дори четири", каза той. Съветникът по националната сигурност на Белия дом Джейк Съливан вчера заяви, че Вашингтон работи по "значителна" нова помощ за Украйна. Зеленски трябва да се срещне с президента на САЩ Джо Байдън този месец и ще му представи план за прекратяване на войната. Основните елементи са сигурността и дипломатическата подкрепа, както и военна и икономическа помощ, отбеляза украинският лидер. Единственото нещо, от което се страхува руският...

title: Por lo menos 40 ahogados al hundirse barco en río de noroeste de Nigeria
creator: Por DYEPKAZAH SHIBAYAN
content: ABUYA, Nigeria (AP) — Por lo menos 40 personas se ahogaron al hundirse un barco en un río en el noroeste de Nigeria, informó el domingo el presidente Bola Tinubu. El hecho ocurrió en el estado de Zamfara cuando un grupo de agricultores trataba de llegar a sus tierras, dijo Tinubu en un comunicado. Yazid Abubakar, portavoz policial en Zamfara, dijo a The Associated Press que el accidente ocurrió el sábado y que cinco personas fueron rescatadas, pero que otras 40 siguen desaparecidas. No quedaba claro cuántas personas iban a bordo cuando se hundió el barco. La nave llevaba mayormente agricultores que usan el cruce regularmente para vender sus productos en el mercado. Vecinos de la zona dicen que los barcos con frecuencia tienen exceso de pasajeros. En Zamfara actúan además varios grupos armados que secuestran a personas para exigir dinero, se roban ganado e incurren en minería ilegal.

title: Lewandowski zamknął usta krytykom [OPINIA]
content: Nieudany jubileusz Roberta Lewandowskiego nie może przysłonić kapitalnego bilansu Polaka. Mimo 36 lat wciąż jest jednym z najlepszych napastników świata. Nie ma jednak wątpliwości, że FC Barcelona ma nową, większą gwiazdę. W tym artykule dowiesz się o: Kiedy latem 2022 roku FC Barcelona wykładała 45 milionów euro na Roberta Lewandowskiego , niektórzy kibice Blaugrany pukali się w czoło. Nie inaczej było z częścią ekspertów. Tyle pieniędzy za 34-letniego piłkarza wydawało się dla wielu marnotrawstwem. Szczególnie przez klub mający ogromne problemy finansowe. "Jak długo jeszcze on może grać na wysokim poziomie?" - pytali. Polak zamknął jednak usta krytykom i udowodnił, że w jego przypadku wiek to tylko liczba. Już w pierwszym sezonie w nowej lidze zdobył tytuł króla strzelców. Wielokrotnie ratował Dumę Katalonii z trudnych sytuacji, choć trzeba otwarcie przyznać, że zdarzały mu się kryzysy. W niedzielę zagrał swoje 100. spotkanie w barwach Dumy Katalonii. I bilans ma znakomity. 63 bramki, 19 asyst. Praktycznie żaden piłkarz w jego wieku nie byłby w stanie wykręcić takich liczb w tak silnych rozgrywkach. Ba, Lewandowski ze swoją średnią 0,63 gola na mecz jest jednym z najlepszych napastników na świecie. Większość zawodników na jego pozycji nigdy nie osiągnie takich statystyk. title: Израильская авиация атаковала Южный Ливан
creator: RT на русском
content: Израильская авиация атаковала район Махмудия в Южном Ливане. Об этом пишет Al Manar. Представители ЦАХАЛ отметили, что истребители атаковали установки шиитской «Хезболлы». Также по целям ударили из артиллерии. Ранее на юге Ливана 13 человек получили ранения при израильской атаке.

title: Cómo ver el eclipse del martes desde cualquier comunidad española
creator: Juan, Scaliter
content: Aunque se trata de un fenómeno más o menos habitual ( los eclipses se producen unas tres veces al año), que ocurra precisamente durante una superluna , cuando nuestro satélite parece un poco más grande en el cielo nocturno, es algo extraordinario. Y es precisamente lo que pasará el martes 17 de septiembre por la noche o la madrugada del 18 . Este eclipse lunar parcial será visible en América del Norte y del Sur (excepto Alaska), Europa, la mayor parte de África, Asia occidental y partes de la Antártida. Los eclipses lunares ocurren cuando el Sol, la Tierra y la Luna están alineados, de modo que la Tierra proyecta su sombra sobre nuestro satélite natural . Este eclipse lunar será solo leve, con solo el 8,7 % superior de la luna cubierto por la parte más oscura de la sombra de la Tierra. El eclipse será visible en la península a partir de las 04:12 (03:12 en Canarias) y se extenderá durante casi una hora. Para saber cómo se verá en tu provincia, se puede acceder a la web del Instituto Geográfico Nacional y seleccionar la región donde estaremos para ver las horas exactas en las que debemos estar atentos. La buena noticia es que observar el eclipse no requiere ningún instrumento especial para ser visto y tampoco entraña ningún peligro. Por si no puedes verlo de forma presencial, también habrá transmisiones en línea y en directo en YouTube.

title: Pundits claim Arsenal’s winning derby goal should not have been allowed
creator: Chris Wilson
content: Arsenal battled to a 1-0 win over Spurs in the north London derby at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium on Sunday afternoon, courtesy of a goal from Gabriel . The centre-back rose above the Tottenham defence to head home in the 64th minute from Bukayo Saka’s corner, with Arsenal going on to win the game thanks to plenty of resolute defending. And despite no real protest to the goal from Spurs players, Sky Sports pundits suggested that the goal should not have been allowed to stand. When reviewing the goal, Jamie Redknapp mentioned that Cristian Romero struggled to get to grips with Gabriel throughout the game, before Les Ferdinand pointed out that the Argentine “gets a little shove in the back”. “If a centre-forward does that, the referee gives a foul against him. They don’t even look at it,” said the former Spurs striker. “He does need to be stronger, it is poor defending, but he does get a shove in his back,” he added. Paul Merson agreed, saying that he “would be disappointed if I didn’t get a foul”. “He [Romero] is in the wrong position, everything is wrong about his defending. You have to be side on, seeing the ball and the player. “To start off with, you’ve got to be an arm’s length away, and he’s standing with him. But I would expect a foul,” added the former Arsenal man. Redknapp was more critical of Romero, saying that he “has got to do better with his own defensive responsibilities”, as well as pointing to Vicario’s problems when defending corners. Spurs have now...

title: La ganadora del concurso 'Tu peso en queso' de Fromago: «Me voy a poner pero bien y también lo voy a compartir»
content: ABC ZAMORA Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Copiar enlace Facebook X Whatsapp Email Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Esta funcionalidad es sólo para suscriptores La papeleta agraciada del concurso 'Tu peso en queso' de la campaña 'Fromago Commerce and Bar Fest' ha sido la de Eva Victoria Ariza, quien por pesar 59 kilos, recibirá otros tantos en el preciado producto. La entrega de premios puso la puntilla a la II Feria Internacional del Queso 'Fromago Cheese Experience', que empezó el pasado jueves y que termina hoy, 15 de septiembre. La ganadora resultó ser la suplente ya que, en primera instancia, recayó en un concursante que no atendió la llamada telefónica, por lo que la organización pasó a la siguiente en la lista. «Estoy un poco nerviosa y bastante contenta. Cuando me llamaron ayer, no me lo creía», ha reconocido la ganadora, quien también ha recibido una cesta y un obsequio de la organización. «Me encanta el queso. Me voy a poner pero bien y aun así lo voy a compartir con mi familia, mis amigos y la persona que me dio la papeleta», ha asegurado. El expositor de Caja Rural de Zamora, ubicado en la Plaza Mayor de la capital zamorana, ha acogido este domingo el trámite del pesaje de la ganadora y la entrega de los premios resultantes de la campaña 'Fromago Commerce and Bar Fest', promovida por la Asociación para el Desarrollo Zamora10, con la colaboración del Ayuntamiento de Zamora, la Diputación de Zamora, la Fundación Escuela...

title: 也門胡塞武裝向以色列中部發射導彈 以總理警告將付出沉重代價
content: 也門胡塞武裝向以色列中部發射導彈後,以色列總理內塔尼亞胡警告,胡塞武裝將付出沉重代價。 以色列軍方發表聲明,指一枚地對地導彈當地星期日清晨,從也門向以色列中部發射,以軍防空系統進行攔截。初步調查顯示,導彈可能在空中碎裂。救援機構說,9人在避難期間受傷。 也門胡塞武裝說,發射了一枚新型高超音速導彈,目標是特拉維夫的雅法地區,擊中以色列境內一處軍事目標。 內塔尼亞胡在內閣會議上說,任何襲擊以色列的人都無法逃脫懲罰,胡塞武裝應該知道,任何傷害以色列的企圖,都將會付出沉重代價。

title: Jefe del gabinete viajó a Iquitos para articular esfuerzos frente a déficit hídrico
content: 11:37 | Lima, set. 15. El presidente del Consejo de Ministros, Gustavo Adrianzén; el ministro de Defensa, Walter Astudillo; y el jefe del Comando Conjunto de las Fuerzas Armadas, General de Ejército David Ojeda, viajaron a Iquitos para coordinar las acciones iniciales a establecerse con el puente aéreo. Asimismo, las autoridades supervisarán la entrega de alimentos por el estado de emergencia en la región. El premier, Gustavo Adrianzén; el ministro de Defensa, Walter Astudillo; y el jefe del Comando Conjunto de las Fuerzas Armadas, General de Ejército David Ojeda, viajaron a Iquitos para coordinar las acciones iniciales a establecerse con el puente aéreo. pic.twitter.com/WttgmYjHEy — Mindef Perú (@MindefPeru) September 15, 2024 En declaraciones a la prensa, Adrianzén dijo que supervisarán que las 15 toneladas de ayuda humanitaria, que dispuso el gobierno central, hayan llegado a conformidad. El titular de la PCM invocó a la población a mantener la calma frente a los incendios forestales y destacó que las Fuerzas Armada en coordinación con Indeci están desplegando todos sus esfuerzos para atender la emergencia. En el lugar, las autoridades se reunirán con el gobernador regional de Loreto y el Comando Operacional de la Amazonía a fin de articular esfuerzos, en el marco de la declaratoria del estado de emergencia por el déficit hídrico decretada por el Gobierno Nacional. title: USA fordern Indien auf, RT zu verbieten – Indische Beamte: Forderung "für uns nicht relevant"
content: Nachdem die USA weitere Sanktionen gegen RT verhängt haben, bemüht sich Washington weiter um ein weltweites Verbot und die Sperrung des russischen staatlichen Mediennetzwerkes. Mit der Angelegenheit vertraute Quellen berichten der drittgrößten englischsprachigen Tageszeitung Indiens, The Hindu , dass US-Beamte gegenüber dem indischen Außenministerium gefordert haben, sich den US-Maßnahmen gegen das, was sie als "russische Desinformation" bezeichnen, anzuschließen. Demnach solle Indien die Akkreditierungen widerrufen und entsprechende Journalisten unter dem "Foreign Missions Act" benennen. Das Ministerium hat sich bisher noch nicht zu diesem Thema geäußert, Regierungsbeamte erklärten jedoch, die Debatte über Sanktionen sei für Indien "nicht relevant". Ein ehemaliger Diplomat erklärte zudem, das Verbot von Medienorganisationen zeige, dass westliche Länder mit "zweierlei Maß" messen. US-Außenminister Antony Blinken hatte am Freitag weitere Sanktionen gegen RT angekündigt und behauptet, die Medienorganisation, die Büros auf der ganzen Welt, darunter auch in Indien, unterhält, sei "de facto ein Arm des russischen Geheimdienstes". RT und das russische Außenministerium haben diesen Vorwurf mit scharfen Worten zurückgewiesen. Das US-Außenministerium teilte weiterhin mit, man habe zusammen mit Großbritannien und Kanada eine gemeinsame "diplomatische" Kampagne gestartet, um "Verbündete und Partner in der ganzen Welt zu versammeln, damit sie sich uns anschließen, um der...

title: Силы ПВО уничтожили украинский беспилотник над Белгородской областью
creator: Виталий Сонкин
content: Силы противовоздушной обороны (ПВО) уничтожили беспилотник Вооруженных сил Украины (ВСУ) над Белгородской областью. Об этом 15 сентября сообщило Минобороны. Отмечается, что киевский режим пытался совершить атаку с помощью дрона самолетного типа. Удар был пресечен около 18:45 мск. Как сообщали в ведомстве ранее в этот день, за ночь силы ПВО уничтожили 29 беспилотников боевиков над семью регионами России. Украинские боевики пытаются наносить удары по российским территориям на фоне спецоперации в Донбассе , о начале которой было объявлено 24 февраля 2022 года. Решение было принято вследствие обострения ситуации в регионе из-за обстрелов со стороны украинских военных.

title: Porto empilha gols perdidos e sofre para vencer o Farense
creator: Jogada10
content: O Porto sofreu, perdeu uma infinidade de gols, mas venceu o Farense neste domingo (15), no Estádio do Dragão, pela quinta rodada do Campeonato Português. Com o resultado, a equipe do norte de Portugal assumiu a vice-liderança da competição, com quatro vitórias em uma derrota, somando 12 pontos. O Farense, por outro lado, perdeu todos os jogos e está em último lugar. O início do jogo deu a impressão de que o Porto construiria a vitória com facilidade. Logo aos três minutos, João Mário chutou na trave após passe de Ivan Jaime. No minuto seguinte, na marca do pênalti, Galeno chutou por cima. Aos 12, após rebote, Otávio cabeceou na trave. E nada de gol! O panorama, aliás, se manteve até o fim da primeira etapa, com o goleiro Ricardo Velho segurando o 0 a 0 em pelo menos mais quatro finalizações dos Dragões. A seca de gols, por fim, terminou logo no início da segunda etapa. Aos três minutos, Galeno, de pênalti, finalmente venceu Ricardo Velho e abriu o placar. Mas não seria um segundo tempo tranquilo para os donos da casa. Pelo contrário, três minutos depois, Otávio erro, Tomané avançou com a bola, driblou o goleiro e empatou. O Porto se assustou com o empate, mas aos poucos recuperou o domínio do jogo e voltou a empilhar oportunidades perdidas. Na maior delas, Nico Gonzalez atirou de longe e acertou a trave. A terceira do Porto na partida. O alívio, afinal, veio aos 30 minutos, quando Samu completou de primeira dentro da área após rebote de...

title: مقررات زدایی پیچیده برای تحقق رشد اقتصادی هشت درصدی + فیلم
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: رییس دادگستری شهرستان ساوه گفت: یکی از الزامات تحقق رشد اقتصادی هشت درصدی هدف‌گذاری شده در برنامه هفتم توسعه، انعطاف در تفسیر و اجرای قانون و مقررات زدایی پیچیده در مسیر جهش تولید است. شریفی در سومین جلسه ستاد اقتصاد مقاومتی و کمیته حمایت قضایی از سرمایه‌گذاری دادگستری شهرستان ساوه افزود: بهره‌گیری از ظرفیت‌های مردمی و مغفول نماندن توانمندی‌های داخلی، نخستین الزام در حوزه اقتصاد مقاومتی است که در این راستا موضوع خصوصی سازی با اجرایی کردن اصل ۴۴ قانون اساسی ابلاغی رهبر معظم انقلاب توصیه شده است و گفتمان آن این است که مردم و بخش خصوصی در اقتصاد مشارکت موثر و نتیجه بخش داشته باشند. شهرستان ساوه با دارا بودن قریب به ۱۰۰۰ واحد صنعتی و گمرک منطقه‌ی ویژه اقتصادی کاوه، یکی از قطب‌های تولید و صنعت در کشور محسوب می‌شود که صنعتگران آن بیش از هر زمان دیگری به تسهیلات لازم در خصوص رفع موانع تولید نیاز دارند. تخصیص ارز و ترخیص کالا، ثبت سفارش، کمبود نقدینگی و سود تسهیلات از مهمترین مسایل مطرح شده در این جلسه بود. var player = videojs('player_633270_19819073',{ techOrder: [ "html5" , "flash"],poster:'',width:600,height:350}) videojs.addLanguage('fa', {"No compatible source was found for this media.": "مشاهده ی ویدیو نیاز به پشتیبانی مرورگر از codec h264 یا نصب فلش پلیر دارد."}); player.one('play', (function(){ $.post('/fa/ajax/news/video/19819073',{},function (data) {}); })); دانلود فیلم اصلی کد ویدیو

title: ¿Cuánto se demora en prescribir una deuda bancaria en Perú, según el Código Civil?
content: Según una investigación de la Universidad del Pacífico ( UP ), más de 8,5 millones de la población no puede cumplir con sus obligaciones financieras a tiempo en el país, por lo que en su mayoría son registradas en Experian o Infocorp . De esta manera, muchos peruanos tienen inconvenientes al momento de solicitar préstamos o acceder a un crédito hipotecario debido al antecedente moroso, pero pocos saben el tiempo que permanece esta información registrada en el sistema. En la siguiente nota, te contamos todos los detalles. ¿CUÁNDO PRESCRIBE UNA DEUDA EN EL PERÚ? Javier Mori, gerente legal de Equifax (antes Infocorp) brindó una entrevista a Utileinteresante.pe para explicar el periodo que una deuda puede prescribir. Asimismo, mencionó que existen dos tipos de casos que revela la información de un historial crediticio. Estos son: Cabe mencionar que, según el experto, hay un tiempo determinado que es 10 años para la prescripción de deudas, pero esto no quiere decir que se elimine, todo lo contrario, el acreedor puede exigir judicialmente que cancele la deuda en un tiempo especifico continuando con un proceso legal. ¿CÓMO SABER SI TENGO DEUDAS CON ENTIDADES FINANCIERAS? A continuación, te compartimos el enlace de acceso al “Reporte de Deudas” de la Superintendencia de Banca, Seguros y AFP (SBS), junto al paso a paso a seguir para comprobar si tienes pendientes con entidades financieras: Es importante recordar que si no tienes una cuenta activa en el portal de...

title: گردش مالی سه هزار میلیارد ریالی فروش مبلمان منبت در ملایر
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: سلمان اسماعیلی گفت: دهه اول جشنواره های تابستانی به ویژه جشنواره ملی مبلمان منبت به خوبی و با کیفیت مطلوب سپری شد. وی اظهار کرد: مشاهدات نشان می‌دهد موفقیت‌های چشمگیری نسبت به دوره‌های قبل داشتیم و امیدواریم در دهه دوم جشنواره‌های نیز شاهد فروش بیشتر و حضور مسافران و گردشگران به جهان شهر ملایر باشیم. فرماندار ویژه ملایر ادامه داد: بیش از ۴۰ هزار شهروند ملایری به صورت مستقیم و غیرمستقیم در هنرصنعت مبلمان منبت مشغول به کار هستند و این همان تلاش در راستای تحقق شعار سال « جهش تولید با مشارکت مردم » است. اسماعیلی بیان کرد: طبق گزارشات میدانی علاوه بر فروش بسیار خوب در حوزه مبلمان و منبت، شاهد فعال شدن بسیاری از کسبه‌ها و اصناف مرتبط همچون رستوران‌ها و مراکز اقامتی در این شهرستان هستیم. وی ادامه داد: به طور قطع حفظ هنجارهای اجتماعی و ارزش‌های دینی و فرهنگی در برگزاری جشنواره‌ها مطالبه جدی ماست و دست اندرکاران باید به مثابه یک خط قرمز به این امر توجه کنند. فرماندار ویژه ملایر گفت: شهر جهانی ملایر، شهر جشنواره‌ها است و باید مسوولان برای امر مهم نشاط آفرینی در جامعه تمام همت خود را بکار گیرند. اسماعیلی تاکید کرد: اختتامیه پنجیمن جشنواره مبل و منبت هم باید در شأن مردم فرهنگ‌پرور ملایر و مسافران و گردشگران برگزار شود و برنامه‌ریزی توسط ستاد جشنواره به خوبی صورت خواهد گرفت.

title: 3 نكهات لا تقاوم! وصفات مكرونة متنوعة ومميزة
content: طريقة عمل المكرونة بالصلصة الحمراء: المكونات: مكرونة حسب الرغبة. بصلة مفرومة. فلفل ألوان مفروم. ثوم مفروم. معجون طماطم. مرقة دجاج. ملح. فلفل أسود. زيت زيتون. طريقة التحضير: اسلقي المكرونة في ماء مغلي مضاف إليه القليل من الملح حتى تنضج في مقلاة واسعة، سخني زيت الزيتون ثم أضيفي البصل والفلفل والثوم وقلبي حتى يذبلوا. أضيفي معجون الطماطم، مرقة الدجاج، الملح والفلفل قلبي المكونات جيدًا. أضيفي المكرونة المسلوقة إلى الصلصة وقلبي جيدًا حتى تتجانس المكونات. قدمي المكرونة ساخنة مزينة بأوراق الريحان الطازج. طريقة عمل المكرونة بالجبن الأبيض: المكونات: مكرونة (نوع حسب الرغبة) زبدة دقيق حليب جبن موزاريلا مبشورة جبن شيدر مبشورة ملح جوزة الطيب طريقة التحضير: اسلقي المكرونة كما في الطريقة الأولى. في وعاء مناسب ذوبي الزبدة ثم أضيفي الدقيق وقلبي جيدًا حتى يصبح الخليط ذهبياً. أضيفي الحليب بالتدريج مع التحريك المستمر حتى تحصلي على قوام كريمي. تبلي بالملح وجوزة الطيب. أضيفي المكرونة المسلوقة إلى الصلصة البيضاء وقلبي جيدًا. أضيفي الجبن المبشور وقلبي حتى يذوب الجبن. طريقة عمل المكرونة بالدجاج والخضار: المكونات: مكرونة صدورالدجاج خضروات مشكلة (بروكلي، جزر، فلفل ألوان) صلصة صويا عسل ثوم مفروم زيت نباتي ملح فلفل أسود طريقة التحضير: اسلقي المكرونة كما في الطرق السابقة. في وعاء مناسب، سخني الزيت ثم أضيفي الدجاج وقلبي حتى يصبح لونه ذهبياً أضيفي الخضروات وقلبي حتى تنضج. أضيفي صلصة الصويا، العسل، الثوم، الملح والفلفل، قلبي المكونات جيدًا. أضيفي المكرونة المسلوقة إلى خليط الدجاج والخضار وقلبي جيدًا

Search team looking for missing Jack O'Sullivan urges exercise-logging app Strava users to check their maps in an effort solve mystery
content: Search team looking for missing Jack O'Sullivan urges exercise-logging app Strava users to check their maps in an effort solve mystery By Emily Jane Davies Published: 17:32, 15 September 2024 | Updated: 17:37, 15 September 2024 e-mail View comments The search team looking for missing Jack O'Sullivan is pleading for Strava users to check their maps in a desperate effort to solve the mystery. Some believe that users of the exercise-logging app could reveal witnesses or other important information in the case of the missing 23-year-old who vanished after a night out. Jack, 23, was last seen at 3.15am on Saturday March 2 in the area of Brunel Lock Road/Brunel Way, in Bristol. Described as white, around 5ft 10ins tall, of slim build, with short, brown hair, Jack was on a night out with his friends when he went missing. Hundreds of taxi drivers have been interviewed and thousands of hours of CCTV reviewed but Jack's disappearance remains a mystery half a year on. Jack O'Sullivan, 23, was last seen at 3.15am on Saturday March 2 in Bristol The search team looking for missing Jack O'Sullivan is pleading for Strava users to check their maps in a desperate effort to solve the mystery Now an appeal has been posted on the 'FIND JACK' Facebook page - with more than 60k members - for Strava users to check their accounts. A web user who made the post is urging users of the physical activity tracking app to activate Strava Flyby which shows a map of your activity route. Read More EXCLUSIVE...

title: Lewandowski zszedł na ławkę i... czerwona kartka. Wystarczyło 17 minut
content: FC Barcelona pokonała Gironę w wyjazdowym spotkaniu La Liga 4:1. Robert Lewandowski murawę opuścił już w 69. minucie spotkania, mając na koncie symboliczną asystę. Polak został zmieniony przez Ferrana Torresa. Ten spędził na boisku ledwie 17 minut. Hiszpan bowiem w 86. minucie rywalizacji otrzymał bezpośrednią czerwoną kartkę za brutalny atak na kostkę przeciwnika. To już drugi taki przypadek w jego karierze. Robert Lewandowski swojego setnego występu w barwach FC Barcelony nie zaliczy do udanych pod względem indywidualnym. Polak był dobrze kryty przez obrońców, a gdy już udało się urwać defensorom, to pozostawał nieskuteczny w dogodnych okazjach. Pięć goli w derbach Katalonii. Barcelona miażdży. Wspaniały jubileusz "Lewego" Jego drużyna jednak na tym za bardzo nie ucierpiała, bo "Duma Katalonii" wygrała 4:1 z Gironą i umocniła się na prowadzeniu w lidze hiszpańskiej. Sam "Lewy" ten mecz zakończył z dorobkiem ledwie jednej symbolicznej asysty. Z boiska Polak zszedł w 69. minucie. W jego miejsce na murawie pojawił się Ferran Torres . Hiszpan, który ma za sobą udane zgrupowanie reprezentacji. Tego występu na pewno jednak nie będzie wspomniał latami , a jeśli tak, to nie z dobrych przyczyn. Zakończył go bowiem już po 17 minutach. Fatalne wieści dla Mbappe i spółki. Cios padł tuż przed Ligą Mistrzów Napastnik Barcelony "popisał się" brutalnym atakiem na kostkę przeciwnika. Sędzia się nie wahał i bez pomocy kolegów na wozie VAR...

title: Publikohen formacionet zyrtare të Teuta - Vllaznia
content: Teuta dhe Vllaznia luajnë sot një ndeshje shumë interesante mes tyre në javën e pestë të Superiores. Të dy skuadrat kanë ambicie për të qenë pjesë e katërshes që lufton për titullin ndaj edhe ky duel do të tregojë se si janë në raport me njëri-tjetrin. Të dy ekipet vijnë pas fitoreve të rëndësishme në kampionat, me durrsakët të cilët mundën Skënderbeun, ndërsa shkodranët të cilët mposhtën kampionët në fuqi të Egnatias. FORMACIONET ZYRTARE TEUTA: Tafas, Jazxhi, Kruja, Kotobelli, A. Peposhi, Beqja, Arifi, E. Peposhi, Vila, Lloci, Preknicaj. Trajner Edi Martini VLLAZNIA: Qarri, Gurishta, Juriç, Stojanoviç, Jago, Krymi, Qato, Alivoda, Mala, Delaj, Balaj. Trajner: Tomas Brdariç.

title: Pedri: "El balón viene rebotado de Balde, no es penalti"
creator: LUIS F. ROJO
content: , que marcó el cuarto gol del partido, reflejaba la alegría del vestuario azulgrana después del contundente triunfo en Montilivi frente al Girona. El canario asegura que Muñiz acertó al no pitar el penalti por mano de Íñigo Martínez. "Era un partido complicado, el Girona propone bien con balón. Pero hemos empezado muy bien, con intensidad, y nos llevamos los tres puntos". "Teníamos que empezar bien, otros años no empezamos como nos gustaría. El míster nos ha dicho que apretemos desde el primer momento, que Laliga la ganas en estos primeros encuentros y si sumas, vas cogiendo distancia". "Hemos mejorado mucho. Tenemos muy claro lo que nos pide el míster y cómo colocarnos. Hoy nos ha dado el primer gol con la presión de Lamine". "Es una jugada parecida a la que me hace Ciss en el Rayo y no lo expulsan. La tendré que ver repetida. Hay veces que no pitan lo mismo". "Le dije al árbitro eso, que venía de Balde, que el balón rebotado si es de un compañero, no se pita penalti, es lo que nos explicaron".

title: Giovanni van Bronckhorst'tan Şenol Güneş övgüsü
content: 15 Eylül 2024 19:37 Beşiktaş Teknik Direktörü Giovanni van Bronckhorst, Trabzonspor maçı öncesi açıklamalarda bulundu. Şenol Güneş'in Trabzonspor'un başına geçmesiyle ilgili konuşan van Bronckhorst, "Rakibimizi analiz ettik ama yeni bir hocaları var, kendisinin harika bir kariyeri var. Bugün nasıl oynayacaklarını göreceğiz. Maçı domine etmek ve fırsatlar yakalamak istiyoruz."dedi. Kaldıkları yerden devam etmek istediklerini söyleyen Hollandalı teknik adam, "Milli aradan önce nasılsak bugün de öyle devam etmek istiyoruz. Tecrübeli oyuncularımız var. Ayrıca bugün zindeyiz ve hazırız, kazanmak istiyoruz." sözlerini sarf etti.

title: [ŽT] „Pirmą kartą. Rusai padarė tai, ko niekada istorijoje nebuvo darę.“ Kas vyksta prie Suomijos
content: Norvegijos laikraštis „Berents Observer“ praneša, kad rusai, vykdydami strateginius manevrus Baltijos ir Ramiojo vandenyno regionuose, pirmą kartą Ladogos ežere dislokavo raketines korvetes. Laivai turėjo plaukti šiaurės kryptimi, kad pasiektų Arkties vandenyną. Vykdydami karinio jūrų laivyno operacijas Baltijos ir Ramiojo vandenyno zonose, , praneša „ “. Rusai praneša, kad jų laivuose yra tolimojo nuotolio sparnuotųjų raketų „Kalibr“. Suomijos dienraštis „Ilta-Sanomat“ pažymi, kad . Rusija ketina veikti aplink visą Skandinavijos pusiasalį. Jie nori tai pasiekti plaukdami nuo Ladogos ežero šiaurės kryptimi – per Onegos ežerą, o paskui Baltosios jūra ir Baltijos kanalu Arkties vandenyno link.

title: „Anksčiau kare jų nenaudojo.“ Buvo aktyvuoti patys pavojingiausi ginklai
content: Ukrainos šaltinių teigimu, Mat „Defense 24“ teigimu, Rusija vis dar elgiasi atsargiai ir Raketas jie leidžia būdami virš Rusijos ar bent jau okupuotų teritorijų, kad tik nepasimaišytų Ukrainos oro gynybos sistemų akiratyje. Tegul Su-57 nesiartina prie Ukrainos oro gynybos sistemų, bet vis tiek kelia joms grėsmę. Pavyzdžiui, , todėl neiškraipo naikintuvo formų, kurios leidžia jam išvengti radarų pastebėjimo. Ch-58UŠKE pirmą kartą viešai pristatyta 2007 metais, bet kitos Ch-58 versijos naudojamos nuo 1982 metų. Tiesiog tais 2007 metais paaiškėjo, kad šią 4,2 metrų ilgio raketą galima sugrūsti į penktos kartos naikintuvo vidų. Ch-58UŠKE yra priešradarinė raketa. Jos užduotis – naikinti ginkluotės sistemas pagal jų skleidžiamus signalus. Ukrainos atveju Kas žino, jei tos atakos Rusijai bus sėkmingos, galbūt Su-57 drąsiai pasirodys virš Ukrainos. Šiuo metu Su-57 naudojimas intensyvėja, bet iš toliau. Tai įmanoma, nes iš didesnio aukščio paleista Ch-58UŠKE gali nuskrieti net 245 km. , nes pasiekia 3,6 machų greitį. Ji neša 145 kg sveriančią kovinę galvutę, kuri gali padaryti labai rimtos žalos visai oro gynybos sistemai. Kodėl Rusija intensyvina Su-57 naudojimą? Tikėtina, kad vyksta bandymai. Taip pat gali būti, kad Rusija nori pailsinti naudingesnius lėktuvus. Kam laikyti Su-57 sveikus ir stovinčius ir naudoti orlaivius, kurie genda, yra apgadinami ir krenta?

title: „Parašiau laišką su konkrečiais grasinimais.“ Didžiausias skandalas Lietuvos istorijoje (Foto)
content: Lietuviškas portalas Delfi.lt paskelbė, kad kulinarijos rubrika paskelbė tekstą, kuriame siūloma pasigaminti vasaros patiekalą – šaltą lenkišką rožinę sriubą. Pavadinimas nurodytas kaip chłodnik litewski – lietuviška šalta siuba. Po įrašu pasipylė žinomų žmonių komentarai, visi rašė, kad tai klaida – sriuba ne lenkiška. Viešųjų ryšių specialistas Karolis Žukauskas susisiekė su „The New York Times“ ir paragino jo darbuotojus ištaisyti klaidą. „Visi piktinasi vienu „The New York Times“ kulinarinėje rubrikoje šalta barščių lenkiška sriuba... Palikau komentarą po straipsniu feisbuke, bet pagalvojau, kad to neužtenka. Radau autorę, kuri padarė šią klaidą – NYT „Kulinarija“ rubrikos redaktorę Kasia Pilat ir visais įmanomais kanalais (FB, email, „Linkedin“ ir kt.) parašiau jai laišką su konkrečiais grasinimais ir reikalavimais. Visas „The New York Times“ egzistavimo klausimas dabar priklauso nuo Kasios pasirinkimo – reaguoti ir leisti problemai išaugti iki tokio lygio, kokį Amerika matė 1962 m. spalį. plakatais, “ – rašė Žukauskas. Jis kreipėsi į Kasią Pilat su prašymu ištaisyti klaidą.

title: Nepaprastas atradimas. Naršydamas žemėlapių programėlėje vyras aptiko neįprastą struktūrą
content: Naršydami „Google“ žemėlapiuose žmonės yra aptikę įvairių keistenybių – nuo „ateivių“ iki atsakymų į dešimtmečių senumo bylas. Dabar Joelis Lapointe J. Lapointe kreipėsi į geofiziką Pierre Rochette iš Aplinkos geomokslų tyrimų centro (pranc. Centre de recherche en géosciences de l'environnement, CEREGE) Prancūzijoje, prašydamas padėti identifikuoti keistą objektą. Nors paprastai „Google“ žemėlapiuose aptinkamos struktūros dažniausiai nebūna ypatingos, komanda nustatė, kad šis objektas galėjo atsirasti dėl smūgio. Suintriguoti mokslininkai atidžiau apžiūrėjo vietovę, ir dabar mano, kad ežerą supantis nedidelių kalnų žiedas anksčiau galėjo būti neteisingai klasifikuotas. Nagrinėdama iš vietovės paimtus mėginius, komanda identifikavo silikatus, gausų magnetito, sulfidų ir cirkonų kiekį – visa tai yra daug žadantys požymiai, rodantys, kad tai yra smūgio metu išsilydžiusios uolienos. Komanda tikisi netrukus apsilankyti vietovėje ir įvertinti, ar joje yra daugiau smūgio įrodymų, rašo „IFLScience“. Išvados buvo pristatytos kasmetiniame renginyje .

title: UK airport incident as 'police attend' and people 'evacuated'
creator: bristolpostnews@localworld.co.uk (Josh Sandiford, Lisa Letcher)
content: A UK airport faced disruption this afternoon following reports of people being "evacuated" amid the arrival of armed police. Pictures captured passengers waiting outside the airport while some recounted being "stuck on planes". The commotion reportedly started at Birmingham Airport around 4pm, though details of what transpired remain unclear. The incident has since been resolved. A statement from Birmingham Airport initially said: "We are aware of an incident at the airport in which police are attending. Those at the airport should follow the instructions of the police as we work together to bring the incident to a close." The airport spokesperson later confirmed: "The incident has been cleared. Passengers are now being let back into terminals." Social media was abuzz with messages from affected passengers, including one who posted: "Stuck on a plane at Birmingham Airport, any news from inside? " and another who said: "I got off the air rail and was told to get straight outside. "Nobody allowed into departures. People saying it's been evacuated and armed police arriving.", reports Birmingham Live . Further reports surfaced of people held up in the baggage claim area, accompanied by an image showing large groups of people gathered.

title: Infrastructure, agriculture key focus areas of 100 days of Modi 3.0
Oyuncu ve seslendirme sanatçısı Pekcan Koşar'ın ölümünün üzerinden 19 yıl geçti
content: İstanbul'da 11 Nisan 1936'da doğan Koşar, Güzel Sanatlar Akademisini bitirdikten sonra amatör olarak tiyatro yapmaya başladı. Küçük Sahne'de 1955'te "Çayhane" oyunuyla profesyonel oyunculuğa adım atan Koşar, Agah Hün, Vala Önengüt gibi isimlerden seslendirme eğitimi aldı. Daha sonra Oda Tiyatrosu'na girerek Misafir, Gökteki Kaldırımlar, Öteki, Tapılacak Kadın ve "Tersine Dönen Şemsiye" piyeslerinde rol alan oyuncu, Lale Oraloğlu Tiyatrosu'nun saat 6 temsillerinde yer aldı. Gong Tiyatrosu'nu kurdu Koşar, 1961'de Gong Tiyatrosu'nu kurdu, Gülriz Sururi-Engin Cezzar Tiyatrosu'nun Küçük Sahne'deki temsillerinde oynadı. "Hababam Sınıfı" serilerinde Tarık Akan ve Ahmet Arıman'ın seslendirmesini yapan Koşar, "Selvi Boylum Al Yazmalım" filminde ise Kadir İnanır'ı seslendirdi. Koşar, 16 Eylül 2005'te Yalova'nın Çınarcık ilçesindeki yazlığında öldü. Koşar'ın cenazesi Zincirlikuyu Mezarlığı'na defnedildi. Koşar, "Çayhane", "Gökteki Kaldırımlar", "Misafir", "Lourcine Sokağı Cinayeti", "Salaklar Sofrası", "Hadi Öldürsene Canikom" tiyatro oyunları ile "Lejyon Dönüşü", "Kocamın Nişanlısı", "Ölüm Tarlası", "Özgürlüğün Bedeli", "Çıplak Vatandaş", "Rumuz Goncagül" sinema filmlerinin yanı sıra "Yaz Evi", "Mutlu Günler", "Ruhsar" ve "Evimiz Olacak mı?"nın da arasında yer aldığı dizilerde oyunculuk yaptı.

title: Σύντροφε Χάρη, συντρόφισσα Άννα
creator: news@dnews.gr (Ο ΠΛΗΡΟΦΟΡΙΟΔΟΤΗΣ)
content: Η Άννα Διαμαντοπούλου είχε υποστηρίξει την υποψηφιότητα του Χάρη Δούκα για τον Δήμο Αθηναίων, χωρίς προφανώς να μπορεί να φανταστεί ότι, τόσο σύντομα, θα βρίσκονταν απέναντι στη διεκδίκηση της ηγεσίας του ΠΑΣΟΚ. Από το βήμα της ΚΕ, η πρώην Επίτροπος αναφέρθηκε στην ανάγκη για αποκέντρωση πόρων και αρμοδιοτήτων με μια πολιτικά ακηδεμόνευτη τοπική αυτοδιοίκηση και στο σημείο αυτό απευθύνθηκε προσωπικά στον Δήμαρχο Αθηναίων Χάρη Δούκα, εννοώντας πως το αξίωμα που διεκδικεί στο ΠΑΣΟΚ δεν συνάδει με μια ακομμάτιστη δημοτική αρχή. Ο Χάρης Δούκας δεν το ξέχασε και όταν ανέβηκε στο βήμα απευθύνθηκε και ο ίδιος στην Άννα Διαμαντοπούλου: "Να το ξέρουν, όλοι και συνυποψηφιοί μου, και η Άννα, ότι η μάχη που δίνω τώρα για το ΠΑΣΟΚ, είναι ταυτόχρονα και μάχη για την αυτονομία και την ανεξαρτησία της Αυτοδιοίκησης". Η συνέχεια στο debate... Α.Σ.

title: Durukan Şekerleme halka arz sonuçları! DURKN kişi başı kaç lot verdi?
content: 11-12 Eylül tarihlerinde gerçekleştirilen talep toplama sürecinin ardından Durukan Şekerleme Sanayi ve Ticaret A.Ş. (DURKN), borsada işlem görmek için ilk adımını attı. Deniz Yatırım Menkul Kıymetler A.Ş.'nin Kamuyu Aydınlatma Platformu'nda (KAP) 13 Eylül 2024 tarihinde duyurduğu halka arz sonuçlarına göre, yatırımcılara dağıtılan lot miktarı ve talep karşılanma oranları açıklandı. Yatırımcılar, DURKN'nin halka arzında pay dağılımı ve borsa performansını yakından takip ediyor. DURUKAN ŞEKERLEME (DURKN) HALKA ARZ SONUÇLARI 📊 Kişi Başı Dağıtılan Lot Miktarı: Bireysel yatırımcılara azami 67 lot hisse dağıtıldı. 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Yatırımcı Sayısı: Halka arzda talebi karşılanan toplam yatırımcı sayısı: 687.689 . 📈 Halka Arz Edilen Paylar: Sermaye artışı yoluyla halka arz edilen: 32.500.000 TL nominal değerli pay. Ortak satışı yoluyla halka arz edilen: 10.000.000 TL nominal değerli pay. Toplam halka arz büyüklüğü: 722.500.000 TL . Paylaşılan halka arz sonuçları 📉 Halka Arz Talep ve Dağıtım: Halka arzda toplam 698.198 adet emir verildi. Toplam 138.935.808 adet nominal değerli pay için 2.639.780.352,00 TL tutarında talep geldi. Dağıtım sonucunda 689.338 adet yatırımcıya toplam 42.500.000 TL nominal değerli pay satışı gerçekleştirildi. 🔍 Önemli Notlar: Payların %5'inden fazlasını alan gerçek ve/veya tüzel kişi bulunmadı. Yatırımcı grubu bazında tahsisat yapılmadı. Not: Bu haberde yer alan bilgiler, Sermaye Piyasası Kurulu (SPK) ve Kamuyu Aydınlatma...

title: Mike Tyson, Jake Paul in attendance at Cowboys-Saints game ahead of fight in November
content: ARLINGTON, Texas — The legendary boxer dubbed "baddest man on the planet" and the man looking to take him down both showed up in AT&T Stadium ahead of the Cowboys-Saints Week 2 matchup. "Iron Mike" Tyson and Jake Paul were in attendance at the game, two months before they square off in the very same building. Originally scheduled for July 20, the Tyson-Paul fight was rescheduled to Nov. 15 after Tyson had a medical emergency mid-flight . Tyson posed for the cameras pre-game on the sidelines and spoke with owner Jerry Jones and NFL legend Tom Brady, who would call the game for FOX. Paul also had a few moments with the Cowboys owner. Dallas and New Orleans kick off at noon CT from AT&T Stadium. The Tyson-Paul fight will be aired exclusively on Netflix and will be free for Netflix subscribers. There will not be any additional pay-per-view charges. Official tickets are still available via SeatGeek with the cheapest seats selling for $70 and the most expensive ringside seats going for $20,000. More Dallas Cowboys headlines : Related Articles Former Cowboys QB Troy Aikman featured in country artist Wad Bowen's music video for new single 'Friday Night' 5 things to watch for in Dallas Cowboys' home opener vs. New Orleans Saints Who's in, who's out? | Dallas Cowboys injury report released for Saints game

title: Club legend and Euro winner Chiellini returns to Juventus as a diplomat
content: Former Italy and Juventus defender Giorgio Chiellini has returned to the Italian club in an executive role focusing on relations with national and international football institutions, the Serie A side said on Sunday. “Chiellini never truly left the Bianconeri - his heart, soul and values have always remained connected to the club, both on and off the field. As of September 16, he will serve as Head of Football Institutional Relations,” the club said in a statement. Chiellini represented Italy 117 times and captained them to the Euro 2020 title, when it beat England on penalties in the final at Wembley. Chiellini (right) celebrates winning the 2020 European Championship, beating England in the final.| Photo Credit:Getty Images He spent most of his club career at Juventus, helping them win nine consecutive Serie A titles, five Coppa Italia trophies and five domestic Supercups. He also has a Masters in Business Administration from the University of Turin. ALSO READ: Juventus coach Motta criticises attack after Empoli draw “His academic background complements his experience as a player, captain and Juventus legend,” the club said. Chiellini retired from professional football in December before taking on the role of player development coach at Major League Soccer side Los Angeles FC, the club he joined in 2022 after leaving Juve. Comments Related Topics Juventus / Giorgio Chiellini / Italy Latest on Sportstar

title: Harris-Trump latest presidential polls: Shocking 14-point swing in this state might tell you everything
content: While the latest ABC News/Ipsos poll reveals that Kamala Harris’ dominant debate performance and pop icon Taylor Swift’s endorsement of the vice president might have had only a one-point short-term affect on the polls, the survey nonetheless shows Harris with a six-point national lead over former president Donald Trump . That’s outside the margin of error. Says ABC: “Vote preferences haven’t moved meaningfully. This poll finds the race at 51-46%, Harris-Trump, among all adults; 51-47% among registered voters; and 52-46% among likely voters. Each is within a percentage point of its pre-debate level in ABC/Ipsos polling.” The poll is a national snapshot and doesn’t assess the campaign at the state level, which determines the winner of the Electoral College. But the Des Moines Register’s latest presidential state poll might tell voters all they need to know: In June, Trump led President Joe Biden by 18 points, but Harris has narrowed that margin to only four points — in a deep red state. Trump won Iowa by eight points in the 2020 presidential election against Biden. “This poll may be catching newly energized voters who thought they would sit out the election at the time our June poll was taken,” Selzer said. The new Des Moines Register/Mediacom Iowa Poll shows that Trump leads Harris 47% to 43% among likely Iowa voters — a far slimmer margin than the huge lead the Republican former president enjoyed in late spring. Before Biden ended his reelection campaign, a June Iowa Poll...

title: "Hırs problemimiz vardı ama kazandık!"
content: Trendyol Süper Lig'in 5. haftasında deplasmanda Kasımpaşa'yı 2-0 mağlup eden Fenerbahçe'de teknik direktör Jose Mourinho, galibiyetin ardından açıklamalarda bulundu. İşte Portekizli çalıştırıcının o sözleri: İkinci yarı takımı beğenmedim. Skor güzel, oyunu ilk yarıda iyi kontrol ettik. İlk yarıdaki hırsı ikinci yarıda göstermedik. Çok hata yaptık, sanki oyuncular 3 puanı alıp eve gitmek istiyor gibiydi. Ancak milli arada oyuncular rutinini kaybedebilir, o yüzden 3 puanı almak önemli bizim için. Çok fazla top kaybı yaptık, topu tutamadık. İkinci yarıdaki tek pozisyonumuz kornerden Çağlar ile geldi. Bir hırs problemimiz vardı ve daha farklı şekilde olmasını tercih ederdim. 2-0 oyuncuları rahatlatmış gibiydi ancak kazanmayı bildik. title: 'পার্থ চট্টোপাধ্যায় কবে থেকে অতি বামদের গড ফাদার?' কলতানের গ্রেফতারিতে বিস্ফোরক শতরুপ
creator: Subhankar Das
content: রীতিমতো সরব বামেরা। বাম যুব নেতা কলতান দাশগুপ্তর গ্রেফাতারি নিয়ে এবার মুখ খুললেন সিপিএম নেতা শতরূপ ঘোষ (Shatarup Ghosh)। রীতিমতো সরব বামেরা। বাম যুব নেতা কলতান দাশগুপ্তর গ্রেফাতারি নিয়ে এবার মুখ খুললেন সিপিএম নেতা শতরূপ ঘোষ (Shatarup Ghosh)। কার্যত, কলতান দাশগুপ্তর গ্রেফতারির পরেই সরব হন বাম নেতারা। এর আগেই পেগাসাস ব্যবহার নিয়ে অভিযোগ তুলেছিল তারা। আর এবার এই নিয়ে পরিষ্কার মুখ খুললেন শতরুপ। তিনি জানান, এখন আর্টিফিশিয়াল ইন্টেলিজেন্স (AI) ব্যবহার করে অনেক ভিডিও বানানো হচ্ছে। সেক্ষেত্রে কুণাল ঘোষের পোস্ট করা ভিডিওর সত্যতা নিয়েও রীতিমতো প্রশ্ন তুলে দিয়েছেন তিনি। সেইসঙ্গে, গ্রেফতার হওয়া পার্থ চট্টোপাধ্যায়ের একটি ছবি দেখিয়েও বিস্ফোরক অভিযোগ করেন শতরূপ। রবিবার, সিপিএম (CPM) নেতা শতরুপ বলেন, “এখন এমন এইরকম অনেক অডিও শুনতে পাওয়া যায়। মৌসুমি ভৌমিকের গান অরিজিৎ সিংয়ের গলায় এআই দিয়ে বানানো হয়েছে। তারপর শুনি যে, অনুপম রায়ের গান ‘আমি বাউন্ডুলে ঘুড়ি’ হেমন্ত মুখোপাধ্যায়ের গলায়। সুতরাং, এইসব শুনলে সাধারণ মানুষ হাসাহাসি করে।” একইসঙ্গে শতরূপ এও জানাচ্ছেন যে, “একটা আক্রমণের আষাড়ে গল্প শুনিয়ে ধর্না মঞ্চ সিসিটিভি দিয়ে মুড়ে ফেলা হল। আমরা পরিষ্কার দাবি করছি যে, ঐ সিসিটিভিগুলি থেকে অডিও শোনা যায় কি না, তা দেখাতে হবে। ওইখানে সিসিটিভি লাগানো হয়েছে আন্দোলনকারীরা কী কথা বলছেন তা শোনার জন্য। অডিও এনেবল সিসিটিভি লাগিয়ে আসলে আড়ি পাতা হচ্ছে।” শতরূপ আরও যোগ করেন, “সঞ্জীব দাসের ফেসবুক থেকে অনেককিছুই পোস্ট করা হয়েছে। গত ২০১৭ সালের ২১ সেপ্টেম্বর, পার্থ চট্টোপাধ্যায়ের একটি ছবি পোস্ট করে লিখেছিলেন মাই গড ফাদার। ইনি মাওসেতুং নাকি কিষেনজি? পার্থ চট্টোপাধ্যায়...

title: وفد من بعثة الاتحاد الأوروبي لمراقبة الانتخابات الأردنية يلتقي الإعلامي فادي العمرو
content: خبرني -اجرى وفد من بعثة الاتحاد الأوروبي لمراقبة الانتخابات النيابية زيارة خاصة لناشر موقع بلكي نيوز الإعلامي فادي العمرو حيث جرى خلال الزيارة تبادل الآراء حول مدى تطبيق الهيئة المستقلة للانتخاب للمعايير الدولية وامتثالها للدستور والقوانين الأردنية ودرجة نزاهة العملية الانتخابية من لحظة حل المجلس السابق مرورا بالترشح والدعاية والاقتراع حتى الفرز النهائي للمجلس العشرين . وقد أشار الوفد إلى ان الانتخابات البرلمانية الأردنية كانت ناجحة وبدرجة كبيرة حيث أن سير العملية الانتخابية اتسم بحسن الإدارة والتنظيم والمهنية ، وأهم ماتم الإشارة إليه من قبل الوفد أن الانتخابات جرت في موعدها المقرر لها برغم الاضطرابات الإقليمية وحالة عدم الاستقرار في المنطقة ، وقد استدل الوفد على نزاهة العملية الانتخابية بالاشارة إلى أن غالبية المرشحين أعربوا عن رضاهم لحيادية لجان الانتخاب في كل المواقع . من جانبه أعرب العمرو عن شكره للزيارة والقراءة الدقيقة للوفد للعملية الانتخابية وأهمية حضورهم كمراقبين دوليين لنقل الصورة الإيجابية والمتنامية للديمقراطية الأردنية . وأكد العمرو للوفد أن الاردن ملتزم بأن يتماشى القانون الانتخابي مع الالتزامات الدولية التي وقعها الاردن بخصوص ديموقراطية العملية الانتخابية ونزاهتها ، ومؤكدا أن ماحصل خطوة مهمة في سياق التحديث والتطوير المستمر للنهج الديمقراطي الذي نطمح إليه

title: Le lait végétal devient de plus en plus populaire
大的飆摩多 小的飆腳車 斬草不除根 春風吹又生
creator: Liew Nyuk Ming
content: 7年前 8孩童騎蚊型腳車慘被撞死 7年後 8少年騎蚊型腳車飆上天橋 (亚罗士打15日讯)隨著華裔女郎沈可婷於7年前深夜因能見度低而撞死8名在馬路騎乘無照明燈且違法的蚊型腳車男童後,蚊型腳車黨即沉寂一時,但最近又死灰復燃,一群蚊型脚车党近日更罔顾性命和交通安全,在高架天桥上较量並往下冲後飙行,有者更以躺卧在坐垫上作出“超人”姿勢地疾驰飙行,结果当场翻覆,所幸没酿成意外事故。 網絡廣传一则時長约20秒的视频顯示,週六傍晚约7时,有一群少年在钢沙路直往直落湾也方向的高架天桥上騎乘蚊型腳車。 视频中拍到约8名少年在高架天桥左边车道,骑著蚊型脚车从高处飙行往下冲,另有两人则在桥旁观看,其中一人看似在拍摄同党的飙行动作。 当时这群少年在做惊险飙行动作时,右边车道有轿车行驶,但他们完全不理会身旁或身后随后而至的交通工具。 画面中可看到有数名骑著蚊型脚车的少年戴著墨镜,耍酷躺卧在坐垫上,扮演“超人”疾驰飙行,结果在冲到平路时,其中一人突然连人带车翻覆。 虽然当时翻覆少年快速起身并将脚车移走,但低头没查看周遭的交通情况,险些被一辆摩多撞上。 据了解,这群蚊型脚车党是在昨日下午从PKNK住宅花园利用小路穿行到约3.5公里外的直落湾也区,再骑上高架天桥展开飙行。(YLS)

title: Amgen Irish Open Par Scores
James Rodríguez ilusiona al Rayo Vallecano con su debut en la Liga de España: fecha, hora y canal de TV
content: El Rayo Vallecano recibe a Osasuna con la ilusión desbordada entre su afición, que espera el estreno de su nuevo ídolo, el colombiano James Rodríguez, que podría disponer de los primeros minutos de la temporada ante el equipo navarro, que llega a la cita con la duda del internacional balcánico Ante Budimir. Conforme a los criterios de MÁS INFORMACIÓN Lea acá: DT de Once Caldas pide carro para todos sus jugadores tras goleada contra Deportivo Cali: Dayro Moreno no se aguantó la risa (video) El equipo madrileño llega a este partido tras un parón que ha servido para refrescar ideas, tranquilizar ánimos y seguir trabajando en un patrón de juego que ha dado muchas alegrías durante las últimas temporadas y que con las nuevas incorporaciones espera Iñigo Pérez que se afiance cuanto antes. El Rayo suma cuatro puntos de los doce en juego saldados en una victoria (Real Sociedad), un empate (Getafe) y dos derrotas (Barcelona y Espanyol) en las dos últimas jornadas. Para este partido la principal incógnita en el Rayo es saber si debutará James Rodríguez, algo que parece probable aunque no de inicio. El colombiano está siendo un jugador diferencial con la Selección Colombia, como demostró esta semana ante Argentina, pero Íñigo Pérez no quiere correr con él y, por tanto, podría esperar su oportunidad desde el banquillo. title: جان باختن ۵ شهروند افغانستانی در معدن ذغال سنگ
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: پنج شهروند اهل افغانستان به دلیل مسمومیت ناشی از گاز در یک معدن زغال سنگ در پاکستان جان باخته‌اند. روزنامه دان پاکستان گزارش می دهد، این حادثه روز یک‌شنبه، ۲۵ سنبله، در یک معدن زغال سنگ واقع در ولسوالی هرنای ایالت بلوچستان رخ داده است. بر اساس این گزارش، معدن‌کاران در هنگام حفاری دچار مسمومیت شده و جان خود را از دست داده‌اند. روزنامه دان نام چهار تن از جان‌باختگان را رحمان‌شاه، شفیق‌الله، زبیرالله و مطیع‌الله ذکر کرده، اما هویت شخص پنجم هنوز مشخص نشده است. مقام‌های امنیتی ایالت بلوچستان اعلام کرده‌اند که اجساد این معدن‌کاران به افغانستان منتقل خواهند شد. گفتنی است که شماری از شهروندان افغانستان در ولسوالی هرنای، که به معادن زغال سنگ خود مشهور است، مشغول کار هستند.

The greatest player of his generation, probably the greatest player ever, would be the logical pick. Spoiler alert: It wasn’t Messi. “I did what had to be done,” Callender said. Indeed, it was Inter Miami’s goalie — in the 11th round of a penalty-shot shootout — who scored what became the winner of that Leagues Cup final last year against Nashville SC. He scored, then saved Nashville goalie Elliot Panicco’s attempt to tie the game and extend the shootout to finish off the win. It’s a moment that forever will live in Inter Miami lore. It’s also a reminder that in big moments, Callender is already proven. title: Starkes Vogtland-Wochenende in der Sachsenklasse: BSV Irfersgrün schnuppert ganz oben, Merkur Oelsnitz stürzt den Tabellenführer
Tonight's rugby news as Wales international embarks on new journey after retirement as Siya Kolisi opens up on shock exit
creator: newsdesk@walesonline.co.uk (Steffan Thomas)
content: These are your evening headlines on Sunday September 15. Former Wales star embarks on new journey with ex-team-mate Former Wales flanker has been learning Welsh with the help of Ken Owens in an S4C programme which will air on Sunday night. The new series of Iaith ar Daith, which airs on Sunday 15 September, sees one celebrity paired with a well-known Welsh-speaking mentor as they travel around Wales learning the language. Navidi, who will be mentored by his friend, former Wales captain Owens, isn't the only athlete involved in the show - with Wales football international Jess Fishlock being tutored by sports presenter Catrin Heledd. Speaking about doing the show, Navidi said: “My Mum’s a Welsh speaker, so she talks to me in Welsh but I answer in English, so I want to get my Welsh back. “Welsh language is part of me, but I just need the confidence to unlock that and be able to talk to people in the language.” Josh’s father left Iran for Wales as a result of Iran’s Islamic Revolution in 1979, where he met Josh’s mother, who is originally from Anglesey , in Bangor . Josh’s journey begins in Llanddona, Anglesey – his Grandmother’s home and a place which holds special meaning to him. Since retiring from the playing field, Josh has turned his hand to a number of ventures, including commentating, DJing and selling cars. Among the challenges set for him in Iaith ar Daith is selling a car in a garage in Bethel, spinning records, and conducting a tour of the Principality Stadium – all...

Cosenza, Alvini: "Primo tempo su ottimi livelli, nel secondo uscite le qualità della Samp"
content: Massimiliano Alvini , tecnico del Cosenza , è intervenuto nella sala stampa del "San Vito-Marulla" al termine della gara vinta per 2-1 contro la Sampdoria. Queste le sue parole, riprese da PianetaSerieB : "Il merito della vittoria è della squadra, che ha fatto una buona partita e portato a casa il risultato. Il primo tempo è stato giocato su ottimi livelli, mentre nel secondo sono uscite le qualità dei nostri avversari: in quel frangente, abbiamo dimostrato di dover migliorare sotto alcuni aspetti. Questa partita ci lascia tanti spunti. Sul gol subito ci abbiamo messo del nostro, era una rete evitabile: potevamo fare una lettura diversa. Concediamo troppo nei primi minuti del secondo tempo, ora io e il mio staff dovremo cercare di porvi rimedio". Sul prossimo impegno con il Sassuolo : "Ci aspetta un'altra grande squadra, per fronteggiare i neroverdi bisognerà fare uno step in più. Il nostro è un calcio fluido e di movimento, per questo i centrocampisti devono essere bravi ad effettuare le due fasi: oggi lo sono stati. Vorrei che nell'ambiente si mantenesse un certo equilibrio per affrontare bene anche le prossime partite". Su Fumagalli : "E' uscito per un problema fisico, ma bisogna attendere gli esami per capire di cosa si tratta".

title: THY'den kabin ekibine hakaret eden yolcu hakkında açıklama
content: Sosyal medya hesabından açıklama yapan Üstün, " 14.09.2024 tarihli TK1983 İstanbul-Londra seferinde kabin ekibi ve yolcularımıza karşı agresif tavırlar sergileyen ve sözlü hakarette bulunan yolcu uçaktan polis eşliğinde indirilmiştir. Uçağımıza maddi zarar veren B.G. isimli yolcu hakkında hukuki süreç başlatılmış olup, kural dışı yolcu listesine (kara liste) eklenmiştir." if adelerini kullandı.

title: Tumore della vescica, l’immunoterapia prima e dopo la chirurgia aumenta la sopravvivenza
creator: salute@gedi.it (Redazione di Salute)
content: L’aggiunta di durvalumab ha ridotto il rischio di morte del 25% e quello di recidiva del 32% rispetto alla sola chemioterapia neoadiuvante. È il primo regime immunoterapico perioperatorio a dimostrare un miglioramento. Lo studio, presentato ad Esmo, potrebbe cambiare la pratica clinica

Les Palestiniens devraient gouverner la bande de Gaza (Dirigeant du Hamas)
content: M. Hamdan a déclaré à l'AFP depuis Istanbul : « Le jour suivant doit être palestinien. Nous sommes allés à Pékin, nous avons négocié en tant que Palestiniens et nous avons accepté de former un gouvernement de consensus national pour gérer les affaires palestiniennes à Gaza, que le Hamas dirige depuis 2007. Le chef du Hamas a également accusé les États-Unis de ne pas exercer suffisamment de pression sur Israël pour mettre fin à la guerre sanglante dans la bande de Gaza, qui est entrée dans son douzième mois. L'administration américaine n'exerce pas une pression suffisante ou appropriée sur la partie israélienne, mais tente plutôt de justifier le fait qu'elle se soustrait à tout engagement, a ajouté Hamdan.

فرار کایسری‌اسپور از شکست با حضور علی کریمی

title: משרד החוץ גינה את צווי המעצר נגד נתניהו וגלנט, שעדיין לא יצאו - הפוסט נמחק
content: עובד חיצוני במשרד החוץ פרסם פוסט באתר המשרד המגנה את בית הדין הבינלאומי הפלילי בהאג על כך שהוציא צווי מעצר נגד ראש הממשלה בנימין נתניהו ושר הביטחון יואב גלנט, למרות שאלו עדיין לא יצאו. אחרי כמה דקות הציוץ נמחק, ובמשרד החוץ ציינו שמדובר בטעות אנוש.

SIMMONS SAYS: Charles Barkley 'disappointed' at friend Christine Simpson’s exit from Sportsnet
creator: Robert Cross
content: Article content I didn’t expect Charles Barkley to call back. He doesn’t know me. But he knows Christine Simpson. And he returned my cell phone message because he cares about his good friend. Simpson was let go by Sportsnet the other day in a move announced first by her and later confirmed by the network. On the phone Friday, Barkley admitted in rather quiet and unlikely tones he was shocked and saddened to learn that Simpson, the longtime hockey broadcaster, sister of two former NHL players, was shown the door by Sportsnet. “I’m disappointed,” said Barkley, the voice of basketball in America and maybe all over the world. “I’m disappointed for my friend. She’s a tremendous talent and a just a wonderful person and a great friend.” Barkley first met Simpson in Las Vegas more than 20 years ago when she was on a trip with Wayne Gretzky. Barkley and Simpson, along with Canadian broadcaster Rod Black, became close friends over the years. Almost every time Barkley mentions Canada on television, he somehow references both Simpson and Black. “I don’t know the circumstances of what happened,” said Barkley of Simpson’s departure from Sportsnet, where she has been prominent in hockey coverage — and in particular individual interviews — for the past 26 years. “I think she has to be in shock. “But I do know this: To have a Canadian woman talking about hockey with her connections has to be a bonus for any network. Any network would be wise to hire her.” When it was suggested to Barkley...

title: Viral Video: পোস্টার মুড়িয়ে ছাত্রদের মুখে সেদিন ছুঁড়ে মারেন সন্দীপ ঘোষ, রইল ভিডিয়ো
creator: TV9 Bangla
content: তবে জানা গিয়েছে, সে সময় প্রিন্সিপাল সন্দীপ ঘোষ। তাঁর পদত্যাগের দাবিতে ডাক্তারি পড়ুয়ারা আন্দোলন করছিলেন। প্রিন্সিপালের রুমের সামনে শুয়ে, বসে বিক্ষোভ দেখাচ্ছিলেন ছাত্ররা। ঘর থেকে মেজাজে বেরিয়ে আসেন সন্দীপ। তাঁর চেম্বারের দরজায় আন্দোলনকারীদের সাঁটানো পোস্টার ছিঁড়ে তা মুড়িয়ে ছুড়ে মারেন সামনে থাকা আন্দোলনকারীদের দিকে। জানা গিয়েছে, ভিডিয়োটি ২০২২ সালের। আরজি কর মেডিক্যালে তহবিল নয়ছয়ের অভিযোগ ওঠে সে সময়। তারই প্রতিবাদে চলছিল আন্দোলন। দাবি ওঠে তৎকালীন অধ্যক্ষ সন্দীপ ঘোষের পদত্যাগের। এরপরই এই কাণ্ড ঘটান। অথচ সেই দুর্নীতির অভিযোগকে সামনে রেখেই সিবিআইয়ের হাতে প্রথমে গ্রেফতার হন সন্দীপ ঘোষ। পরে তিলোত্তমা ধর্ষণ-খুন মামলায় গ্রেফতারি। শুধু তাই নয় আঙুল তুলে শাসাতেও দেখা যায় সন্দীপকে। একজন প্রিন্সিপালের এ হেন ডোন্ট কেয়ার মনোভাবে বিস্মিত অনেক চিকিৎসকই।

title: بازیکن الغرافه: DNA جنگیدن در ایرانی‌ها وجود دارد
creator: info@yjc.ir
content: عاصم مادیبو، هافبک الغرافه در نشست خبری پیش از بازی این تیم مقابل استقلال در لیگ نخبگان گفت: همانطور که مربی گفت برایمان بردن مهم است. تیم به خوبی آماده شده، با اینکه می‌دانیم بازی سختی داریم. می‌توانیم با اعتماد به هم به این مهم برسیم. مادیبو درمورد تقابل با تیم‌های ایرانی، عنوان کرد: بازی‌های زیادی را اینجا انجام دادم که سخت بوده، ایرانی‌ها شور بسیار عجیب و غریبی برای فوتبال دارند. همیشه تماشاگران باعث می‌شوند کارمان سخت شود. وی ادامه داد: اکثر بازی‌ها در استادیوم آزادی و پر از تماشاگر بوده و به همین خاطر فقط در یک بازی از ۹ بازی برنده شدیم، اما فردا بازی متفاوتی داریم. دی‌ان‌ای جنگیدن در ایرانی‌ها وجود دارد، اما ما هم تیم خوبی داریم. آرزوی بازی خیلی خوبی را دارم و امیدوارم به برد دوم برسیم. منبع: فارس

title: AB Yüksek Temsilcisi Borrell'den Venezuela Eleştirisi: 'Diktatör Rejim'
creator: Anadolu Ajansı
content: Venezuela'daki Siyasi Durum Üzerine Değerlendirme Avrupa Birliği (AB) Dış İlişkiler ve Güvenlik Politikası Yüksek Temsilcisi Josep Borrell , Venezuela'daki Devlet Başkanı Nicolas Maduro yönetimini açıkça 'diktatör rejim' olarak nitelendirdi. Borrell, İspanya'nın Telecinco televizyonuna verdiği demeçte, 28 Temmuz'da gerçekleşen başkanlık seçimleri sonrası yaşananlara dikkat çekti. Başkanlık Seçiminin Ardından Gelişmeler Borrell, seçim sonrası 2 binden fazla kişinin tutuklandığını, muhalif lider Edmundo Dominguez 'in Madrid'e kaçmak zorunda kaldığını ve ülke genelinde siyasi partilerin faaliyetlerinin ciddi şekilde kısıtlandığını belirtti. Ayrıca, 7 milyon Venezuelalının ülkesinden ayrıldığını vurguladı. Borrell, “Bu, diktatörce, otoriter bir yönetim ama söylemek hiçbir şeyi düzeltmiyor. Önemli olan meseleyi çözmeye çalışmak” dedi. İspanya ve Venezuela arasındaki Gerginlik Venezuela Dışişleri Bakanı Yvan Gil , İspanya Meclisi'nin Edmundo Gonzalez'i Venezuela'nın Devlet Başkanı olarak tanıma kararının ardından, Madrid Büyükelçisi’ni geri çağırdı. Venezuela Meclis Başkanı Jorge Rodriguez ise İspanya ile tüm diplomatik ve ekonomik ilişkilerin kesilmesini talep etti. Edmundo Gonzalez'in Madrid'e Gelişi İspanya hükümeti, Venezuela'da hakkında tutuklama kararı bulunan muhalefet adayı Edmundo Gonzalez 'i, eşinin yanı sıra 8 Eylül'de İspanya Hava Kuvvetlerine ait uçakla Madrid'e getirdi. title: Científicos revelan por qué no deberías llevar el celular al baño: mala postura y enfermedades son un peligro
content: Teletón 2024 . Alberto Fujimori . Alianza Lima vs Mannucci . Incendios forestales . Fonavi . Dólar en Perú . Ley Soto . Metro de Lima . Horóscopo . Dolar BCV . DolarToday . ÚLTIMAS NOTICIAS POLÍTICA ECONOMÍA SOCIEDAD MUNDO PERÚ DEPORTES ESPECTÁCULOS CINE Y SERIES DÓLAR SUSCRÍBETE Últimas Noticias Investigaciones de la Universidad de Arizona y la Universidad de Nueva Gales del Sur destacan los peligros de usar el celular en el baño, incluyendo infecciones bacterianas y problemas de salud posturales. Investigadores de la Universidad de Arizona han descubierto que el 90% de los teléfonos celulares que se utilizan a diario tienen microorganismos potencialmente peligrosos. Llevar el teléfono al baño se ha convertido en una rutina para muchas personas; sin embargo, científicos han alertado sobre los riesgos para la salud que esta práctica conlleva . Diversos estudios confirman que los dispositivos móviles están contaminados con bacterias y virus que podrían generar enfermedades graves. Además de los riesgos sanitarios, los expertos en salud destacan que el uso prolongado del celular en el baño puede tener consecuencias físicas. Permanecer sentado por largos períodos en la taza del inodoro mientras se navega en el teléfono puede generar problemas musculoesqueléticos, afectando la calidad de vida de quienes mantienen esta costumbre. El peligro de llevar el celular al baño Estudios han revelado que el teléfono móvil es uno de los dispositivos con más...

title: Granada se vuelca un año más en la ofrenda floral a la Virgen de las Angustias, su patrona
content: Guillermo Ortega Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Copiar enlace Facebook X Whatsapp Email Esta funcionalidad es sólo para registrados Esta funcionalidad es sólo para suscriptores Puede decirse sin temor a exagerar que septiembre es el mes de la Virgen de las Angustias en Granada. Pero, dentro de ese mes, hay dos especialmente importantes: el de la ofrenda floral a la patrona de la capital y el de su procesión por las principales calles del centro. El primero de ellos ha tenido lugar este domingo 15 de septiembre y ha congregado, como siempre, a miles de personas. Aunque la ofrenda comenzó a las 17.30 horas, desde por la mañana ya se observaba un movimiento de gente en los alrededores de la basílica, en la Carrera de la Virgen, donde se guarda su imagen. Un trasiego de tal envergadura sólo podía indicar que se estaba ante un día grande para muchos granadinos. Y también para muchos foráneos llegados desde otros puntos de la provincia y del resto de Andalucía. A la hora fijada, el arzobispo de Granada, José María Gil Tamayo, ha tomado la palabra para agradecer el «cariño renovado» de Granada hacia su patrona. Los granadinos, ha destacado que en días como éste se demuestra que los granadinos tienen «el corazón ensanchado por su amor a la Virgen». Entre vivas a la «Madre de Granada» ha comenzado la ofrenda, en la que han participado la alcaldesa de la ciudad, Marifrán Carazo, y los portavoces de los tres partidos políticos con representación en el...

title: Man City star makes retirement joke as fixture overload row continues | Sporting News
creator: Feargal Brennan
content: Manchester City star Manuel Akanji has joking hinted at considering retirement due to an ever-expanding fixture schedule this season. The row over games being added to the roster for the 2024/25 campaign has been a major talking point with FIFA and UEFA both coming in for criticism. Players and coaches at top clubs have been outspoken on the issue, as they look to manage game loads, to protect key players for a busy season. MORE: All the latest EPL club news | Team-by-team Premier League schedule for 2024/25 | Latest Premier League top scorer rankings Changes to the UEFA Champions League mean two extra games added in, alongside three international breaks from the start of the season, until the end of 2024. City will also compete in the 2026 FIFA Club World Cup next summer, with the gap narrowed to the the subsequent 2025/26 season, which is swiftly followed by the 2026 World Cup. Akanji has been a vital part of City's success in recent seasons, with 127 games for club and country, since joining City two years ago this month. The Swiss international has added his voice to the growing concern as City prepare to kickoff their Champions League campaign in midweek. "It's so tough. You don't just think about this season - but also the next one. Let's say we win the league or a cup, then go to the final of the Club World Cup, the Community Shield is three weeks after. When do we have holidays?", as per BBC Sport . "There are no breaks in winter, if we're lucky we get two weeks off,...

Belfast cruise passengers taking on 'grand adventure' while docked in Northern Ireland
creator: news@belfastlive.co.uk (Jane Corscadden)
content: Kit Cassingham and Dr Richard Namikas setting off on their walk from Belfast to Derry (Image: Randy Cassingham) Cruise passengers who have been docked in Belfast for three months are taking on a "great adventure" to pass the time. Kit Cassingham and Dr Richard Namikas are currently taking on a mighty 70 mile trek from Belfast to Derry, which they began on Friday morning. It's expected the journey will take them five days to complete. The two friends from the US met on the Villa Vie Residences' Odyssey, a round-the-world cruise ship which has been docked in Belfast since May . The ocean liner has been unable to leave the cruise terminal due to repair work required to the rudders and gearbox. Read more: See inside the impressive cruise ship docked in Belfast for past three months Read more: Belfast cruise ship couple "keep getting asked to go out for pints by locals" Despite the delays to their world travels, however, they're taking on the trek to show they are not "stranded" - as previous reports have suggested - and are enjoying their time getting to see more of Northern Ireland. Kit is no stranger to long-distance walking, having previously walked the Camino de Santiago in Spain twice, totaling 750 miles. She has also recently walked from Rome to Assisi alone. Her decision to take on the trek to Derry , which she decided to do just last week, is another step on the "grand adventure" she is experiencing as part of the residential cruise trip. For the first day of Kit and...

title: В Борисовском районе «Ауди» сбила велосипедиста
content: В Борисовском районе Белгородской области произошло ДТП с участием «Aуди 80» и велосипедиста. Авария случилась 14 сентября около 20:45 на 56-м км дороги «Белгород-Грайворон-Козинка». По предварительной информации, водитель за рулем иномарки сбил мужчину на велосипеде, двигавшегося в попутном направлении. В пресс-службе ГАИ региона сообщили, что пострадавшего с полученными повреждениями доставили в больницу. Было проведено медосвидетельствование, которое показало, что автомобилист не был пьян. у велосипедиста взята кровь на ХТИ. Ранее в Борисовском районе на большой скорости перевернулся «Фольксваген».

title: Amad Diallo Was 'Best Player' for Man Utd vs Southampton
creator: Hannah Pinnock
content: Manchester United star Amad Diallo was his side's leading performer as Erik ten Hag led his charges back to winning ways with a 3-0 victory over Southampton at St Mary’s, according to Manchester Evening News journalist Samuel Luckhurst. It was a much-needed triumph for the Red Devils after a disappointing loss at home to Liverpool before the international break. Despite conceding a penalty early in the game, Andre Onana made the save and United were able to push on from there. Summer signing Matthijs de Ligt opened his account for the club, while Marcus Rashford and Alejandro Garnacho scored the remaining two goals. Diallo registered the assist for the second goal at the end of the first half. Diallo Pinpointed as Red Devils' Star Performer Despite not putting himself among the goals, Diallo was named United’s best player in their victory by Manchester Evening News reporter Luckhurst. Even though it was a difficult first half an hour for the visitors at St Mary’s, in which they conceded a penalty that was subsequently saved, Diallo was the standout performer as he carved out numerous openings. The 22-year-old joined the club back in 2022 from Serie A side Atalanta. In his first few seasons at Old Trafford, he had loan spells at Rangers and Sunderland before joining the first team last season and making 12 appearances across all competitions. This season, Diallo has featured in all four of United’s Premier League fixtures so far, and it seems his place in the starting line-up...

title: Man City and West Ham Eye Move for Teenager Harrison Duncan
creator: Hannah Pinnock
content: Manchester City and West Ham United are among the Premier League clubs closely monitoring Rotherham United starlet Harrison Duncan, according to journalist Alan Nixon. Pep Guardiola ’s side are currently top of the Premier League standings having won all four of their fixtures so far. The Hammers, on the other hand, sit 14th with just four points from their games. Rotherham currently compete in League One and are 17th with six points after six games. But it is academy star Duncan who is catching headlines with the club braced for offers for the under-18s star. Duncan on Sky Blues and Hammers' Radar Journalist Nixon, writing on his Patreon, claims Manchester City and West Ham are keeping a watchful eye on Duncan’s progress at Rotherham. The defender has been dubbed the 'new John Stones', and is currently training under Steve Evans with the first team and could be in line for a senior debut sooner rather than later. The Premier League duo have reportedly been monitoring the 6 ft 3 man at youth level and his current employers are already bracing themselves for major offers. The 16-year-old only recently signed a scholarship at the New York Stadium from non-league club Doncaster City. Previously speaking to TEAMtalk, Rotherham boss Evans said the youngster was recommended by someone who had spotted Ronaldo Vieira and Siriki Dembele in the past. Since joining the club, he has impressed while training with the first team and has held his own against experienced strikers. Evans...

title: Dominic Calvert-Lewin Criticised After 'Awful' Everton Miss
creator: Will Lancaster
content: Everton blew yet another 2-0 lead to lose 3-2 in consecutive Premier League weeks to leave them pointless in the top-flight after four games - and Alan Shearer believes that Toffees striker Dominic Calvert-Lewin has a lot to answer for with the striker missing an 'absolute sitter' to put Sean Dyche 's men 3-2 up at Aston Villa . Goals from Dwight McNeil and Calvert-Lewin in the first half put Everton 2-0 up in the west Midlands, before an Ollie Watkins brace preceded Jhon Duran's goal of the season contender to leave the travelling Toffees beleaguered once again. But it could have been much different had Calvert-Lewin tucked away a one-on-one against Emiliano Martinez with the whole half to himself - with Shearer berating him for not scoring. Shearer: Calvert-Lewin Miss vs Aston Villa "Awful" Speaking on Match of the Day, Shearer could not believe that Calvert-Lewin had passed up missing an 'absolute sitter. title: Chelsea 'Will Sell Cole Palmer' if he Becomes 100m Star
creator: Hannah Pinnock
content: Chelsea will be prepared to sell Cole Palmer if he goes on to become a £100million player, according to Sky Sports pundit Paul Merson. Enzo Maresca’s side were in Premier League action on Saturday evening as they secured a narrow 1-0 win over Bournemouth at the Vitality Stadium. A late goal from substitute Christopher Nkunku proved to be the difference on the night. However, since his arrival at the club 12 months ago from Manchester City , Palmer has been the standout performer. The 22-year-old ended last season as Chelsea’s top scorer in the Premier League with 22 goals, eight ahead of Nicolas Jackson in second. Blues Will Entertain Sanctioning Palmer Exit Speaking on Sky Sports, via Chels HQ, former Arsenal and Aston Villa man Merson claimed Chelsea would sell their star players as part of the model under the current ownership. The west Londoners have recruited heavily in recent years, but have also seen a return on some of their investment through player sales. Palmer was signed from Premier League rivals Manchester City in the summer of 2023 for an initial £40million , and he had an outstanding first campaign at Stamford Bridge. He scored 27 goals and registered 15 assists across all competitions last term. The winger’s form also caught the attention of former England manager Gareth Southgate, as Palmer was included in the squad for Euro 2024 over the summer. However, Merson believes if the talisman and Nicolas Jackson continue their outstanding form, it could prompt...

Gazzede Bir Gazeteci Daha Hayatını Kaybetti
creator: Anadolu Ajansı
content: İsrail Saldırıları Sonrası Gazeteçilerin Durumu Gazze Şeridi, 7 Ekim 2023'ten beri İsrail ordusunun yoğun saldırıları altında. Geçtiğimiz günlerde, adamızda bir gazeteci daha hayatını kaybetti. Bu kayıpla birlikte, bölgedeki gazetecilerin öldürülmesiyle ilgili sayı 173'e yükseldi. Olayın Detayları Filistinli gazeteci Abdullah Şekşek , Gazze'nin güneyinde bulunan Refah kentinde, İsrail ordusuna ait bir insansız hava aracının açtığı ateş sonucu yaşamını yitirdi. Gazze'deki hükümetin Medya Ofisi, bu üzücü durumu kınayan bir basın açıklaması yayımladı. Uluslararası Toplumun Rolü Medya Ofisi'nden yapılan açıklamada, İsrail ordusunun Gazze'deki gazetecileri hedef almasının ciddi bir sorun olduğu vurgulandı. Açıklama, uluslararası kuruluşlara ve topluma, İsrail'e karşı caydırıcı yaptırımlar uygulanması ve yargılanması yönünde bir çağrıda bulundu. Aynı zamanda, gazetecilerin öldürülmesinin önlenmesi için acil eylem gerekliliği belirtilerek, Filistinli gazetecilerin seslerini duyurmaları gerektiği konusunda vurgular yapıldı. Medya Ofisinin Önceki Açıklamaları Daha önce yapılan açıklamalarda, İsrail'in Gazze'deki gazetecileri özellikle Filistin’in sesini susturmak için kasıtlı olarak öldürdüğü ifade edilmişti. Bu eylemler, haberlerin ve bilgilerin uluslararası kamuoyuna ulaşmasını engellemek amacı taşıdığı iddia ediliyor.

title: Дзюба назвал правильным выбором переход в "Акрон"
content: САМАРА, 15 сентября. /ТАСС/. Переход в тольяттинский футбольный клуб "Акрон" стал правильным выбором для нападающего Артема Дзюбы. Об этом он заявил журналистам. В воскресенье "Акрон" со счетом 3:0 разгромил подмосковные "Химки" в матче Мир - Российской премьер-лиги (РПЛ). Дзюба дебютировал за тольяттинский клуб, появившись на поле на 65-й минуте встречи. Нападающий отметился результативной передачей в эпизоде с третьим голом. "Я очень соскучился по РПЛ, спасибо зрителям за такое теплое приветствие, когда так встречают, очень приятно, все не зря. Очень важно, что победили, как команда в целом выглядели достойно, это один из наших конкурентов за борьбу за выживание, мы хотим как можно дальше оттуда уйти", - сказал Дзюба. "Долго ли решался на переход в "Акрон"? Ночь бессонная была у меня, да, нужно было взвесить все, уважаемые люди поддержали меня, сказали, что надо, мое окружение тоже, поэтому у меня уже не оставалось выбора, да и сам бы я, наверное, жалел бы, если бы выбрал ничего не делать. Рад, что сделал правильный выбор", - добавил он. Дзюба является четырехкратным чемпионом России в составе петербургского "Зенита", дважды побеждал в кубке страны, четыре раза выигрывал Суперкубок России. В 2018 году вместе со сборной России нападающий дошел до четвертьфинала чемпионата мира.

content: TOPSHOT - Former US President and Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump gestures as he speaks during a campaign rally at the Expo World Market Center in Las Vegas, Nevada, on September 13, 2024. (Photo by Patrick T. Fallon / AFP) AFP/PATRICK T. FALLON "Käufer passt auf!", warnt Paul Karger, Mitgründer der Investmentfirma TwinFocus. "Ich habe den Fallout vieler solcher SPACs (Special Purpose Acquisition Company) gesehen und sie waren nur eine Abwärtsspirale bei der alle versuchten, um jeden Preis rauszukommen. Und dann sind die Aktien kollabiert." Seine Warnung gilt Interessenten an Anteilen an der "Trump Media & Technology Group".

title: Donald Trump posts ‘I HATE TAYLOR SWIFT’ after pop star endorses Kamala Harris
creator: AFP
content: WASHINGTON: The tweet came as a surprise, even from the provocative Donald Trump: "I HATE TAYLOR SWIFT!" the former president said Sunday. Though the all-caps post came without accompanying commentary or explanation, the context was clear. On Tuesday, just minutes after a debate with Vice President Kamala Harris that Republican Trump was widely seen as losing, the superstar singer/songwriter posted a message on Instagram saying Celebrity endorsements rarely carry enormous weight, but the hugely popular Swift is seen as being in a class of her own, with more than 100 million followers on social-media -- 10 million of whom "liked" her Instagram post. "Going after Taylor Swift is a genuinely bad campaign strategy," said one poster on social media platform X. "Taylor doesn't get mad, she gets even." It was not clear what Trump hoped to gain by attacking Swift, though he may calculate that any publicity is better than none. He has been criticized, even by fellow Republicans, for his recent association with conspiracy-minded right-wing influencer Laura Loomer, who has at times joined him on his campaign plane. The 31-year-old Loomer -- who has called the Sept. 11 terror attacks an "inside job" and said some recent mass shootings were staged by Democrats -- recently suggested that Swift had entered an "arranged relationship" with football star Travis Kelce "to influence the 2024 election." There is no evidence to support any of those claims.
